title: Accounting Analyst
description:
**Who We Are:**


Real (Nasdaq: REAX) is a publicly traded, fast\\-growing global real estate brokerage powered by technology and driven by people. Since our founding in 2014, we’ve been reimagining the residential real estate experience. With operations across the U.S., Canada, India, and the District of Columbia, we’re leading the industry with our cutting\\-edge platform that empowers agents, simplifies the buying and selling journey, and unlocks greater financial opportunities.


At Real, we believe in pairing Tech x Humanity to create something truly different.

  

Learn more at https://www.onereal.com/

**Work Schedule:** Monday \\- Friday EST 9:00am to 5:00 pm

**About the Role:**


We’re looking for an **Accounting Analyst** to join our **Finance** team. In this role, you’ll support accounting operations by managing fund releases, verifying transactions, and assisting with agent payments and audits. The ideal candidate is analytical, detail\\-oriented, and eager to learn, with a strong sense of ownership and adaptability.


This is a great opportunity for a **CA fresher** to gain hands\\-on experience in real estate accounting, collaborate with cross\\-border teams, and contribute to process improvements in a fast\\-paced, technology\\-driven environment.

 **What You’ll Do:**

* Release funds to title companies for terminated transactions.
* Verify wire receipts in Rezen for each transaction.
* Assist the U.S. accounting team with transaction closings to ensure timely agent payments.
* Use Excel and other firm systems to create efficiencies and process improvements.
* Support year\\-end audits and provide requested documentation as needed.
* Participate in special projects, system enhancements, and ad hoc analyses as assigned.

**What You’ll Bring:**

* Strong analytical and communication skills.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Excel (required).
* Familiarity with Business Central (a plus).
* Highly organized, attentive, and adaptable with a strong sense of urgency.
* Ability to multitask and work independently with minimal supervision.

**Education \\& Experience:**

* Chartered Accountant (CA) fresher.
* Strong academic foundation in accounting or finance.
* Prior internship or exposure to accounting operations preferred.

 **How We Work: Our Operating Principles**


Our Operating Principles are the blueprint of Real’s culture. They guide how we show up, make decisions, and bring our mission to life every day:

* **Be Agent Obsessed:** We design every decision around creating value for our agents and their clients.
* **Move Fast with Purpose:** We act with urgency, clarity, and focus—without compromising our standards.
* **Own Your Outcome:** Effort matters, but results matter more. We adapt, learn, and improve.
* **Be Bold; Challenge Often:** We challenge assumptions, rethink “the usual,” and push for smarter, simpler solutions.
* **Win Together:** We set high standards, collaborate deeply, and celebrate shared success.

**Additional Details:**

* **Location Requirements:** Candidates must be based in India to be considered.
* **Physical Requirements:** Ability to sit for long periods of time.

 **Our Commitment:**


Reax Technology Platform Private Limited is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building an inclusive environment for all employees. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds and identities, and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital or family status, disability, citizenship, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law.

title: Data Analyst (Entry Level)
description:
**Job Title: Data Analyst (Entry Level)**

**About the Role:**

We are looking for a detail\\-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to join our team. The role involves scraping, collecting, and organizing business data from various online sources, including Google My Business, company directories, and other relevant portals.

The extracted data will serve as high\\-quality leads for our Sales \\& Business Development team to reach out and offer our IT services.

This is an entry\\-level position, ideal for individuals who are analytical, tech\\-savvy, and eager to start their career in data and market research.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Conduct web scraping and data collection from online sources such as Google My Business, directories, and social platforms.
* Ensure all collected data is accurate, relevant, and up\\-to\\-date.
* Organize and maintain data in spreadsheets for easy access by the Sales team.
* Analyze trends and patterns in collected data to improve lead quality.
* Collaborate with the Sales \\& Marketing team to define data collection goals and criteria.
* Maintain data confidentiality and comply with company’s data handling standards.

**Required Skills \\& Competencies:**

* Strong analytical and research skills.
* Good understanding of online platforms and business directories.
* Basic knowledge of Excel/Google Sheets and data organization tools.
* Familiarity with web scraping tools or manual data collection techniques (a plus).
* Good written and verbal communication skills.
* Attention to detail and ability to handle repetitive tasks with accuracy.
* Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.

**Eligibility:**

* Freshers with strong analytical mindset and good communication skills are welcome.
* Candidates with up to 1 year of experience in data research, data entry, or web scraping will be preferred.
* Graduate in any stream (preferably Computer Science, IT, or Business\\-related fields).

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher, Internship

Pay: ₹8,000\\.00 \\- ₹15,000\\.00 per month

title: Data Analyst
description:

Identify, extract, and manage relevant datasets from multiple sources.

Knowledge of Python or R for data analysis preferred.

Strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and communication skills.

**Preferred Skills**

Experience with big data tools such as Google BigQuery or AWS Redshift.

Familiarity with ETL processes and data warehousing concepts.

Understanding of basic machine learning or predictive analytics.

title: Database Administrator
description:
A Database Administrator (DBA) is responsible for managing, maintaining, and securing an organization’s database systems to ensure optimal performance, data integrity, and security. They play a central role in ensuring that the company’s data is reliable, available, and efficiently organized for use in business operations and analytics.

Key Responsibilities

* Build, design, and implement database systems according to end\\-user requirements.
* Monitor database performance and tune queries for efficiency.
* Plan and execute backup and recovery operations to safeguard data.
* Maintain data security through access control, encryption, and regular updates.
* Install, configure, and upgrade database management systems (DBMS).
* Collaborate with developers and analysts to optimize database\\-driven applications and business intelligence solutions.

description:

---------------

About the role: Amazon's Global Finance Solutions (GFS) team is a fast\\-paced, team\\-focused, dynamic environment and delivering great experiences for our customers is top priority. GFS is seeking a Financial Analyst for EU Stores Central Finance team. The candidate would be responsible for financial close and performing related reporting, accruals etc. Additionally, the role would support monthly P\\&L analysis, perform financial reporting and forecasts, use financial systems and advanced MS Excel functions to work with large data sets, and perform headcount reporting, planning and forecasting. Additional responsibilities would include establishing, measuring and monitoring weekly KPI metric discussions for new and/or existing business initiatives and operational performance and assisting in measuring and reporting progress on key goals for the business team in a timely and accurate manner. The candidate would also perform ad\\-hoc business analyses and financial modeling, provide inputs for monthly and quarterly business reviews in a timely manner, facilitate business reviews with data analysis, identify and implement solutions to resolve, improve, automate, standardize, or simplify finance processes, and identify incomplete or inaccurate data, root cause of data issues, escalate discrepancies, fix data where possible or partner to deliver a solution.

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. title: Accounting Analyst
description:
**Who We Are:**


Real (Nasdaq: REAX) is a publicly traded, fast\\-growing global real estate brokerage powered by technology and driven by people. Since our founding in 2014, we’ve been reimagining the residential real estate experience. With operations across the U.S., Canada, India, and the District of Columbia, we’re leading the industry with our cutting\\-edge platform that empowers agents, simplifies the buying and selling journey, and unlocks greater financial opportunities.


At Real, we believe in pairing Tech x Humanity to create something truly different.

  

Learn more at https://www.onereal.com/

**Work Schedule:** Monday \\- Friday EST 9:00am to 5:00 pm

**About the Role:**


We’re looking for an **Accounting Analyst** to join our **Finance** team. In this role, you’ll support accounting operations by managing fund releases, verifying transactions, and assisting with agent payments and audits. The ideal candidate is analytical, detail\\-oriented, and eager to learn, with a strong sense of ownership and adaptability.


This is a great opportunity for a **CA fresher** to gain hands\\-on experience in real estate accounting, collaborate with cross\\-border teams, and contribute to process improvements in a fast\\-paced, technology\\-driven environment.

 **What You’ll Do:**

* Release funds to title companies for terminated transactions.
* Verify wire receipts in Rezen for each transaction.
* Assist the U.S. accounting team with transaction closings to ensure timely agent payments.
* Use Excel and other firm systems to create efficiencies and process improvements.
* Support year\\-end audits and provide requested documentation as needed.
* Participate in special projects, system enhancements, and ad hoc analyses as assigned.

**What You’ll Bring:**

* Strong analytical and communication skills.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Excel (required).
* Familiarity with Business Central (a plus).
* Highly organized, attentive, and adaptable with a strong sense of urgency.
* Ability to multitask and work independently with minimal supervision.

**Education \\& Experience:**

* Chartered Accountant (CA) fresher.
* Strong academic foundation in accounting or finance.
* Prior internship or exposure to accounting operations preferred.

 **How We Work: Our Operating Principles**


Our Operating Principles are the blueprint of Real’s culture. They guide how we show up, make decisions, and bring our mission to life every day:

* **Be Agent Obsessed:** We design every decision around creating value for our agents and their clients.
* **Move Fast with Purpose:** We act with urgency, clarity, and focus—without compromising our standards.
* **Own Your Outcome:** Effort matters, but results matter more. We adapt, learn, and improve.
* **Be Bold; Challenge Often:** We challenge assumptions, rethink “the usual,” and push for smarter, simpler solutions.
* **Win Together:** We set high standards, collaborate deeply, and celebrate shared success.

**Additional Details:**

* **Location Requirements:** Candidates must be based in India to be considered.
* **Physical Requirements:** Ability to sit for long periods of time.

 **Our Commitment:**


Reax Technology Platform Private Limited is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building an inclusive environment for all employees. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds and identities, and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital or family status, disability, citizenship, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law.

description:
**Company Description**  

WNS (Holdings) Limited (NYSE: WNS), is a leading Business Process Management (BPM) company. We combine our deep industry knowledge with technology and analytics expertise to co\\-create innovative, digital\\-led transformational solutions with clients across 10 industries. We enable businesses in Travel, Insurance, Banking and Financial Services, Manufacturing, Retail and Consumer Packaged Goods, Shipping and Logistics, Healthcare, and Utilities to re\\-imagine their digital future and transform their outcomes with operational excellence.We deliver an entire spectrum of BPM services in finance and accounting, procurement, customer interaction services and human resources leveraging collaborative models that are tailored to address the unique business challenges of each client. title: Data Analyst (Entry Level)
description:
**Job Title: Data Analyst (Entry Level)**

**About the Role:**

We are looking for a detail\\-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to join our team. The role involves scraping, collecting, and organizing business data from various online sources, including Google My Business, company directories, and other relevant portals.

The extracted data will serve as high\\-quality leads for our Sales \\& Business Development team to reach out and offer our IT services.

This is an entry\\-level position, ideal for individuals who are analytical, tech\\-savvy, and eager to start their career in data and market research.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Conduct web scraping and data collection from online sources such as Google My Business, directories, and social platforms.
* Ensure all collected data is accurate, relevant, and up\\-to\\-date.
* Organize and maintain data in spreadsheets for easy access by the Sales team.
* Analyze trends and patterns in collected data to improve lead quality.
* Collaborate with the Sales \\& Marketing team to define data collection goals and criteria.
* Maintain data confidentiality and comply with company’s data handling standards.

**Required Skills \\& Competencies:**

* Strong analytical and research skills.
* Good understanding of online platforms and business directories.
* Basic knowledge of Excel/Google Sheets and data organization tools.
* Familiarity with web scraping tools or manual data collection techniques (a plus).
* Good written and verbal communication skills.
* Attention to detail and ability to handle repetitive tasks with accuracy.
* Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.

**Eligibility:**

* Freshers with strong analytical mindset and good communication skills are welcome.
* Candidates with up to 1 year of experience in data research, data entry, or web scraping will be preferred.
* Graduate in any stream (preferably Computer Science, IT, or Business\\-related fields).

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher, Internship

Pay: ₹8,000\\.00 \\- ₹15,000\\.00 per month

title: Data Analyst
description:
**About Doctosmart**

Doctosmart is an innovative health\\-tech company based in Calicut Cyberpark. We develop scalable digital platforms that connect patients, doctors, and clinics, improving healthcare accessibility through technology.

We’re looking for a passionate Data Analyst who loves turning numbers into actionable insights.

**Primary Responsibilities \\& Essential Functions**

**Data Querying and Management**

Identify, extract, and manage relevant datasets from multiple sources.

Develop and optimize SQL queries for efficient data retrieval.

Monitor and resolve data inconsistencies, quality, and accuracy issues.

Maintain data tables and automate recurring data extraction processes.

**Data Reporting and Visualization**

Build and deploy interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI, Tableau, or similar tools.

Update and maintain existing reports for accuracy and usability.

Create automated reporting processes to streamline data insights delivery.

**Data Analysis and Insights**

Perform detailed data analysis to identify trends, correlations, and actionable insights.

Document analysis methods, validation steps, and results.

Communicate findings clearly to business stakeholders and management.

Provide recommendations to improve processes and performance based on analytical results.

**Qualifications**

Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related field.

1 years of experience as a Data Analyst or in a similar analytical role.(Freshers can also apply)

Proficiency in SQL, Excel, and one or more visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.).

Knowledge of Python or R for data analysis preferred.

Strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and communication skills.

**Preferred Skills**

Experience with big data tools such as Google BigQuery or AWS Redshift.

Familiarity with ETL processes and data warehousing concepts.

Understanding of basic machine learning or predictive analytics.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent

Work Location: In person

title: Financial Analyst, GFS FP&A
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


About the Organization: Amazon is a US\\-based multinational electronic commerce company headquartered in Seattle, Washington. Amazon.com started as an online bookstore, but soon diversified into many other categories, with a vision to be earth's most customer\\-centric company \\& to build a place where people can come to find and discover anything they might want to buy online.
  

  

About the role: Amazon's Global Finance Solutions (GFS) team is a fast\\-paced, team\\-focused, dynamic environment and delivering great experiences for our customers is top priority. GFS is seeking a Financial Analyst for EU Stores Central Finance team. The candidate would be responsible for financial close and performing related reporting, accruals etc. Additionally, the role would support monthly P\\&L analysis, perform financial reporting and forecasts, use financial systems and advanced MS Excel functions to work with large data sets, and perform headcount reporting, planning and forecasting. Additional responsibilities would include establishing, measuring and monitoring weekly KPI metric discussions for new and/or existing business initiatives and operational performance and assisting in measuring and reporting progress on key goals for the business team in a timely and accurate manner. The candidate would also perform ad\\-hoc business analyses and financial modeling, provide inputs for monthly and quarterly business reviews in a timely manner, facilitate business reviews with data analysis, identify and implement solutions to resolve, improve, automate, standardize, or simplify finance processes, and identify incomplete or inaccurate data, root cause of data issues, escalate discrepancies, fix data where possible or partner to deliver a solution.

**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* Experience using data to influence business decisions
* CA fresher / 1\\+ years of experience in FP\\&A, closing of Books of accounts and reporting \\& analytics

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience in managing, evaluating, analyzing data quickly and creating meaningful business reporting.
* Good financial acumen with problem\\-solving and decision\\-making skills.
* Manage competing priorities and meet deadlines.
* Good interpersonal skills — including written and oral communication skills.
* Advanced proficiency in Excel.
* Retail industry experience.
* Experience in VBA, COGNOS and SQL is a plus.

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\\-we\\-hire/accommodations for more information. We are a growing IT hardware service / electronics repair. company committed to delivering exceptional service to our customers. We are looking for a proactive **Laptop Service engineer** to join our team and ensure smooth scheduling, communication, and execution of service activities.

As a Laptop \\& Printer Service Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the optimal functionality and performance of laptops \\& Printers portable computing devices. This role requires a combination of technical expertise, problem\\-solving skills, and excellent customer service to diagnose and resolve hardware and software issues. * Maintain accurate **purchase data, reports, and documentation** for audit and record purposes.
* Support the Purchase team in **day\\-to\\-day operations** and administrative tasks.

**Qualifications:**

* **Graduation in Mechanical Engineering** (Freshers preferred).
* Basic knowledge of procurement and supply chain processes.
* Good communication and coordination skills.
* Proficiency in **MS Office**, especially Excel.
* Attention to detail and willingness to learn.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Work Location: In person

title: Technical Support Engineer
description:
**Company Description**  

BETSOL is a cloud\\-first digital transformation and data management company offering products and IT services to enterprises in over 40 countries. BETSOL team holds several engineering patents, is recognized with industry awards, and BETSOL maintains a net promoter score that is 2x the industry average. BETSOL’s open\\-source backup and recovery product line, Zmanda (Zmanda.com), delivers up to 80% savings in total cost of ownership (TCO) and best\\-in\\-class performance. BETSOL Global IT Services (BETSOL.com) builds and supports end\\-to\\-end enterprise solutions, reducing time\\-to\\-market for its customers. BETSOL offices are set against the vibrant backdrops of Broomfield, Colorado and Bangalore, India. We take pride in being an employee\\-centric organization, offering comprehensive health insurance, competitive salaries, 401K, volunteer programs, and scholarship opportunities. Office amenities include a fitness center, cafe, and recreational facilities. Learn more at betsol.com.

 **Job Description**  

Years of Experience:


 1 – 3 years of experience in Technical Support / BPO industry, preferably both in chat and Voice process.


Freshers can also apply.


Mandatory Skills:  

 Excellent communication skills in English (both spoken and written)  

 Basic to advanced knowledge of computers (software)  

 Working knowledge of internet and networking  

 Typing speed \\- minimum 35 wpm with 100% accuracy  

 Attention to detail is a must along with accuracy in the chats  

 Ability to follow instructions as directed  

 Willingness to work in 24 x 7 work environment


Desired Skills:  

 Self\\-motivated with excellent interpersonal skills  

 Innovative and self\\-starter  

 Ability to work with minimum supervision  

 Detail and analytical orientation  

 Problem solving and conflict resolution skills  

 Demonstrated ability to work in a fast paced environment  

 Ability to respond to common inquiries or complaints from customers  

 Must be well organized and driven to meet deadlines


Job Description:  

 TSE will be responsible to provide chat and voice support to our international clients in US, Canada and UK.  

 TSEs should have the ability to handle multiple chats simultaneously.  

 Responsible to provide timely and effective resolutions to our clients on basic to complex technical support queries via chat and calls  

 Responsible for responding to customers in an efficient and professional manner  

 Handles and resolves technical queries; identifies and escalates accordingly  

 Meets expectations regarding productivity as defined by the process or manager  

 Escalates necessary cases to the right level within the defined LOB (Line Of Business)  

 Ensures compliance with all company and departmental policies, procedures, and Guidelines  

 May be required to perform other tasks as requested, assigned, or directed  

 Focus to achieve 100% customer satisfaction and fully responsible to delight customers with satisfactory service levels  

 Flexibility to work extended hours with minimal notice during high volumes  

 Working days: 5 days a week \\- Weekly off: 2 days (Rotational) and not necessarily (Saturday / Sunday)

 **Additional Information**  

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Quality Control Engineer
description:
* A quality control (QC) specialist's job is to ensure products and services meet company, industry, and legal standards through inspections, testing, and process monitoring. Their duties include identifying defects, analyzing test results, collaborating with production teams to resolve issues, and maintaining quality documentation. They may also be responsible for training staff and ensuring compliance with regulations. Key responsibilities
* Inspect and test products: Conduct thorough inspections and tests on raw materials, components, and finished goods to ensure they meet quality standards and specifications.
* Monitor production processes: Oversee production to ensure consistency and quality throughout all stages.
* Identify and report defects: Find and document any defects or non\\-conformities and communicate them promptly to supervisors and relevant teams.
* Analyze data: Analyze inspection and test results to identify trends, issues, and areas for improvement.
* Implement corrective actions: Collaborate with production and engineering teams to implement corrective and preventive actions to fix quality issues.
* Maintain documentation: Keep accurate and up\\-to\\-date records of all quality control activities, inspections, and reports.
* Ensure compliance: Ensure products and processes comply with industry, regulatory, and company standards.
* Train staff: Train other team members on quality control standards, procedures, and best practices.
* Participate in audits: Assist in internal and external quality audits and provide necessary documentation.
* Required skills and qualifications
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Excellent attention to detail
* Good communication and interpersonal skills
* Knowledge of quality control procedures and standards
* Proficiency with quality management software and tools
* Ability to read and interpret product specifications and blueprints
* Experience in a specific industry is often beneficial
* Tamil candidates only

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: ₹8,372\\.97 \\- ₹36,904\\.24 per month

Benefits:

* Food provided
* Work from home

Work Location: In person

title: Technical Assistant (ME – Construction Management)
description:
Position: Technical Assistant to Managing Director (ME – Construction Management)  

  

Department: Projects / Corporate Office  

  

Location: Hyderabad  

  

Employment Type: Full\\-Time  

  

Experience: 1–4 Years (Freshers with strong technical skills may apply)### **About the Role:**

We are looking for a technically strong and organized ME (Construction Management / Civil Engineering) professional to assist the Managing Director in monitoring, planning, and controlling all ongoing construction and infrastructure projects. This role provides direct exposure to senior management and involves coordination with project sites, technical teams, and head office.


### **Key Responsibilities:**

* Assist the MD in planning, monitoring, and execution of all construction and infrastructure projects.
* Track project progress, site activities, and timelines as per MD’s directives.
* Prepare project schedules, status reports, and technical summaries for management review.
* Coordinate with project engineers, site in\\-charges, and plant \\& machinery teams.
* Ensure projects adhere to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.
* Review technical documents, BOQs, and project drawings as required.
* Identify delays or bottlenecks and report corrective actions to the MD.
* Support the MD in decision\\-making with accurate project data and insights.
* Maintain communication between MD’s office and site teams for daily/weekly updates.
* Assist in preparation of presentations, reports, and planning documents for management meetings.

### **Requirements / Skills:**

* Qualification: M.E. in Construction Management / Civil Engineering
* Experience: 1–4 years (Freshers with strong technical and coordination skills may apply)
* Sound knowledge of civil construction, infrastructure, and heavy project operations
* Strong analytical, planning, and technical coordination skills
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
* Proficient in MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and project monitoring tools
* Ability to handle multiple projects and follow MD’s instructions efficiently

### **Reporting To:**

Managing Director


### **Why Join Us:**

* Gain direct exposure to senior management and decision\\-making processes.
* Work on diverse construction and infrastructure projects.
* Opportunity to develop strong technical, coordination, and leadership skills.
* Fast\\-track career growth in a dynamic corporate environment.

We are looking for a technically strong and organized ME (Construction Management / Civil Engineering) professional to assist the Managing Director in monitoring, planning, and controlling all ongoing construction and infrastructure projects. * Review technical documents, BOQs, and project drawings as required.
* Identify delays or bottlenecks and report corrective actions to the MD.
* Support the MD in decision\\-making with accurate project data and insights.
* Maintain communication between MD’s office and site teams for daily/weekly updates.
* Assist in preparation of presentations, reports, and planning documents for management meetings.

### **Requirements / Skills:**

* Qualification: M.E. in Construction Management / Civil Engineering
* Experience: 1–4 years (Freshers with strong technical and coordination skills may apply)
* Sound knowledge of civil construction, infrastructure, and heavy project operations
* Strong analytical, planning, and technical coordination skills
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
* Proficient in MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and project monitoring tools
* Ability to handle multiple projects and follow MD’s instructions efficiently

### **Reporting To:**

Managing Director


### **Why Join Us:**

* Gain direct exposure to senior management and decision\\-making processes.
* Work on diverse construction and infrastructure projects.
* Opportunity to develop strong technical, coordination, and leadership skills.
* Fast\\-track career growth in a dynamic corporate environment.

title: Database Engineer (Fresher)
description:
**About MoEngage:**



MoEngage is an insights\\-led customer engagement platform trusted by 1,350\\+ global consumer brands, including McAfee, Flipkart, Domino’s, Nestle, Deutsche Telekom, and OYO. MoEngage combines data from multiple sources to help brands gain a 360\\-degree view of their customers.



MoEngage Analytics arms marketers and product owners with insights into customer behavior. Brands can leverage MoEngage Personalize to orchestrate journeys and build 1:1 conversations across the website, mobile, email, social, and messaging channels. MoEngage Inform, the transactional messaging infrastructure, helps unify promotional and transactional communication to a single platform for better insights and lower costs. MoEngage’s AI Suite helps marketers develop winning copies and creatives, optimize campaigns and channels that boost engagement, and help with faster execution.



For over a decade, consumer brands in 60\\+ countries have been using MoEngage to power digital experiences for over a billion monthly customers. With offices in 15 countries, MoEngage is backed by Goldman Sachs Asset Management, B Capital, Steadview Capital, Multiples Private Equity, Eight Roads, F\\-Prime Capital, Matrix Partners, Ventureast, and Helion Ventures.



MoEngage was named a Contender in The Forrester Wave™: Real\\-Time Interaction Management, Q1 2024 report, and Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™ 2023 report. MoEngage was also featured as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Omni\\-Channel Marketing Platforms for B2C Enterprises 2023\\.



**As part of the Engineering team at MoEngage, here are some things you can expect:**


* Make in India and build for the world at the scale of 500M active users, which no other internet company in the country has seen
* Take ownership and be responsible for what you build \\- no micromanagement
* Work with A players (some of the best talents in the country), and expedite your learning curve and career growth
* Learn together from different teams on how they scale to millions of users and billions of messages.
* and more importantly, have fun while you work on scaling MoEngage.

**Requirements :**


* Strong programming skills in backend application development.
* Proficient in at least one backend language such as Python or Java.
* Skilled in designing, developing, and integrating APIs.
* Solid knowledge of databases and caching systems.
* Knowledge of cloud computing platforms, such as GCP, Azure, or AWS.


At **MoEngage**, we respect and value differences. We believe that when people from diverse backgrounds and perspectives collaborate, we create the most value – for our clients, our employees, and society. We embrace diversity and uphold a strong set of values. We are committed to inclusivity and take pride in providing equal opportunities for success and growth.



Employment at **MoEngage** is based solely on professional competence, skills, and experience. We stand firmly against all forms of discrimination and support equal rights and opportunities regardless of gender, ethnicity, abilities, age, identity, orientation or expression, marital status (including pregnancy), religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by law.



It is our policy to comply with all applicable national, state, and local laws related to non\\-discrimination and equal opportunity. **MoEngage** is truly a place where everyone can bring their passions, authentic selves, and talents to work, collaborating to drive progress and solve meaningful challenges.


**Why Join Us!**



At MoEngage, we are passionate about our team and technology \\- see below to know more about us.



Life@MoEngage



Tech@MoEngage



Scale @MoEngage



We handle more than a billion messages every day. Rest assured, you will be surrounded by really smart and passionate people as we scale much more to build a world\\-class technology team.

description:
**Job Title:** IT Support Engineer  
**Location:** Chennai  
**Job Type:** Full\\-time

**About Us:**  
We are a growing IT hardware service / electronics repair. company committed to delivering exceptional service to our customers. We are looking for a proactive **Laptop Service engineer** to join our team and ensure smooth scheduling, communication, and execution of service activities.

As a Laptop \\& Printer Service Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the optimal functionality and performance of laptops \\& Printers portable computing devices. This role requires a combination of technical expertise, problem\\-solving skills, and excellent customer service to diagnose and resolve hardware and software issues. You will work in a dynamic environment, collaborating with customers and colleagues to provide timely and effective solutions, making this role integral to the smooth operation of businesses and individuals who rely on Laptops \\& Printer for their work and personal needs.

* **On\\-Site Servicing:** In addition to servicing Laptop \\& Printer in a workshop or service centre, the Service Engineer may be required to travel to customer sites. This includes Stores, offices, or other locations where Laptops \\& Printers need servicing. While on\\-site, the engineer should maintain professionalism and adhere to safety protocols to ensure a positive customer experience.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Diagnosis and Troubleshooting:** Perform in\\-depth analysis to identify hardware and software problems in Laptops \\& Printers. Utilise diagnostic tools, manuals, and your technical knowledge to pinpoint issues accurately.
* **Repair and Maintenance:** Execute repairs, replacements, and upgrades for components, including but not limited to, processors, memory, hard drives, and batteries. Ensure all repairs meet quality standards.
* **Software Support:** Install, update, and configure operating systems, drivers, and software applications. Resolve software\\-related issues such as malware, viruses, and system crashes.
* **Data Backup and Recovery:** Implement data backup solutions and assist customers in recovering lost or corrupted data, ensuring data privacy and security.

**Qualifications:**

* A degree or diploma in computer science, electronics, or a related field is preferred.
* Proven experience as a Laptop or Printer service technician or a similar role in the IT industry.
* Proficiency in diagnosing and repairing Laptop \\& Printer hardware and software issues.

Freshers are also welcome with knowledge in Laptop or Printer hardware replacement. Free training will be provided for interested freshers.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software

engineers to deploy ML models into production environments.

* Automate model deployment pipelines using CI/CD tools for continuous

integration and delivery of machine learning models.

* Implement version control for ML models, datasets, and experiments (e.g., using

DVC, MLflow, or similar tools).

* Develop and maintain infrastructure for model training, validation, and

deployment using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* Support scaling and monitoring of deployed ML models, ensuring they meet

performance and reliability requirements in production.

* Set up and manage containerized environments for model deployment using

tools such as Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Develop and maintain monitoring tools to track model performance and data

drift in production environments.

* Implement and automate workflows for data preprocessing, model training,

testing, and versioning.

* Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to model deployment,

performance, or scalability.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to optimize model training pipelines

and ensure seamless integration with production systems.

* Keep up to date with the latest tools, technologies, and best practices in MLOps

and machine learning.

* Experience: 0\\-2 years of experience in MLOps, DevOps, data engineering, or

related fields.

* Familiarity with machine learning concepts and model deployment processes.
* Basic experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI) for automating

model deployment pipelines.

* Exposure to version control tools for ML (e.g., DVC, MLflow, Git).
* Proficiency in Python, including libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit\\-learn

for ML\\-related tasks.

* Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and container

orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Familiarity with model monitoring tools and understanding of concepts like

model drift and performance tracking.

* Knowledge of SQL and data pipeline technologies to handle and manipulate

large datasets.

* Strong problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on scalable and

efficient solutions.

* Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-

functional teams.

* Exposure to ML model deployment frameworks such as TensorFlow

Serving, Seldon, or TorchServe.

* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines and orchestration tools

like Kubeflow or Apache Airflow.

* Experience with data storage systems like Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or

databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.

\\& Biases, or ModelDB.

* Understanding of data security and privacy concerns in deploying machine

learning models.

* Experience with performance monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana,

or Datadog.

description:
**Job Title: Robotics Software \\& Cloud Engineer (Full\\-Time / Part\\-Time)**

**Company:** Symetrix Innovation  
**Location:** Thane, Maharashtra (Hybrid or Remote options available)  
**Position Type:** Full\\-Time and Part\\-Time roles available  
**Industry:** Robotics, Cloud Infrastructure, Symbolic Systems  
**Experience Level:** Mid to Senior  
**Compensation:** Competitive, based on experience and role scope  
**Application:** Send resume and cover letter to \\[your email] with role and time preference

**About Symetrix Innovation**

Symetrix Innovation is a visionary business\\-family ecosystem builder based in Thane, Maharashtra. We design and deploy symbolic service robots across hospitality, retail, and cultural spaces. Our systems integrate hardware platforms from trusted vendors with advanced AI and storytelling layers developed by Syro Labs or equivalent software partners. Our mission is to harmonize tradition, technology, and stakeholder engagement through living systems and legacy\\-driven design.

**Role Summary**

As a Robotics Software \\& Cloud Engineer, you will build both the software that powers individual robots and the cloud infrastructure that manages entire fleets. You’ll create the “brain” of the robot and the “control tower” it reports to — enabling symbolic performance, remote monitoring, and scalable deployment.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **On\\-Robot Software:**

Design and test software for robot perception (vision, sensors), navigation (SLAM, path planning), and manipulation.

* **Cloud Integration:**

Build IoT communication pipelines connecting robots to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* **Fleet Management:**

Develop cloud services for updates, health monitoring, sensor data collection, and remote task orchestration.

* **Data Engineering:**

Process and analyze large\\-scale robotic data (video feeds, sensor logs) for AI training and symbolic insights.

**Required Qualifications**

**Education (India\\-Specific)**

* **Full\\-Time:**
* B.E./B.Tech in Computer Science, Robotics, Electronics, or Data Engineering
* M.Tech/M.Sc preferred for senior roles
* **Part\\-Time:**
* MCA or PG Diploma in Cloud Computing or Robotics Software
* B.Sc (CS/IT) with strong hands\\-on experience may be considered

**Experience**

* 3–7 years in robotics software, cloud infrastructure, or data engineering
* Experience with ROS and cloud\\-based fleet management preferred

**Technical Skills**

* **Programming:** C\\+\\+, Python
* **Frameworks:** ROS/ROS2, Gazebo
* **Cloud Platforms:** AWS IoT Core, Azure IoT Hub, GCP
* **DevOps:** Docker, Kubernetes
* **Systems:** Algorithms, data structures, networking

**Soft Skills**

* Logical problem\\-solving and debugging
* Clear communication across technical domains
* Adaptability in fast\\-paced environments
* Strategic thinking for symbolic fleet orchestration

**What We Offer**

* Opportunity to shape symbolic robotics at scale
* Collaborate with Syro Labs on symbolic data modeling
* Flexible work arrangements (remote, hybrid, part\\-time)
* Growth into symbolic cloud architecture or AI analytics leadership

title: Senior Application Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
 Join our team as an Application Engineer and use your engineering skills and Fisher Software to design and select the best product for our clients. You will also prepare and respond to techno\\-commercial offers and technical queries.
   

  

**In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**
* Review project specifications and prepare preliminary guidelines \\& deviation/clarification sheet.
* Perform sizing and selection with Fisher sizing program using customer data and choose the right valve for the application.
* Co\\-ordinate with Industry support team as when required for special applications / prices and attend quote strategy meeting.
* Prepare technical and commercial quotation based on MIB process with the help of senior engineer.
* Provide support on MRO opportunities, SPIR and RSPL generation jobs.
* Participate in scheduled calls with Sales office/LBP’s and resolve project queries.
* Support project revisions from Customer.
* Support team members to ensure on\\-time project submission.
* To prepare orders file upon project award and engage in post order activities till shipment.


**Who You Are:**
* Breakthrough thinking with a can\\-do attitude.
* Desire to work in an inclusive environment, proactively work across the organization in order to establish and achieve common goals.
* Actively assist in any assigned bid activities, to guarantee that the customer specifications are accurately understood, and that innovative and cost\\-efficient solutions are proposed.


**For This Role, You Will Need:**
* In depth knowledge of control valve products and industry application.
* Knowledge on Fisher products and accessories would be a plus.
* Fresher from college with minimum experience is a plus.
* Good understanding of product specifications and Incoterms.
* Develop and present innovative solutions for problems if they may arise.
* Optimizes work processes and improves performance metrics.
* Awareness of other Emerson products \\& Good knowledge of Inactive/obsolete/Competitor products.
* Should be an effective team player for on\\-time project submission.


**Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:**
* Degree in Mechanical/Instrumentation/Chemical/Metallurgical Engineering.
* Strong interpersonal skills and able to pitch the solution for applications.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Ready to take up any new challenges.
* Experience in Handling large projects and Inhouse engineering experience.


**Our Culture \\& Commitment to You**
 At Emerson, we prioritize a workplace where every employee is valued, respected, and empowered to grow. We foster an environment that encourages innovation, collaboration, and diverse perspectives—because we know that great ideas come from great teams. Our commitment to ongoing career development and growing an inclusive culture ensures you have the support to thrive. Whether through mentorship, training, or leadership opportunities, we invest in your success so you can make a lasting impact. We believe diverse teams, working together are key to driving growth and delivering business results.
   

  

 We recognize the importance of employee wellbeing. We prioritize providing competitive benefits plans, a variety of medical insurance plans, Employee Assistance Program, employee resource groups, recognition, and much more. Our culture offers flexible time off plans, including paid parental leave (maternal and paternal), vacation and holiday leave.

title: Assistant Professor- MTECH Fresher
description:
**Job Description:** 




 At NIAT, we believe in delivering practical, industry\\-relevant training that empowers students to become great developers. Our product developers are passionate about teaching, simplifying complex concepts, and creating inclusive learning environments for students. This is your chance to make a lasting impact on students who have just completed their 12th standard and are eager to excel as developers.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Deliver daily in\\-person classroom training on programming and/or full\\-stack development.
* Design, develop, and implement learning activities, materials, and resources that align with industry standards.
* Provide personalized learning experiences by understanding student needs and delivering tailored support throughout the program.
* Actively assist and resolve student queries and issues promptly, providing mentorship and guidance.
* Contribute to curriculum development and improvements based on student feedback and industry trends.
* Continuously develop and demonstrate a teaching philosophy that inspires student learning.
* Review student deliverables for accuracy and quality.
* Handle a class size of 70\\-100 students, ensuring engagement and effective learning outcomes.
* Stay current with professional development in both pedagogy and software development practices



**Requirements:** 



* A Masters degree (M.Tech) in CSE, IT, Data science,AI/ML,Software Engineer etc will be an added advantage.
* Having teaching or training experience in Computer Science is an added advantage.
* Passion for teaching and mentoring, with a commitment to student success.
* Alignment with NxtWaves vision and culture.



  





  





  





  





  





**Skills Must\\-Have:** 



* Professional fluency in English, with excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Strong proficiency in Python, Java, and JavaScript programming languages. Knowledge of additional programming languages is an added advantage.
* Strong proficiency in Data Structures and Algorithms.
* Strong knowledge of object\\-oriented programming.
* Proficiency in content development using tools like Google Sheets, Google Slides, etc. (Knowledge of Microsoft 365 stack is a plus).
* Ability to quickly learn and use technology platforms to interact with students.
* Empathy, ambition, and the ability to work closely with individuals from diverse backgrounds and cultures.



**Good to Have** 



* Familiarity with Git and version control systems.
* Strong knowledge of the subject matter, industry standards, and best practices in software development.
* Ability to adapt teaching methods to various learning styles \\& requirements.
* Strong problem\\-solving and solution\\-seeking mindset.
* Openness to constructive feedback and continuous improvement.
* A sense of ownership, initiative, and drive for delivering high\\-quality teaching outcomes.



**Job Overview:**




**Working days:** 
 6 days a week
 



**Industry Type:** 
 Education / Training
 



**Department:** 
 CSE
 



**Education PG:** 
 M.Tech in CSE or (Computer Science relevant branches)

title: Data Scientist Intern
description:
**A Career is Built on Projects, Not Just Certificates.**

Singularis Software Technologies is aggressively recruiting **2024 Graduates** for a highly demanding, project\\-based **Advanced AI Internship**. This is a merit\\-only program for those serious about landing a high\\-paying role with MNCs in the Data Science and Generative AI domains.

The market for Data Science has rapidly evolved into **Generative AI** and **Production MLOps**. This internship is designed for the 2024 graduate who recognizes that basic, generic course certifications (Python, Pandas, simple ML) are no longer sufficient to secure top\\-tier MNC placements.

We are seeking candidates prepared to tackle production\\-grade AI challenges.

**Internship Responsibilities: Advanced Skill Requirements**

The intern will work on mission\\-critical, production\\-grade projects that necessitate deep expertise in the following:

**1\\. Generative AI (LLM) Implementation**

* Design and deploy end\\-to\\-end **RAG (Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation)** pipelines for customized enterprise solutions.
* Work with and fine\\-tune modern **Large Language Models (LLMs)** such as **Llama 3** and **Mistral**, moving beyond basic API consumption.
* Master advanced **Prompt Engineering** and model optimization techniques.

**2\\. MLOps, DL, \\& Data Engineering**

* Implement and query specialized **Vector Databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate)** for efficient unstructured data management (essential for RAG).
* Containerize models using **Docker** and manage deployment workflows using **Kubernetes** concepts.
* Utilize MLOps platforms like **AWS SageMaker** or **Azure ML Services** for CI/CD of models.
* Apply advanced **Deep Learning (DL)** frameworks (**PyTorch/TensorFlow**) for complex projects.
* Expert proficiency in **Python** (NumPy, Pandas) and complex **SQL**.

**Mandatory Qualifications \\& Screening Criteria**

* **Academic:** 2024 Pass\\-Out (B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA/M.Sc.) in a quantitative field.
* **Skill Demonstration:** Must provide a portfolio with demonstrable, hands\\-on experience in at least **two** of the following: **RAG Implementation, Vector Database Utilization,** or **LLM Fine\\-Tuning.**

**Career Development Advisory**

Due to the highly advanced and current skill requirements of this role, we understand that exceptional candidates may possess the aptitude but lack specific project experience in these newest domains.

If you are highly motivated and aiming for these elite roles but do not currently meet all the project\\-based requirements, you are encouraged to contact our team for a **Skill Gap Evaluation.** Our advisory team can help clarify the current industry standards.

Good Luck

title: Full Stack Developer

As a Full Stack Developer, you should be comfortable around both front\\-end and back\\-end coding languages, development frameworks and third\\-party libraries. You will be responsible to design, develop, and maintain fully\\-fledged and functioning platforms with databases or servers. title: Al developer
company: Fire Bee Techno Services Pvt Ltd
description:
**About the Role**

We are looking for a passionate and curious **AI Developer (Fresher)** to join our AI engineering team. The ideal candidate should have a good foundation in **programming**, a basic understanding of **machine learning and model training**, and hands\\-on exposure to **AI data pipelines** and **API\\-based AI integrations**.

This role is perfect for someone eager to work on **end\\-to\\-end AI solutions** — from **data preparation and feeding** to **model training, fine\\-tuning**, and **deployment** within production systems. You’ll collaborate with senior engineers and data scientists to build intelligent applications powered by AI.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Assist in **training, fine\\-tuning, and validating AI/ML models** using structured and unstructured datasets.
* Support the **data pipeline** process — data collection, cleaning, annotation, augmentation, and feeding into models.
* Work with teams to **integrate AI models** into web and mobile applications through **RESTful APIs** or SDKs.
* Collaborate on **experiment tracking**, **model evaluation**, and **performance optimization**.
* Implement **automated scripts** for dataset preparation, feature extraction, and training workflows.
* Contribute to **AI integration testing** and **deployment pipelines** using cloud\\-based AI tools.
* Stay current with emerging trends in **machine learning**, **deep learning**, and **AI frameworks**.

**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**

* **Bachelor’s degree** in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related field.
* Strong programming skills in **Python** (must\\-have) and familiarity with libraries like **NumPy**, **Pandas**, and **scikit\\-learn**.
* Basic understanding of **machine learning algorithms**, **model training**, and **evaluation metrics**.
* Exposure to **AI frameworks** such as **TensorFlow**, **Keras**, or **PyTorch**.
* Knowledge of **data preprocessing**, **data annotation**, and **AI data pipelines**.
* Familiarity with **AI API integrations** (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, Google Cloud AI, etc.).
* Good understanding of **RESTful APIs**, **JSON**, and backend service integration.
* Eagerness to learn and work in a fast\\-paced AI development environment.

**Preferred (Nice\\-to\\-Have) Skills**

* Experience with **LLM fine\\-tuning** (e.g., GPT, BERT) or **embedding\\-based retrieval systems**.
* Understanding of **prompt engineering** and **model evaluation techniques**.
* Exposure to **data labeling tools** and **AI dataset management** platforms.
* Knowledge of **AI ethics**, **model bias**, and **data privacy principles**.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: ₹12,542\\.70 \\- ₹59,853\\.77 per month

Work Location: In person

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software

engineers to deploy ML models into production environments.

* Automate model deployment pipelines using CI/CD tools for continuous

integration and delivery of machine learning models.

* Implement version control for ML models, datasets, and experiments (e.g., using

DVC, MLflow, or similar tools).

* Develop and maintain infrastructure for model training, validation, and

deployment using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* Support scaling and monitoring of deployed ML models, ensuring they meet

performance and reliability requirements in production.

* Set up and manage containerized environments for model deployment using

tools such as Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Develop and maintain monitoring tools to track model performance and data

drift in production environments.

* Implement and automate workflows for data preprocessing, model training,

testing, and versioning.

* Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to model deployment,

performance, or scalability.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to optimize model training pipelines

and ensure seamless integration with production systems.

* Keep up to date with the latest tools, technologies, and best practices in MLOps

and machine learning.

Requirements:

* Experience: 0\\-2 years of experience in MLOps, DevOps, data engineering, or

related fields.

* Familiarity with machine learning concepts and model deployment processes.
* Basic experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI) for automating

model deployment pipelines.

* Exposure to version control tools for ML (e.g., DVC, MLflow, Git).
* Proficiency in Python, including libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit\\-learn

for ML\\-related tasks.

* Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and container

orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Familiarity with model monitoring tools and understanding of concepts like

model drift and performance tracking.

* Knowledge of SQL and data pipeline technologies to handle and manipulate

large datasets.

* Strong problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on scalable and

efficient solutions.

* Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-

functional teams.

* Exposure to ML model deployment frameworks such as TensorFlow

Serving, Seldon, or TorchServe.

* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines and orchestration tools

like Kubeflow or Apache Airflow.

* Experience with data storage systems like Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or

databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.

* Knowledge of model versioning and management platforms like MLflow, Weights

\\& Biases, or ModelDB.

* Understanding of data security and privacy concerns in deploying machine

learning models.

* Experience with performance monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana,

or Datadog.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: ₹400,000\\.00 \\- ₹550,000\\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Paid time off

Work Location: In person

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***








*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.
   

  

**Job Role***
 We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.
 







***Roles \\& Responsibilities***





* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.
* Responsibility to adhere to set internal controls





***Desired Skills and Knowledge***





* **Performance Testing Tools** 
 : JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** 
 Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling** 
 : Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting** 
 : Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)** 
 : Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools** 
 : Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage** 
 : Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.





***Education***





* Bachelor of Technology
 *or equivalent degree.*





***Location:** 
  Hyderabad
   

**Freshers**
**Compensation:** 
 6 LPA

We are looking for a passionate and curious **AI Developer (Fresher)** to join our AI engineering team. The ideal candidate should have a good foundation in **programming**, a basic understanding of **machine learning and model training**, and hands\\-on exposure to **AI data pipelines** and **API\\-based AI integrations**.

You’ll collaborate with senior engineers and data scientists to build intelligent applications powered by AI.

**Key Responsibilities**

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software

engineers to deploy ML models into production environments.

* Automate model deployment pipelines using CI/CD tools for continuous

integration and delivery of machine learning models.

* Implement version control for ML models, datasets, and experiments (e.g., using

DVC, MLflow, or similar tools).

* Develop and maintain infrastructure for model training, validation, and

deployment using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* Support scaling and monitoring of deployed ML models, ensuring they meet

performance and reliability requirements in production.

* Set up and manage containerized environments for model deployment using

tools such as Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Develop and maintain monitoring tools to track model performance and data

drift in production environments.

* Implement and automate workflows for data preprocessing, model training,

testing, and versioning.

* Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to model deployment,

performance, or scalability.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to optimize model training pipelines

and ensure seamless integration with production systems.

* Keep up to date with the latest tools, technologies, and best practices in MLOps

and machine learning.

Requirements:

* Experience: 0\\-2 years of experience in MLOps, DevOps, data engineering, or

related fields.

* Familiarity with machine learning concepts and model deployment processes.
* Basic experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI) for automating

model deployment pipelines.

* Exposure to version control tools for ML (e.g., DVC, MLflow, Git).
* Proficiency in Python, including libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit\\-learn

for ML\\-related tasks.

* Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and container

orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Familiarity with model monitoring tools and understanding of concepts like

model drift and performance tracking.

* Knowledge of SQL and data pipeline technologies to handle and manipulate

large datasets.

* Strong problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on scalable and

efficient solutions.

* Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-

functional teams.

* Exposure to ML model deployment frameworks such as TensorFlow

Serving, Seldon, or TorchServe.

* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines and orchestration tools

like Kubeflow or Apache Airflow.

* Experience with data storage systems like Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or

databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.

* Knowledge of model versioning and management platforms like MLflow, Weights

\\& Biases, or ModelDB.

* Understanding of data security and privacy concerns in deploying machine

learning models.

* Experience with performance monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana,

or Datadog.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: ₹400,000\\.00 \\- ₹550,000\\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Paid time off

Work Location: In person

description:

title: LabVIEW Application Engineer
description:
GSK Technologies is a leading technology company specializing in the development and integration of advanced vision systems. We provide innovative solutions to various industries, including manufacturing, automotive, healthcare, and robotics. Our cutting\\-edge technologies enable our clients to optimize processes, improve efficiency, and enhance product quality.

Job Summary: We are seeking a talented and motivated Application Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an Application Engineer specializing in vision systems, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, and implementation of vision\\-based solutions for our clients. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including sales, engineering, and product management, to understand customer requirements and deliver tailored solutions that address their unique needs.

Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with sales and product management teams to identify customer requirements and translate them into technical specifications for vision system applications.
* Design, develop, and implement vision\\-based solutions using industry\\-leading technologies and tools.
* Conduct feasibility studies and proof\\-of\\-concept projects to demonstrate the capabilities and benefits of our vision systems.
* Provide technical support to customers, including troubleshooting, system integration, and training.
* Collaborate with the engineering team to optimize and enhance existing vision system products.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in vision system technologies, industry trends, and best practices.
* Participate in customer meetings, conferences, and trade shows to showcase our vision system capabilities.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Solid understanding of computer vision algorithms, image processing techniques, and machine learning.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or LabVIEW.
* Experience with vision system development tools and frameworks (e.g., OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Familiarity with hardware components used in vision systems, including cameras, lenses, and lighting.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non\\-technical audiences.
* Prior experience in a customer\\-facing role, providing technical support or solutions, is preferred.
* Knowledge of industry\\-specific applications of vision systems (e.g., robotics, quality control, inspection) is a plus.

Benefits:

* Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies and innovative projects.
* Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
* Professional development and training opportunities.
* Room for growth and advancement within the company.

Join our team and contribute to the development of groundbreaking vision systems that shape the future of various industries. Apply now and be part of our exciting journey!

As an Application Engineer specializing in vision systems, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, and implementation of vision\\-based solutions for our clients. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including sales, engineering, and product management, to understand customer requirements and deliver tailored solutions that address their unique needs.

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***

*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.*  

  

***Job Role***  

  

We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.

***Roles \\& Responsibilities***

* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.

***Desired Skills and Knowledge***

* **Performance Testing Tools**: JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling**: Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting**: Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)**: Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools**: Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage**: Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.

***Education***

* Bachelor of Technology *or equivalent degree.*

***Location:*** *Hyderabad*  

***Freshers***  

***Compensation:*** *6 LPA*  

***Website:*** *www.autorabit.com*

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***

*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.*  

  

***Job Role***  

  

We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.

***Roles \\& Responsibilities***

* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.

***Desired Skills and Knowledge***

* **Performance Testing Tools**: JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling**: Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting**: Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)**: Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools**: Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage**: Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.

***Education***

* Bachelor of Technology *or equivalent degree.*

***Location:*** *Hyderabad*  

***Freshers***  

***Compensation:*** *6 LPA*  

***Website:*** *www.autorabit.com*
