title: System Administrator / Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 System Administrator / Engineer
 



**Work Location:** 
 Bengaluru, Karnataka Experience Required: Fresher (0 Years)
 



**Salary Offered:** 
 ₹2\\.4 – ₹2\\.6 LPA
 



**Working Days:** 
 5 Days per Week
 



**Job Type:** 
 Full\\-Time \\| On Field
 



  





**About the Organization** 




 Skyway Technology is a leading provider of innovative IT infrastructure and system administration solutions. We specialize in helping organizations build secure, scalable, and high\\-performance network environments. Our mission is to empower businesses with reliable IT systems that drive efficiency and growth.
 



  





 We believe in continuous learning and collaboration, offering every team member the opportunity to work on challenging projects, grow their technical skills, and make a meaningful impact in the IT industry.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for an enthusiastic and technically driven System Administrator / Engineer (Fresher) to join our IT infrastructure team. This role is ideal for recent graduates who have a solid foundation in networking and system administration concepts and are eager to gain practical, on\\-field experience in managing IT systems and networks.
 



  





 You’ll be part of a hands\\-on environment that involves system setup, maintenance, troubleshooting, and client\\-site operations.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Install, configure, and maintain servers, operating systems, and enterprise software.
* Monitor system performance, diagnose issues, and implement timely solutions.
* Manage and maintain network infrastructure, including routers, switches, firewalls, and VPNs.
* Administer user accounts, access permissions, and security settings.
* Implement and test backup and disaster recovery systems to ensure data protection.
* Maintain accurate documentation for system configurations and troubleshooting steps.
* Provide technical support to end\\-users, addressing hardware and software issues.
* Assist with system upgrades, migrations, and technology rollouts.
* Conduct security audits and monitor systems for vulnerabilities.
* Stay updated on emerging IT tools and technologies to improve system reliability and security.



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications** 



* Strong understanding of Windows Server and/or Linux administration.
* Familiarity with networking concepts such as TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and routing.
* Basic knowledge of virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper\\-V, or similar).
* Awareness of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) is an added advantage.
* Hands\\-on knowledge of hardware configuration and troubleshooting.
* Ability to use scripting languages like PowerShell or Bash for automation tasks.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, communication, and time management skills.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field.
* Relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA Server\\+, CCNA, MCSE) will be a plus.



  





**Key Attributes** 



* Strong sense of responsibility and attention to detail.
* Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
* Team\\-oriented with a proactive and dependable approach.
* Comfortable with fieldwork and on\\-site technical support.



  





**Perks and Benefits** 



* Competitive salary package (₹2\\.4 – ₹2\\.6 LPA).
* Health and wellness benefits.
* Professional training and career development opportunities.
* Exposure to real\\-world IT infrastructure projects and client environments.



  





**Job Details** 



* Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka
* Job Type: Full\\-Time
* Working Days: Monday to Friday (5 Days)
* Eligibility: Only Freshers

title: Database Administrator
description:
A Database Administrator (DBA) is responsible for managing, maintaining, and securing an organization’s database systems to ensure optimal performance, data integrity, and security. They play a central role in ensuring that the company’s data is reliable, available, and efficiently organized for use in business operations and analytics.

Key Responsibilities

* Build, design, and implement database systems according to end\\-user requirements.
* Monitor database performance and tune queries for efficiency.
* Plan and execute backup and recovery operations to safeguard data.
* Maintain data security through access control, encryption, and regular updates.
* Install, configure, and upgrade database management systems (DBMS).
* Collaborate with developers and analysts to optimize database\\-driven applications and business intelligence solutions.
* Document database configurations, policies, and procedures.
* Troubleshoot data integrity and connectivity issues.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: ₹12,536\\.74 \\- ₹42,411\\.07 per month

* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

title: Maintenance Engineer
description:
**Position:** Maintenance Engineer  
**Location:** Ooty  
**Reports to:** Management

**Job Summary:**

The Maintenance Engineer is responsible for the upkeep, troubleshooting, and repair of all technical and mechanical systems within the resort. This includes maintaining power systems (generators, boilers, pressure motors), electrical and plumbing work, IT infrastructure (internet, routers, server room), and setting up event spaces such as banquet halls and intercom systems.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\\. Power \\& Mechanical Systems**

* Perform routine checks and maintenance on generators (gensets), boilers, and pressure motors.
* Troubleshoot and repair faults in mechanical systems.
* Ensure power backup systems are functioning properly at all times.

**2\\. Electrical \\& Wiring**

* Conduct electrical maintenance, including wiring, lighting, and power distribution around the resort.
* Troubleshoot and repair electrical faults to minimize downtime.
* Install and maintain electrical panels, breakers, and switches.

**3\\. Plumbing \\& Water Systems**

* Inspect and maintain plumbing systems, including water supply lines, drainage, and sewage.
* Repair leaks, blockages, and faulty fixtures in guest rooms and public areas.
* Ensure proper functioning of water pressure motors and heaters.

**4\\. IT \\& Networking**

* Set up and maintain internet routers and network infrastructure.
* Configure and manage the resort’s server room.
* Troubleshoot basic IT issues related to Wi\\-Fi, intercom, and communication systems.

**5\\. Event \\& Facility Setup**

* Set up electrical and audio\\-visual systems in banquet halls for events.
* Ensure intercom and public address systems are in working order.
* Assist in the maintenance of entertainment and security systems (CCTV, sound systems).

**Qualifications \\& Skills:**

* Diploma or Degree in Electrical, Mechanical, or IT Engineering.
* 2\\+ years of experience in maintenance roles, preferably in hospitality or resorts.
* Hands\\-on knowledge of gensets, boilers, pressure motors, electrical wiring, and IT networking.
* Ability to troubleshoot and resolve mechanical, electrical, and IT\\-related issues efficiently.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work under minimal supervision.
* Basic understanding of safety regulations and preventive maintenance techniques.

**Work Environment:**

* Requires working indoors and outdoors in all weather conditions.
* May involve lifting, climbing, and working at heights.
* Rotational shifts, including weekends and holidays, as per resort requirements.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher, Internship, Freelance, Volunteer

Pay: ₹15,000\\.00 \\- ₹44,678\\.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: Laptop Service Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** IT Support Engineer  
**Location:** Chennai  
**Job Type:** Full\\-time

**About Us:**  
We are a growing IT hardware service / electronics repair. company committed to delivering exceptional service to our customers. We are looking for a proactive **Laptop Service engineer** to join our team and ensure smooth scheduling, communication, and execution of service activities.

As a Laptop \\& Printer Service Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the optimal functionality and performance of laptops \\& Printers portable computing devices. This role requires a combination of technical expertise, problem\\-solving skills, and excellent customer service to diagnose and resolve hardware and software issues. You will work in a dynamic environment, collaborating with customers and colleagues to provide timely and effective solutions, making this role integral to the smooth operation of businesses and individuals who rely on Laptops \\& Printer for their work and personal needs.

* **On\\-Site Servicing:** In addition to servicing Laptop \\& Printer in a workshop or service centre, the Service Engineer may be required to travel to customer sites. This includes Stores, offices, or other locations where Laptops \\& Printers need servicing. While on\\-site, the engineer should maintain professionalism and adhere to safety protocols to ensure a positive customer experience.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Diagnosis and Troubleshooting:** Perform in\\-depth analysis to identify hardware and software problems in Laptops \\& Printers. Utilise diagnostic tools, manuals, and your technical knowledge to pinpoint issues accurately.
* **Repair and Maintenance:** Execute repairs, replacements, and upgrades for components, including but not limited to, processors, memory, hard drives, and batteries. Ensure all repairs meet quality standards.
* **Software Support:** Install, update, and configure operating systems, drivers, and software applications. Resolve software\\-related issues such as malware, viruses, and system crashes.
* **Data Backup and Recovery:** Implement data backup solutions and assist customers in recovering lost or corrupted data, ensuring data privacy and security.

**Qualifications:**

* A degree or diploma in computer science, electronics, or a related field is preferred.
* Proven experience as a Laptop or Printer service technician or a similar role in the IT industry.
* Proficiency in diagnosing and repairing Laptop \\& Printer hardware and software issues.

Freshers are also welcome with knowledge in Laptop or Printer hardware replacement. Free training will be provided for interested freshers.

deployment using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

performance and reliability requirements in production.

* Set up and manage containerized environments for model deployment using

tools such as Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Develop and maintain monitoring tools to track model performance and data

drift in production environments.

* Implement and automate workflows for data preprocessing, model training,

testing, and versioning.

* Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to model deployment,

performance, or scalability.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to optimize model training pipelines

and ensure seamless integration with production systems.

and machine learning.

related fields.

model deployment pipelines.

* Exposure to version control tools for ML (e.g., DVC, MLflow, Git).

for ML\\-related tasks.

* Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and container

orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Knowledge of SQL and data pipeline technologies to handle and manipulate

* Strong problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on scalable and

efficient solutions.

* Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-

functional teams.

Serving, Seldon, or TorchServe.

like Kubeflow or Apache Airflow.

learning models.

At **Neoverce IT Solutions LLP**, we craft high\\-performance web and mobile applications that fuel business growth and digital transformation.

If you’re passionate about building impactful digital products that make a difference, you’ll love working with us.

**Role Overview**

We’re looking for a **MERN Stack Developer** who’s excited to work on live projects, learn fast, and grow with a dynamic and forward\\-thinking team.  
This is a **full\\-time on\\-site role based in Surat** (remote options may be available for the right candidate).

**Why Join Neoverce**

* Performance\\-based growth and leadership opportunities

**How to Apply**

or apply directly through our job post.

Let’s build the next wave of digital innovation — together.

description:
**Job Title:** IT Support Engineer  
**Location:** Chennai  
**Job Type:** Full\\-time

**About Us:**  
We are a growing IT hardware service / electronics repair. company committed to delivering exceptional service to our customers. We are looking for a proactive **Laptop Service engineer** to join our team and ensure smooth scheduling, communication, and execution of service activities.

As a Laptop \\& Printer Service Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the optimal functionality and performance of laptops \\& Printers portable computing devices. This role requires a combination of technical expertise, problem\\-solving skills, and excellent customer service to diagnose and resolve hardware and software issues. You will work in a dynamic environment, collaborating with customers and colleagues to provide timely and effective solutions, making this role integral to the smooth operation of businesses and individuals who rely on Laptops \\& Printer for their work and personal needs.

* **On\\-Site Servicing:** In addition to servicing Laptop \\& Printer in a workshop or service centre, the Service Engineer may be required to travel to customer sites. This includes Stores, offices, or other locations where Laptops \\& Printers need servicing. While on\\-site, the engineer should maintain professionalism and adhere to safety protocols to ensure a positive customer experience.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Diagnosis and Troubleshooting:** Perform in\\-depth analysis to identify hardware and software problems in Laptops \\& Printers. Utilise diagnostic tools, manuals, and your technical knowledge to pinpoint issues accurately.
* **Repair and Maintenance:** Execute repairs, replacements, and upgrades for components, including but not limited to, processors, memory, hard drives, and batteries. Ensure all repairs meet quality standards.
* **Software Support:** Install, update, and configure operating systems, drivers, and software applications. Resolve software\\-related issues such as malware, viruses, and system crashes.
* **Data Backup and Recovery:** Implement data backup solutions and assist customers in recovering lost or corrupted data, ensuring data privacy and security.

**Qualifications:**

* A degree or diploma in computer science, electronics, or a related field is preferred.
* Proven experience as a Laptop or Printer service technician or a similar role in the IT industry.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software

engineers to deploy ML models into production environments.

* Automate model deployment pipelines using CI/CD tools for continuous

integration and delivery of machine learning models.

* Implement version control for ML models, datasets, and experiments (e.g., using

DVC, MLflow, or similar tools).

* Develop and maintain infrastructure for model training, validation, and

deployment using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* Support scaling and monitoring of deployed ML models, ensuring they meet

performance and reliability requirements in production.

* Set up and manage containerized environments for model deployment using

tools such as Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Develop and maintain monitoring tools to track model performance and data

drift in production environments.

* Implement and automate workflows for data preprocessing, model training,

testing, and versioning.

* Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to model deployment,

performance, or scalability.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to optimize model training pipelines

and ensure seamless integration with production systems.

* Keep up to date with the latest tools, technologies, and best practices in MLOps

and machine learning.

Requirements:

* Experience: 0\\-2 years of experience in MLOps, DevOps, data engineering, or

related fields.

* Familiarity with machine learning concepts and model deployment processes.
* Basic experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI) for automating

model deployment pipelines.

* Exposure to version control tools for ML (e.g., DVC, MLflow, Git).
* Proficiency in Python, including libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit\\-learn

for ML\\-related tasks.

* Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and container

orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

* Familiarity with model monitoring tools and understanding of concepts like

model drift and performance tracking.

* Knowledge of SQL and data pipeline technologies to handle and manipulate

large datasets.

* Strong problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on scalable and

efficient solutions.

* Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-

functional teams.

* Exposure to ML model deployment frameworks such as TensorFlow

Serving, Seldon, or TorchServe.

* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines and orchestration tools

like Kubeflow or Apache Airflow.

* Experience with data storage systems like Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or

databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.

* Knowledge of model versioning and management platforms like MLflow, Weights

\\& Biases, or ModelDB.

* Understanding of data security and privacy concerns in deploying machine

learning models.

* Experience with performance monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana,

or Datadog.

title: Maintenance Engineer
description:
**Position:** Maintenance Engineer  
**Location:** Ooty  
**Reports to:** Management

**Job Summary:**

The Maintenance Engineer is responsible for the upkeep, troubleshooting, and repair of all technical and mechanical systems within the resort. This includes maintaining power systems (generators, boilers, pressure motors), electrical and plumbing work, IT infrastructure (internet, routers, server room), and setting up event spaces such as banquet halls and intercom systems.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\\. Power \\& Mechanical Systems**

* Perform routine checks and maintenance on generators (gensets), boilers, and pressure motors.
* Troubleshoot and repair faults in mechanical systems.
* Ensure power backup systems are functioning properly at all times.

**2\\. Electrical \\& Wiring**

* Conduct electrical maintenance, including wiring, lighting, and power distribution around the resort.
* Troubleshoot and repair electrical faults to minimize downtime.
* Install and maintain electrical panels, breakers, and switches.

**3\\. Plumbing \\& Water Systems**

* Inspect and maintain plumbing systems, including water supply lines, drainage, and sewage.
* Repair leaks, blockages, and faulty fixtures in guest rooms and public areas.
* Ensure proper functioning of water pressure motors and heaters.

**4\\. IT \\& Networking**

* Set up and maintain internet routers and network infrastructure.
* Configure and manage the resort’s server room.
* Troubleshoot basic IT issues related to Wi\\-Fi, intercom, and communication systems.

**5\\. Event \\& Facility Setup**

* Set up electrical and audio\\-visual systems in banquet halls for events.
* Ensure intercom and public address systems are in working order.
* Assist in the maintenance of entertainment and security systems (CCTV, sound systems).

**Qualifications \\& Skills:**

* Diploma or Degree in Electrical, Mechanical, or IT Engineering.
* 2\\+ years of experience in maintenance roles, preferably in hospitality or resorts.
* Hands\\-on knowledge of gensets, boilers, pressure motors, electrical wiring, and IT networking.
* Ability to troubleshoot and resolve mechanical, electrical, and IT\\-related issues efficiently.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work under minimal supervision.
* Basic understanding of safety regulations and preventive maintenance techniques.

**Work Environment:**

* Requires working indoors and outdoors in all weather conditions.
* May involve lifting, climbing, and working at heights.
* Rotational shifts, including weekends and holidays, as per resort requirements.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher, Internship, Freelance, Volunteer

Pay: ₹15,000\\.00 \\- ₹44,678\\.00 per month

description:
**Company Overview**

At **Neoverce IT Solutions LLP**, we craft high\\-performance web and mobile applications that fuel business growth and digital transformation.  
We specialize in **React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and React Native**, delivering modern, scalable, and future\\-ready software solutions.

From AI\\-powered automation to enterprise\\-grade cloud systems — we turn bold ideas into reliable products with **precision, speed, and innovation** at the core.  
If you’re passionate about building impactful digital products that make a difference, you’ll love working with us.

**Role Overview**

We’re looking for a **MERN Stack Developer** who’s excited to work on live projects, learn fast, and grow with a dynamic and forward\\-thinking team.  
This is a **full\\-time on\\-site role based in Surat** (remote options may be available for the right candidate).

You’ll be responsible for developing and maintaining full\\-stack web applications using the **MERN stack** — building new features, ensuring top performance, and delivering seamless user experiences.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design, develop, and deploy scalable web applications using **MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js**

* Integrate APIs, handle data flow, and ensure application security
* Participate in **code reviews, version control (Git)**, and Agile sprint cycles

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***

*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.*  

  

***Job Role***  

  

We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.

***Roles \\& Responsibilities***

* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.

***Desired Skills and Knowledge***

* **Performance Testing Tools**: JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling**: Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting**: Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)**: Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools**: Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage**: Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.

***Education***

* Bachelor of Technology *or equivalent degree.*

***Location:*** *Hyderabad*  

***Freshers***  

***Compensation:*** *6 LPA*  

***Website:*** *www.autorabit.com*

title: Technical Support Executive
description:
The **Technical Support Executive** will be responsible for providing end\\-to\\-end technical assistance, maintaining system efficiency, and ensuring smooth operation of hardware and software systems. The ideal candidate will be proactive in diagnosing issues, performing updates, and supporting users both on\\-site and remotely to ensure uninterrupted technical functionality.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **System Testing \\& Configuration:** Conduct testing and validation of system configurations to ensure operational efficiency and compliance with organizational standards.
* **Hardware Support:** Install, maintain, and troubleshoot desktops, laptops, peripherals, and related hardware components.
* **Software Maintenance:** Manage installation, updates, and configuration of software applications; ensure timely upgrades for security and performance optimization.
* **User Support:** Provide prompt technical assistance to end\\-users and resolve hardware/software\\-related queries efficiently.
* **Documentation:** Maintain detailed logs of support activities, configurations, and issue resolutions for future reference.
* **Troubleshooting:** Diagnose and resolve technical issues—both hardware and software—through systematic analysis and effective solutions.
* **Collaboration:** Coordinate with the IT and operations teams to ensure seamless system performance and minimal downtime.

**Qualifications:**

* **Experience:** 1 years of experience in a technical support or IT helpdesk role (preferably with on\\-site support exposure). **Freshers may also apply.**
* **Technical Knowledge:** Strong understanding of computer hardware, system configurations, and operating systems.
* **Software Skills:** Proficiency in software installation, updates, and troubleshooting.
* **Networking:** Basic knowledge of network configuration and connectivity troubleshooting.
* **Problem\\-Solving:** Excellent analytical and diagnostic abilities with a customer\\-first mindset.
* **Communication:** Effective verbal and written communication skills to interact with team members and clients.
* **Availability:** Willingness to provide on\\-site and remote support as required by operational needs.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Diploma or certification in Computer Science, IT, or related technical field.
* Industry certifications such as **CompTIA A\\+, Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP), or CCNA** are an advantage.
* Experience in **network setup, device configuration, and system monitoring tools.**

title: Immigration Consultant
description:
**Job Title:** Immigration Consultant (Sales)

**Location:** WeWork, Berger Delhi One, Sector 16 B, Noida UP  
**Employment Type:** Full\\-time  
**Industry:** International and Corporate Immigration  
**Company:** WeAbide® Immigration Service Pvt Ltd  
**Website:** www.theweabide.com  
**Email:**  nikhil@theweabide.com

**About WeAbide®**

WeAbide® is a trusted leader in international education and immigration solutions, driven by a team of seasoned immigration lawyers, education advisors, IT professionals, and client service experts. Our mission is to deliver personalized and transparent immigration services tailored to the aspirations of professionals, students, and corporate partners across Australia, Canada, the US, and the UK. For over a decade, we have empowered thousands of individuals and businesses through our commitment to excellence and integrity.

**Position Overview**

We are seeking a dynamic, motivated, and results\\-driven **Immigration Consultant (Sales)** to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for client service and a strong understanding of immigration pathways and policies. This role focuses on identifying and converting leads, guiding clients through our service offerings, and ensuring a smooth onboarding experience for individuals seeking migration opportunities.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Engage with prospective clients via calls, emails, in\\-person consultations, and digital platforms
* Assess client needs and recommend appropriate immigration services
* Present WeAbide®’s offerings clearly and confidently to drive conversions
* Follow up on leads and nurture long\\-term client relationships
* Maintain accurate records of all client interactions using CRM systems
* Coordinate with internal departments (legal, counseling, case management) to ensure client satisfaction
* Keep updated on changes in immigration policies across Australia, Canada, the US, and the UK
* Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets

**Key Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
* 0\\-3 years of experience in immigration consulting, sales, or client relationship management (preferred)
* Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
* Understanding of international immigration and education markets is a plus
* Tech\\-savvy with knowledge of CRM and productivity tools
* Passion for helping clients achieve life\\-changing opportunities
* Self\\-motivated, goal\\-oriented, and team\\-focused

**What We Offer**

* Competitive salary and performance\\-based incentives
* Ongoing training and professional development
* Collaborative and supportive work environment
* Opportunity to work with a respected brand and industry experts
* Career growth within an expanding international company

**Training for Immigration Consultant (Sales) Trainees**

At WeAbide®, we value enthusiasm and potential over prior experience in immigration. We welcome freshers and professionals from non\\-immigration backgrounds who are eager to build a rewarding career in international education and migration services.

While you may already have a basic understanding of immigration systems in countries such as Australia, Canada, the US, or the UK, our structured 3\\-month hands\\-on training program is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to succeed as an Immigration Executive.

**Training Highlights:**

* **Immigration Law Basics** (Australia, Canada, US, UK)
* **Sales Techniques \\& Client Communication**
* **CRM \\& Technology Tools for Lead Management**
* **Case Handling and Client Engagement Strategies**

**Post\\-Training Opportunity:**

* Based on your performance and skill development, you may be offered a full\\-time permanent position.
* Salary post\\-training will range from ₹18,000 to ₹45,000 per month plus incentives, depending on your capabilities and results.

This is a unique opportunity to launch your career in a fast\\-growing sector with full support from a team of seasoned professionals.

**Join Us**

If you're ready to be part of a mission\\-driven team making a global impact, **apply today** and help shape the future of international talent mobility with **WeAbide®**.

title: Content Writer
description:
If life gives you lemons, and you make a strategy to sell it on social media, Lemon Yellow is the place for you. If you believe in the power of social media to influence, we need your influence at Lemon Yellow. We are looking for a Content Marketing Executive who understands the world of social media algorithms and goes beyond it to churn out quality content.

**Content Strategy \\& Creation**

* Develop and implement a content strategy for social media channels that reflects Lemon Yellow and its client's voice and meets audience needs.
* Ideate original and out\\-of\\-the\\-box content across various formats (posts, videos, reels, stories, showreels, etc.).
* Maintain a balance between trend\\-driven content and LY's core communication goals in line with the brand book.
* Contribute to UX writing for clients’ websites and apps, ensuring clarity and consistency that positively impacts the overall user experience.
* Support additional content needs such as writing blogs for LY's website and clients, as required.

**Support for Internal Teams**

* Assist teams like HR, Business, and UX with content for internal communication and external campaigns, ensuring consistency in tone, clarity, and brand alignment.

**Trend Analysis \\& Social Media Expertise**

* Monitor market trends and audience behavior to leverage them creatively for content creation.
* Stay updated with platform algorithms, best posting practices, and emerging social platforms.
* Identify opportunities in the social media landscape and assess their fit with LY's identity.

**Content Quality \\& Community Management**

* Review all content for grammatical accuracy, visual consistency, and brand alignment.
* Ensure pixel\\-perfect output with attention to every detail, tone, and visual element.
* Engage with the online community – respond to comments, DMs, and build rapport with followers.

**Performance Analysis \\& Reporting**

* Track and analyze post\\-performance, engagement, and reach across platforms.
* Create insightful weekly/monthly reports with data\\-backed observations and recommendations for improvement.

**Team Collaboration \\& Time Management**

* Work closely with designers, TLs, and digital marketing team members to develop and execute campaigns.
* Coordinate project timelines and ensure deadlines are adhered to by all involved stakeholders.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum **1 year of professional experience** in content creation.
* A Bachelor's degree in **Literature, Communication, Journalism, or Advertising**.
* **Exceptional communication and writing skills** with a strong grasp of grammar and storytelling.
* Familiarity with analytics tools such as Meta Insights, Instagram Analytics, LinkedIn Analytics, etc.
* Knowledge of paid social media campaigns and budget utilization will be an added advantage.
* Ability to multitask and manage timelines in a fast\\-paced, creative environment.
* Self\\-starter with a proactive attitude and a collaborative spirit.

**What are we offering?**

**Experience :** A chance for you to work with us on some of the best and up\\-and\\-coming products and services. Variety is the spice of Lemon Yellow’s portfolio \\- so you’ll get to test your content skills across industries.  
**Exposure :** An opportunity to be the voice of the agency. Your observations, strategies, and content will determine and portray who Lemon Yellow is across channels. Your creativity is what will be seen as our creativity.  
**Empathy:** We have a carefully curated culture that promotes 2 things: fun \\& fulfilment. Your welfare \\- personal, professional, mental, and physical \\- becomes our responsibility. From Fitness Thursdays to Learning Saturdays, we try to make you laugh \\& learn.

**Who are we?**  
Lemon Yellow LLP is a user\\-centered UI/UX design agency, based out of Thane, Maharashtra. With international operations, an experienced mentorship, and a passionate team \\- our aim is to design digital happiness. If you also believe in writing content that will make the lives of users all around easier, this is the right place for you.

title: SEO Intern
description:
**Job Title:** SEO Intern  
**Company:** WebCoir  
**Location:** B 135, Block B, Noida sector 2  
**Job Type:** Internship (Full\\-Time/Part\\-Time)

**About WebCoir:**  
WebCoir is a leading digital marketing agency dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that help businesses achieve their digital marketing goals. We specialize in SEO, web design, and development services aimed at enhancing online visibility and growth. We are looking for a motivated **SEO Intern** to join our team and help with search engine optimization tasks, offering you valuable learning experiences and hands\\-on exposure to the SEO world.

**Job Overview:**  
As an **SEO Intern** at WebCoir, you will have the opportunity to learn the fundamentals of SEO and digital marketing while assisting the team in improving the search engine rankings of client websites. You will work closely with experienced SEO professionals, gaining practical insights into keyword research, content optimization, and performance tracking. This internship is designed to help you develop a solid foundation in SEO and digital marketing, even if you're just starting your career.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Keyword Research:** Assist with identifying relevant keywords for optimization using SEO tools like Google Keyword Planner, SEMrush, etc.
* **On\\-Page SEO:** Support the team in optimizing website content, titles, meta tags, and images for better search engine visibility.
* **Content Optimization:** Help optimize website content, blog posts, and landing pages for SEO, ensuring they align with the best practices for rankings.
* **SEO Audits:** Assist in conducting website audits to find areas for improvement and help implement recommendations.
* **Link Building:** Help identify potential backlink opportunities and assist in outreach efforts for link building.
* **SEO Reporting:** Assist with gathering data from SEO tools like Google Analytics and Google Search Console to help prepare performance reports.
* **Competitor Research:** Help analyze competitors’ websites to understand their SEO strategies and identify areas where we can improve.
* **Learn SEO Best Practices:** Keep up with the latest SEO trends, industry updates, and search engine algorithm changes.

**Qualifications:**

* **Fresher** or recent graduate with a degree in Marketing, Business, IT, or a related field.
* Basic understanding of SEO concepts and how search engines work (e.g., keywords, SERPs, ranking factors).
* Strong interest in digital marketing and SEO, with a desire to learn and grow in the field.
* Familiarity with SEO tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, or SEMrush is a plus but not mandatory.
* Good communication skills (both written and verbal).
* Attention to detail and a willingness to learn.
* Ability to work in a team and handle tasks independently.
* Basic knowledge of HTML and web design is a bonus but not essential.

description:
**Experience:** 0–2 Years

**Location:** Kormangala, Bangalore, India

**About Us: BIG AIR LAB** is a cutting\\-edge AI startup dedicated to pioneering transformative solutions in enterprise automation and predictive analytics, challenging the status quo, and building the future of intelligence through innovative technology and a relentless pursuit of excellence. We need an enthusiastic and meticulous individual to ensure our physical office environment operates flawlessly, supporting employee productivity and maintaining our vibrant company culture.

**Why Join BIG AIR LAB?**

* **Be the Engine:** You will be the central point ensuring our state\\-of\\-the\\-art office runs smoothly, directly impacting the daily efficiency and morale of our world\\-class engineering and AI teams.
* **Culture Curator:** You will be the face of our office, responsible for the initial impression and ongoing experience that defines our collaborative and fast\\-moving startup culture.
* **Ownership and Growth:** This is a high\\-autonomy role where you’ll own core operational processes, offering rapid professional development and cross\\-functional exposure in a leading AI company.
* **Modern Environment:** Help manage a dynamic and supportive workspace that is essential to our innovation and speed.

**Role Overview**

The Administrative Assistant is responsible for the overall smooth functioning and aesthetic of the office environment. This role is a critical front\\-of\\-house position, requiring exceptional interpersonal skills to manage visitors, vendors, and staff needs while maintaining meticulous organization of supplies, facilities, and physical logistics.

**Key Responsibilities**

1\\. Office and Facility Management

* Serve as the first point of contact for all visitors, ensuring a welcoming and secure environment, and managing the reception area.
* Oversee the daily condition of the office (cleanliness, maintenance, common areas), identifying and addressing facility issues promptly.
* Manage the office budget for non\\-IT consumables, ordering, tracking inventory, and ensuring all pantry, stationery, and utility supplies are stocked and organized.
* Coordinate incoming and outgoing mail, courier services, and local delivery logistics.

2\\. Vendor and Financial Administration

* Act as the primary liaison for key office vendors, including catering, cleaning services, facility maintenance, and security.
* Manage vendor invoices, verify service delivery, and submit documentation for timely processing to the finance team.
* Handle petty cash administration and reconciliation for minor office expenses.

3\\. Employee Logistics and Support

* Directly support employee onboarding by preparing workspaces, coordinating the setup of new desks, monitors, and basic equipment with the IT team.
* Schedule and prepare meeting rooms, ensuring AV equipment is operational for internal meetings and external client calls.
* Assist in organizing internal events, weekly team lunches, and company\\-wide celebrations.
* Process basic travel and accommodation bookings for executives and staff as needed.

**Required Qualifications**

* 0–2 years of hands\\-on experience in office administration, front desk, or a facility support role, preferably within a startup setting.
* Excellent professional communication skills (written and verbal) with a customer\\-service orientation.
* Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office/Google Workspace, particularly spreadsheets for inventory tracking and calendaring.
* Demonstrated ability to multitask, prioritize tasks efficiently, and problem\\-solve under pressure in a fast\\-paced setting.
* A proactive mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics, ensuring the office consistently presents a professional image.

**Competitive Benefits**

* Highly competitive salary package with performance\\-based incentives.
* Health \\& Wellness coverage
* Work\\-Life Balance with Generous Paid Time Off (PTO) package.
* Excellent Work Culture

title: Sales Associate
description:
**Business Development Associate**

We are looking for passionate individuals to drive business growth, build strong client relationships, and to contribute to revenue expansion through strategic sales efforts.

**About Us:**  
At Bhanzu, our mission is to make math engaging, sparking curiosity and confidence in young learners. Bhanzu has successfully raised a $16\\.5M Series B funding round, led by Epiq Capital, with support from Z3Partners! We are changing the way math is learned and are blossoming into India's leading math education company, positively impacting students across 15\\+ countries. Through Bhanzu, we aim to eradicate Math Phobia across this globe, and enable our students to pursue careers in Stem Fields, Coding, Analytics, AI and much more by ensuring their core math fundamentals are strong.

**About the Founder \\& CEO \\- Neelakantha Bhanu**  
Neelakantha Bhanu Prakash is the world's fastest human calculator and India’s mental math Olympic Gold Medalist. Alongside holding four world records and 50 Limca book records, Mr.Bhanu is also a TEDx speaker and educator. He believes that the skill he has been gifted with can be passed on and taught using the right methodology and initiates in the same direction. Giving his vision of completely eradicating Math phobia a headstart Mr.Bhanu has led numerous projects for developing Arithmetic skills in students across the globe.  
He has addressed audiences across 23 countries at the CommonWealth Conclaves, Future city Summits, ISB, IITs, and Multiple other global institutions and meets about the importance of Arithmetic learning in the overall development of a child.

**JOB DESCRIPTION**

As a Business Development Associate at Bhanzu, you will play a key role in driving the

improvement.

efforts.

**Desired Candidate Profile**  
● Bachelor’s degree in any discipline (recent graduates encouraged to apply).

● Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities.  
● High level of enthusiasm and self\\-motivation.  
● Ability to work independently as well as in a team.

title: Content Writer
description:
If life gives you lemons, and you make a strategy to sell it on social media, Lemon Yellow is the place for you. If you believe in the power of social media to influence, we need your influence at Lemon Yellow. We are looking for a Content Marketing Executive who understands the world of social media algorithms and goes beyond it to churn out quality content.

**Content Strategy \\& Creation**

* Develop and implement a content strategy for social media channels that reflects Lemon Yellow and its client's voice and meets audience needs.
* Ideate original and out\\-of\\-the\\-box content across various formats (posts, videos, reels, stories, showreels, etc.).
* Maintain a balance between trend\\-driven content and LY's core communication goals in line with the brand book.
* Contribute to UX writing for clients’ websites and apps, ensuring clarity and consistency that positively impacts the overall user experience.
* Support additional content needs such as writing blogs for LY's website and clients, as required.

**Support for Internal Teams**

* Assist teams like HR, Business, and UX with content for internal communication and external campaigns, ensuring consistency in tone, clarity, and brand alignment.

**Trend Analysis \\& Social Media Expertise**

* Monitor market trends and audience behavior to leverage them creatively for content creation.
* Stay updated with platform algorithms, best posting practices, and emerging social platforms.
* Identify opportunities in the social media landscape and assess their fit with LY's identity.

**Content Quality \\& Community Management**

* Review all content for grammatical accuracy, visual consistency, and brand alignment.
* Ensure pixel\\-perfect output with attention to every detail, tone, and visual element.
* Engage with the online community – respond to comments, DMs, and build rapport with followers.

**Performance Analysis \\& Reporting**

* Track and analyze post\\-performance, engagement, and reach across platforms.
* Create insightful weekly/monthly reports with data\\-backed observations and recommendations for improvement.

**Team Collaboration \\& Time Management**

* Work closely with designers, TLs, and digital marketing team members to develop and execute campaigns.
* Coordinate project timelines and ensure deadlines are adhered to by all involved stakeholders.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum **1 year of professional experience** in content creation.
* A Bachelor's degree in **Literature, Communication, Journalism, or Advertising**.
* **Exceptional communication and writing skills** with a strong grasp of grammar and storytelling.
* Familiarity with analytics tools such as Meta Insights, Instagram Analytics, LinkedIn Analytics, etc.
* Knowledge of paid social media campaigns and budget utilization will be an added advantage.
* Ability to multitask and manage timelines in a fast\\-paced, creative environment.
* Self\\-starter with a proactive attitude and a collaborative spirit.

**What are we offering?**

**Experience :** A chance for you to work with us on some of the best and up\\-and\\-coming products and services. Variety is the spice of Lemon Yellow’s portfolio \\- so you’ll get to test your content skills across industries.  
**Exposure :** An opportunity to be the voice of the agency. Your observations, strategies, and content will determine and portray who Lemon Yellow is across channels. Your creativity is what will be seen as our creativity.  
**Empathy:** We have a carefully curated culture that promotes 2 things: fun \\& fulfilment. Your welfare \\- personal, professional, mental, and physical \\- becomes our responsibility. From Fitness Thursdays to Learning Saturdays, we try to make you laugh \\& learn.

**Who are we?**  
Lemon Yellow LLP is a user\\-centered UI/UX design agency, based out of Thane, Maharashtra. With international operations, an experienced mentorship, and a passionate team \\- our aim is to design digital happiness. If you also believe in writing content that will make the lives of users all around easier, this is the right place for you.

title: Junior Technical Trainer
description:
RoboPleX is an innovative EdTech company dedicated to providing **Robotics, STEM, and AI** education to schools, colleges, and professionals. We focus on **hands\\-on learning** and interactive training sessions to help students develop essential **technical and problem\\-solving skills** in alignment with modern educational standards.

**Job Overview**

The **Junior Technical Trainer** will play a key role in delivering **basic\\-level training programs** on **Robotics, AI, STEM, and Coding** in schools. This role is ideal for **freshers or candidates with 0–1 year of experience** who are eager to gain practical exposure in **technical training** and **STEM education**.

The **primary focus** of this role is **assisting senior trainers**, conducting **introductory\\-level sessions**, and **supporting students** with hands\\-on learning activities. Candidates with **basic knowledge** in **at least one or two technical domains** such as Robotics, Electronics, Programming, or AI are encouraged to apply.

**Job Location :** Khidderpore, Kolkata \\- West Bengal

**Key Roles \\& Responsibilities in Training Support \\& Classroom Engagement**

* Assist **Senior Technical Trainers** in conducting robotics and STEM training sessions in schools.
* Deliver **fundamental\\-level** workshops on Robotics, AI, and Coding for school students.
* Simplify **basic technical concepts** for younger learners and engage them in hands\\-on activities.
* Monitor student participation and assist them in understanding technical exercises.

**Technical Skills \\& Hands\\-on Learning**

Junior trainers will focus on **one or more of the following technical areas** based on their expertise:

* **Basic Robotics \\& Electronics** – Understanding simple circuits, sensors, and motors.
* **Programming Fundamentals** – Introducing block\\-based coding (Scratch) and basic Python/Arduino programming.
* **3D Designing \\& Prototyping** – Introduction to CAD tools and simple robotic designs.
* **Artificial Intelligence \\& IoT Basics** – Teaching AI concepts like image recognition and simple IoT applications.
* **STEM\\-Based Problem Solving** – Helping students apply math and science principles in practical projects.

**Collaboration \\& Teamwork**

* Work closely with **Senior Technical Trainers** to improve delivery methods and learning outcomes.
* Coordinate with the **Training, Business Development, and Operations teams** to ensure smooth execution of training programs.
* Provide **feedback** to senior trainers regarding student performance and engagement.

**Technical \\& Logistical Support**

* Assist in setting up robotics labs and **managing training kits** during sessions.
* Provide **basic troubleshooting** for microcontrollers, sensors, and coding errors.
* Help maintain training materials and student progress reports.

**Event \\& Workshop Participation**

* Represent RoboPleX in **school events, STEM fairs, and interactive workshops.**
* Engage with students and teachers to create awareness about **Robotics \\& STEM education.**
* Stay updated on new developments in Robotics and Coding to **enhance training effectiveness.**

**Qualifications \\& Skills Educational Background**

* Bachelor’s degree in **Engineering, Computer Science, Electronics, Mechatronics, or any STEM\\-related field.**
* Candidates with STEM\\-based **certifications** or **internship experience** will be given preference.

**Technical Skills (Basic Knowledge in at Least One or Two)**

* **Programming:** Familiarity with **Scratch, Python, or Arduino** for robotics applications.
* **Robotics \\& Electronics:** Basic understanding of microcontrollers (Arduino, Raspberry Pi) and sensors.
* **3D Designing:** Exposure to CAD tools like TinkerCad or Fusion 360\\.
* **Artificial Intelligence \\& IoT:** Basic understanding of AI concepts and simple IoT applications.

**Soft Skills \\& Training Abilities**

* Strong **communication skills** with the ability to simplify technical concepts.
* Passion for **teaching and mentoring school students** in an interactive environment.
* Ability to work in **team\\-based environments** with **senior trainers and school authorities.**

**Preferred Experience**

* **0–1 year of experience** in STEM training, robotics education, or technical teaching.
* Internship or **academic projects in Robotics, AI, or STEM\\-based problem solving.**
* Prior experience in **mentoring students or participating in STEM\\-related competitions.**

**Why Join RoboPleX?**

* Work in a **dynamic learning environment** with exposure to **cutting\\-edge robotics \\& AI technologies.**
* Gain **hands\\-on training experience** while working with experienced professionals.
* Opportunities for **career growth** and **advanced technical training**.
* Competitive salary with performance\\-based incentives.

**Key Differences from Senior Technical Trainer Role**

✅ **Junior trainers assist senior trainers**, while **senior trainers lead sessions independently**.  
✅ Focus is on **fundamental\\-level training**, while senior trainers handle **advanced modules**.  
✅ **0–1 year of experience required**, while senior trainers need **3\\+ years**.  
✅ Junior trainers work more on **student engagement and support**, while seniors focus on **curriculum development**.  
✅ **Emphasis on learning and professional growth** for freshers rather than advanced expertise.

**Application Process :** Candidates, focusing on professional career\\-growth are invited to call at **7044461340** \\& send their updated resumes also to **hr@roboplexworld.com**.

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps.

title: Senior Technical Trainer
description:
RoboPleX is a pioneering EdTech company dedicated to providing Robotics, STEM, and AI education to schools, colleges, and professionals. Through hands\\-on training programs, we equip students with essential technical skills that align with the latest ICSE curriculum and industry standards.

**Job Overview**

We are looking for an experienced **Senior Technical Trainer** to lead **In\\-School Training Programs**, delivering hands\\-on learning sessions in Robotics, AI, IoT, and STEM education. The ideal candidate should have a strong technical background, excellent teaching skills, and the ability to engage students effectively. This role requires expertise in multiple domains, including Robotics, Electronics, Coding, AI, and 3D Designing.

**Key Roles \\& ResponsibilitiesTraining Delivery \\& Curriculum Implementation**

* Conduct engaging, hands\\-on training sessions for school students on Robotics, STEM, and AI topics.
* Implement structured lesson plans and practical exercises aligned with RoboPleX’s curriculum.
* Ensure effective student learning through interactive workshops, live projects, and real\\-world applications.

**Technical Instruction \\& Subject Expertise**

* **Fundamentals of Robotics:** Teach mechanical structures, sensors, and actuators.
* **Electronics \\& Circuit Design:** Guide students in working with microcontrollers, sensors, and circuits.
* **Programming \\& Automation:** Train students in block\\-based (Scratch) and text\\-based (Python, Arduino) coding.
* **Artificial Intelligence \\& Machine Learning:** Introduce AI concepts, image recognition, and real\\-world applications.
* **3D Designing \\& Prototyping:** Assist students in using CAD tools for designing and prototyping robotic models.
* **Internet of Things (IoT):** Demonstrate smart devices, data communication, and real\\-time applications.
* **Drone \\& Automation Technology:** Explain drone mechanics, navigation, and automation principles.
* **Robotic Arm \\& Humanoid Development:** Train students in building and programming robotic arms and humanoid robots.
* **STEM\\-Based Problem Solving:** Encourage project\\-based learning integrating science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

**Collaboration with School Authorities \\& Faculty**

* Work closely with school teachers and administrators to integrate RoboPleX training into the academic framework.
* Customize training modules to align with the school’s curriculum and learning objectives.
* Provide guidance on implementing robotics labs and STEM learning spaces within schools.

**Evaluation \\& Student Engagement**

* Assess student performance through quizzes, projects, and interactive activities.
* Provide constructive feedback to students, encouraging problem\\-solving and innovation.
* Maintain high engagement levels to foster creativity and enthusiasm for technology.

**Technical Support \\& Lab Setup**

* Assist in setting up robotics labs, training kits, and learning materials in schools.
* Troubleshoot technical issues related to microcontrollers, sensors, programming tools, and 3D printers.

**Collaboration with Internal Teams**

* Work closely with the **Curriculum Development Team** to enhance training content.
* Coordinate with the **Business Development Team** to identify new opportunities for school partnerships.
* Engage with the **Operations Team** to ensure smooth scheduling and execution of training programs.

**Workshops \\& Event Participation**

* Represent RoboPleX at workshops, STEM fairs, and technology expos.
* Conduct teacher training programs and awareness sessions for schools.

**Qualifications \\& Skills Educational Background**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Robotics, Electronics, Computer Science, Mechatronics, or a related field.

**Technical Expertise**

* Strong hands\\-on experience in Robotics, Microcontrollers (Arduino, Raspberry Pi), and IoT applications.
* Proficiency in **Scratch, Python, Arduino, and CAD tools** for 3D modeling and prototyping.
* Knowledge of AI, ML, and automation technologies for real\\-world applications.
* Familiarity with drone technology, robotic arms, and humanoid development.

**Training \\& Communication Skills**

* Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to simplify complex concepts.
* Strong presentation and classroom management skills to engage students effectively.
* Ability to create a hands\\-on, project\\-based learning experience for students.

**Preferred Experience**

* **3\\+ years of experience** in technical training, robotics education, or STEM\\-based learning programs.
* Prior experience working with **school students or teachers** in a training or mentoring capacity.
* Experience in setting up robotics labs and designing technical training materials.

**Why Join RoboPleX?**

* Work in a dynamic, innovative environment focused on cutting\\-edge education technologies.
* Opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
* Competitive salary with performance\\-based incentives.

**Application Process :** Candidates, focusing on professional career\\-growth are invited to call at **7044461340** \\& send their updated resumes also to **hr@roboplexworld.com**.

BETSOL offices are set against the vibrant backdrops of Broomfield, Colorado and Bangalore, India. We take pride in being an employee\\-centric organization, offering comprehensive health insurance, competitive salaries, 401K, volunteer programs, and scholarship opportunities. description:

--------------------------------------


At GBIM, we invest in more than just talent, we invest in your journey.

  

### **Knowledge**


Learning is part of our culture. From **expert\\-led sessions** and **certification support** to real\\-world client exposure, you’ll grow every step of the way.### **Opportunity**


We don’t just assign tasks, we hand over **ownership**. Get the space to **lead, innovate**, and shape outcomes across real projects and diverse industries.### **Benefits**

**Social Media Trainee / Intern**
---------------------------------


Fresher / 0–1 Years
Internship (Full\\-time)
Navi Mumbai
**Position Overview**


If you can spin a chai spill into a storyline, turn a trending sound into multiple content ideas, and sniff out trends before they hit explore—welcome to **Social शाने**. title: Digital Marketing & LMS Specialist - Training & Business Development
description:
**Job Title:**

Digital Marketing \\& LMS Specialist \\- Training \\& Business Development

**Company:**

Skill Mummy Academy (Division of Skill Mummy Private Limited)

**Location:**

Remote (India\\-based)

**Job Type:**

Full\\-Time, Permanent

**Salary Range:**

Negotiable \\+ Performance\\-Based Incentives

**ABOUT US**

Skill Mummy Academy is an innovative digital training division offering **digital marketing courses**, **entrepreneurship training**, **business development programs**, and **AI\\-powered learning solutions**. We partner with Skill Mummy Private Limited, a multi\\-service company serving clients across insurance, digital services, and skill development sectors.

We are building India's next\\-generation platform for professional upskilling and business training with a focus on practical, industry\\-relevant education.

**THE ROLE**

We are seeking a **Digital Marketing \\& LMS Specialist** to join our core team. This is a key position responsible for:

**Training \\& Course Delivery:**

* Design and deliver engaging digital marketing courses using our LMS platform
* Create compelling training content covering SEO, social media marketing, paid advertising, content marketing, analytics, and emerging digital channels
* Conduct live sessions, webinars, and one\\-on\\-one coaching with students
* Develop and maintain course materials, assessments, and learning resources
* Track student progress and measure training effectiveness

**Business Development \\& Growth:**

* Identify and pursue new client acquisition opportunities (B2B and B2C)
* Partner with corporate clients to design custom training programs
* Build relationships with educational institutions, online platforms, and business networks
* Execute marketing campaigns to promote academy courses and services
* Convert leads into paid course enrollments and corporate contracts
* Present and pitch training programs to prospective clients

**LMS Management and Creation:**

* Administer and optimize our Learning Management System (Moodle, TalentLMS, or similar platforms)
* Set up courses, modules, and user groups in the LMS
* Troubleshoot technical issues and ensure smooth platform operations
* Generate learning analytics reports and KPI dashboards
* Integrate LMS with CRM and automation tools for seamless operations

**Curriculum \\& Strategy:**

* Stay updated with latest digital marketing trends and technologies
* Recommend course updates and new program additions
* Collaborate on academy strategy, positioning, and market expansion
* Maintain competitive pricing and value proposition

**WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR**

**Essential Qualifications:**

* **Bachelor's degree** in Marketing, Business, IT, or related field
* **3\\+ years of experience** in digital marketing with proven track record of campaigns (SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, analytics)
* **1\\-2 years of experience** training or coaching professionals (formal training role or mentorship)
* **Hands\\-on experience** with Learning Management Systems (Moodle, TalentLMS, Docebo, or similar)
* **Strong sales and business development mindset** \\- ability to identify and close opportunities
* **Excellent communication skills** \\- can simplify complex concepts for diverse audiences
* **Self\\-motivated and entrepreneurial** \\- comfortable wearing multiple hats in a startup environment

**Technical Skills:**

* Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads
* SEO tools (Semrush, Ahrefs, or equivalent)
* Email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, ConvertKit, etc.)
* CRM familiarity (HubSpot, Zoho, Salesforce basics)
* Video editing basics (Capcut, Adobe Premiere, CaptureMaster)
* Basic WordPress knowledge
* Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets proficiency

**Preferred (Nice to Have):**

* Certification in Digital Marketing (Google Analytics, HubSpot Academy, Coursera certificates, etc.)
* Experience with content management and video creation
* Familiarity with AI tools and emerging marketing technologies
* Remote work experience in startup or fast\\-paced environments
* Background in education technology or EdTech

**Core Competencies:**

* Strategic thinking and business acumen
* Problem\\-solving ability
* Customer\\-centric approach
* Project management and organization
* Ability to work independently and as part of a distributed team

**RESPONSIBILITIES AT A GLANCE**

**Week 1\\-2 Focus:**

* Prepare and deliver training content using LMS
* Support existing and new student enrollments
* Conduct client discovery calls

**Monthly KPIs:**

* Active student enrollments and course completions
* Corporate client outreach (10\\-15 conversations/proposals per month)
* New revenue generation through course sales
* Student satisfaction and course feedback ratings

**Long\\-term Growth:**

* Build academy reputation and brand presence
* Expand course offerings based on market demand
* Develop partnerships with corporate training departments
* Achieve monthly enrollment and revenue targets

**WHY THIS ROLE IS DIFFERENT**

This is **not** a traditional job posting. This role offers:

✓ **High Growth Potential** \\- You'll directly impact the academy's success and revenue  
✓ **Equity \\& Profit Participation** \\- Top performers with proven results can earn meaningful equity stake and profit\\-sharing (details discussed during offer stage)  
✓ **Entrepreneurial Environment** \\- You'll have agency in strategy, course design, and business direction  
✓ **Remote First** \\- Work from anywhere in India  
✓ **Skill Development** \\- Deep exposure to digital marketing, educational technology, business development, and startups  
✓ **Collaborative Team** \\- Work with experienced professionals across insurance, digital marketing, and NGO sectors

**WHAT WE OFFER**

* Competitive salary package (based on experience and negotiations)
* Performance\\-based bonuses tied to enrollment and revenue targets
* Health and wellness benefits
* Flexible working hours (results\\-driven culture)
* Professional development budget for certifications and learning
* **Equity/Profit\\-Sharing Opportunity** \\- For the right candidate with strong performance (25\\-50% stake possible based on contribution)
* Remote work capability
* Collaborative and supportive team culture

**HOW TO APPLY**

**Submit the following:**

* Updated resume/CV highlighting digital marketing and training experience
* Portfolio or case studies (past campaigns, courses designed, or client projects)
* Cover letter (2\\-3 paragraphs explaining why you're interested and what you'll bring)
* Links to your LinkedIn, Twitter, or professional online presence

**Application Questions (Pre\\-Screen):**

* What digital marketing channels are you most experienced with?
* Have you designed or taught training courses before? Describe your experience.
* What LMS platforms have you worked with?
* How many corporate clients or leads have you closed in your sales background?
* What attracted you to this role and our company?

**Next Steps:**

* Initial screening (1\\-2 days)
* Technical assessment on digital marketing \\& LMS (30 mins)
* Interview with founder/CEO (30\\-45 mins)
* Trial project or case study (optional, for final candidates)
* Offer discussion including equity/profit structure

**EQUAL OPPORTUNITY STATEMENT**

Skill Mummy Academy is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees, irrespective of gender, age, religion, caste, ethnicity, sexual orientation, or disability status. We encourage applications from underrepresented groups, including women entrepreneurs and professionals from non\\-traditional backgrounds.

**FAQ \\- ADDRESSING THE "CO\\-FOUNDER" CONCERN**

**Q: Why aren't you calling this a "co\\-founder" role?**  
A: Because Indeed has specific policies about equity\\-based positions. By positioning this as a specialized professional role with performance\\-based equity opportunity, we attract serious candidates AND comply with Indeed's guidelines. Equity discussions happen after mutual vetting.

**Q: Will this person really get 50% profit share?**  
A: This role offers **meaningful equity participation** (25\\-50% range possible) based on:

* Proven performance in first 6 months (enrollment targets, revenue generation)
* Mutual commitment and alignment with company vision
* Vesting schedule typically over 2\\-4 years
* Formalized through a co\\-founder/partnership agreement after trial period

**Q: Won't people misinterpret this as just another job?**  
A: Not if you emphasize in your interview conversations:

* "This isn't a traditional employee role"
* "We're looking for someone with entrepreneur mindset"
* "Top performers see genuine equity and profit participation"
* "You'll help shape the academy's direction and strategy"

**Q: How do I phrase the equity conversation in interviews?**  
A: During final interview stages:

* "This role has significant upside potential. For someone who hits targets and proves themselves in 3\\-6 months, we're open to formalized partnership with equity stake and profit\\-sharing."
* "We're building this together, not hiring someone to execute. You'll be part of ownership journey."
* Provide them with clear metrics: "If you hit X enrollments and Y revenue targets by Q2, let's discuss 40\\-50% equity stake with vesting."

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher, Volunteer

Pay: From ₹30,000\\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Health insurance
* Work from home

Work Location: Remote

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***

*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.*  

  

***Job Role***  

  

We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.

***Roles \\& Responsibilities***

* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.

***Desired Skills and Knowledge***

* **Performance Testing Tools**: JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling**: Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting**: Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)**: Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools**: Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage**: Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.

***Education***

* Bachelor of Technology *or equivalent degree.*

***Location:*** *Hyderabad*  

***Freshers***  

***Compensation:*** *6 LPA*  

***Website:*** *www.autorabit.com*

title: Database Engineer (Fresher)
description:
**About MoEngage:**



MoEngage is an insights\\-led customer engagement platform trusted by 1,350\\+ global consumer brands, including McAfee, Flipkart, Domino’s, Nestle, Deutsche Telekom, and OYO. MoEngage combines data from multiple sources to help brands gain a 360\\-degree view of their customers.



MoEngage Analytics arms marketers and product owners with insights into customer behavior. Brands can leverage MoEngage Personalize to orchestrate journeys and build 1:1 conversations across the website, mobile, email, social, and messaging channels. MoEngage Inform, the transactional messaging infrastructure, helps unify promotional and transactional communication to a single platform for better insights and lower costs. MoEngage’s AI Suite helps marketers develop winning copies and creatives, optimize campaigns and channels that boost engagement, and help with faster execution.



For over a decade, consumer brands in 60\\+ countries have been using MoEngage to power digital experiences for over a billion monthly customers. With offices in 15 countries, MoEngage is backed by Goldman Sachs Asset Management, B Capital, Steadview Capital, Multiples Private Equity, Eight Roads, F\\-Prime Capital, Matrix Partners, Ventureast, and Helion Ventures.



MoEngage was named a Contender in The Forrester Wave™: Real\\-Time Interaction Management, Q1 2024 report, and Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™ 2023 report. MoEngage was also featured as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Omni\\-Channel Marketing Platforms for B2C Enterprises 2023\\.



**As part of the Engineering team at MoEngage, here are some things you can expect:**


* Make in India and build for the world at the scale of 500M active users, which no other internet company in the country has seen
* Take ownership and be responsible for what you build \\- no micromanagement
* Work with A players (some of the best talents in the country), and expedite your learning curve and career growth
* Learn together from different teams on how they scale to millions of users and billions of messages.
* and more importantly, have fun while you work on scaling MoEngage.

**Requirements :**


* Strong programming skills in backend application development.
* Proficient in at least one backend language such as Python or Java.
* Skilled in designing, developing, and integrating APIs.
* Solid knowledge of databases and caching systems.
* Knowledge of cloud computing platforms, such as GCP, Azure, or AWS.


At **MoEngage**, we respect and value differences. We believe that when people from diverse backgrounds and perspectives collaborate, we create the most value – for our clients, our employees, and society. We embrace diversity and uphold a strong set of values. We are committed to inclusivity and take pride in providing equal opportunities for success and growth.



Employment at **MoEngage** is based solely on professional competence, skills, and experience. We stand firmly against all forms of discrimination and support equal rights and opportunities regardless of gender, ethnicity, abilities, age, identity, orientation or expression, marital status (including pregnancy), religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by law.



It is our policy to comply with all applicable national, state, and local laws related to non\\-discrimination and equal opportunity. **MoEngage** is truly a place where everyone can bring their passions, authentic selves, and talents to work, collaborating to drive progress and solve meaningful challenges.


**Why Join Us!**



At MoEngage, we are passionate about our team and technology \\- see below to know more about us.



Life@MoEngage



Tech@MoEngage



Scale @MoEngage



We handle more than a billion messages every day. Rest assured, you will be surrounded by really smart and passionate people as we scale much more to build a world\\-class technology team.
