title: Network Engineer
description:
**Description**
**Network Engineer**
**Job Description**
* The Network Engineer would be responsible for leading, and managing the team in executing the following work:
* Supporting network upgrades by replacing legacy telecommunication equipment and time division multiplexing (TDM) era technology
* Applying networking principles to assess the type of networking equipment needed on\\-site to support the site’s needs.  Router type, router cards, small form\\-factor pluggable (SFP), and power requirements will be determined utilizing site survey notes, pictures, 3D scans, and correspondence with site surveyor/design leads
* Design functions will include assessing what networking components are necessary, detailing and drafting designs, developing scope of work for installs, assembling part/equipment bill of material (BOM) requests, and supporting design discussions
* High level design and detail design for full scale complex utility grid network.
* Apply telecom principals to make the network solutions offered more resilient, good usage of network protocols and protection scenarios, attentions to details, utmost care of quality of all deliverables.
* Prepare configuration for MPLS, Switches, Routers, SONET etc.
* Network analysis of existing grid networks and prepare cutover package solution for channel migration from TDM to packet.
* Prepare Network block diagram in detail considering new installation (MPLS nodes) as per the scope, removal of old equipment, Fiber plan, channel plan, synchronization plan, circuit audits, network topology drawing, DC calculation, Panel elevation, QoS values etc.
* Maintain the documentation of full project lifecycle including the design revisions, change management, preliminary, construction till as build, maintain the record of transmittal of these packages with client.
* Seamless communication with cross functional project stakeholders, team, counterparts.
* Ensure project milestones are met on time through effective action planning.


**Qualifications**
**Required Skills / Experience:**
* Degree in Electrical Engineering (EE) or Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering (EXTC)
* 3\\-5 years of experience in telecommunication engineering or network engineering.
* Utility network experience would be an added advantage. Should have handled the upgradation projects for the utilities in design, testing or commissioning activity.
* Hands\\-on experience with reputed MPLS devices.
* Knowledge about implementation of QoS, Label engineering, MPLS services, PTP synchronization, circuit emulation, packet network architecture, resilient protection scenarios.
* Microsoft Visio, Excel, and Word Experience
* Strong communication skills,
* Experience in Tele protection couplers in the utility grid.
* Knowledge of different IP Networking protocols for routing, switching.
* Legacy Telecommunications Technology (time division multiplexing (TDM), Synchronous optical networking (SONET), serial communication)
* Network Transport Technology (Dense Wavelength Division Multiplexing (DWDM), Microwave, etc.)
* Modern Networking Technology (Multi\\-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) packet networking) – MPLS\\-TP \\& MPLS\\-IP.


**Desired Skills / Experience**
* Technical Certification by Nokia, Cisco, or other reputable networking certification entity\\- would be an added advantage.
* Experience, certifications, or formal education in networking, computing, or electrical engineering
* Different amplifiers in the telecom network and its integration with transport nodes.
* Familiar with Firewall usage, different applications in OT networking,
* Familiarity with an electric utility’s supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) or Operational Technology (OT)


 This job posting will remain open a minimum of 72 hours and on an ongoing basis until filled.
   

  

**Job** 
 Engineering
   

  

**Primary Location** 
 India\\-Maharashtra\\-Mumbai
   

  

**Schedule:** 
 Full\\-time
   

  

**Travel:** 
 No
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 252881
   

  

**Job Hire Type** 
 Experienced Not Applicable \\#BMI N/A

title: Network Engineer
description:
Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) is a global leader in the design, marketing and distribution of premium lifestyle products in five categories: apparel, accessories, home, fragrances, and hospitality. For more than 50 years, Ralph Lauren's reputation and distinctive image have been consistently developed across an expanding number of products, brands and international markets. The Company's brand names, which include Ralph Lauren, Ralph Lauren Collection, Ralph Lauren Purple Label, Polo Ralph Lauren, Double RL, Lauren Ralph Lauren, Polo Ralph Lauren Children, Chaps, among others, constitute one of the world's most widely recognized families of consumer brands.
   

  

 At Ralph Lauren, we unite and inspire the communities within our company as well as those in which we serve by amplifying voices and perspectives to create a culture of belonging, ensuring inclusion, and fairness for all. We foster a culture of inclusion through: Talent, Education \\& Communication, Employee Groups and Celebration.
   

  

 ,
   

  

 The Network Engineer, reports to the Manager, and will be responsible to come up with innovative solutions to various networking problems and ensures that requirements are properly defined and satisfactorily met. Implements and evaluates the working of networking systems and stays abreast of new technologies emerging in the industry. Relies on extensive IT experience and sound judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
   

  

 ,
   

  

* Provides Tier 3 engineering support during critical operational incidents as necessary.
* Supports the architecture team during the transition into production.
* Maintains current network infrastructure and leverages the manufacturer for advanced support.
* Maintains high network availability for redundancy and resilience.
* Understands and accounts for peak load; manages peak load events.
* Follows Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for operational efficiency.
* Optimizes, implements and monitors network performance.
* Maintains and reacts to Enterprise\\-grade network monitoring system.
* Assists in the deployment of network equipment for new office build outs, domestically and internationally.

* Supports and resolves PCI and SOX compliance regulations


 ,
   

  

* Experience working in data centers / ISP with an emphasis on Network and Systems Operations Center (NOC)
* Must be self\\-motivated with strong interpersonal, communication, presentation, and organizational skills.

* Knowledge of CloudGenix

* Demonstrable knowledge in the design, implementation, troubleshooting and operations of data center technologies.
* Firm understanding of operating systems, virtualization, network services for cloud enablement, and security.

* 6\\+ years of experience within IT Infrastructure operations

title: Network Engineer II - IN (R-22012) (Night Shift - Remote)
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION:**
 The Network Operations Network Engineer II is a key element within the Rackspace Infrastructure team and is expected to provide a high level of technical expertise to ensure the uptime and maintenance of critical networking systems. A Racker in this role takes ownership of complex network issues and ensures they are resolved and/or successfully documented and handed off to an oncoming shift. The Network Engineer II actively monitors the Rackspace network at all levels, from top of rack to edge, using various tools and communicates and resolves issues identified or escalates them to the appropriate level. The Racker also responds to issues escalated to Network Operations via tickets and phone calls from internal customers and is expected to engage directly with external customers via public ticket comments and phone conversations to ensure problem resolution. The Racker accepts and takes ownership through to resolution of issues escalated by other Network Operations Engineers and creates training and mentoring opportunities for those engineers as appropriate. Technical issues can include troubleshooting latency, packet loss, and poor performance; responding to DDoS attacks; identifying and resolving switch and router hardware and software failures; identifying and resolving configuration inconsistencies; identifying and escalating problems with networking platforms or technologies; planning and conducting complex maintenances to ensure standardization and uptime; and managing Internet providers and connectivity.
   

  

 The Network Operations Engineer will create and maintain customer loyalty by providing Fanatical Support above and beyond customer expectations.
   

  

**JOB REQUIREMENTS:**
* Key Accountabilities
* Provide exceptional customer support via the ticketing system and phone
* Detect events in a timely manner using monitoring tools
* Mitigates DDoS attacks to protect customer and shared infrastructure
* Document planned and unplanned network events in appropriate tracking and turnover systems
* Troubleshoot and resolve network events and create event documentation accordingly
* Take ownership of level\\-appropriate customer requests and issues and engineer escalations, seeing them through to resolution
* Escalate support requests to next level engineers and communicate with Incident Management as appropriate
* Escalate to vendors and follow up as needed to ensure problem resolution
* Adhere to Change Management and Maintenance policy and process
* Participate and provide input to Root Cause Analysis
* Take ownership of projects self\\-identified or assigned and ensure proper and complete documentation and resolution
* Review, assist in defining, and sign off on policy and process standards


**Key Performance Indicators**
* Ticket Contribution and Phone Availability: Provide correct and helpful expertise to resolve issues, maintaining high ticket evaluations results
* High level of first pass yield and success on written, quality checked, tested, and executed maintenances
* Prompt and correct responses to network events
* Maintain proficiency in troubleshooting, tools, and technologies


**PERSON SPECIFICATION:**
* The Network Operations Network Engineer II has an intermediate to advanced aptitude with:
* All supported network platforms (Cisco 2900, 3500, 3700, 4900, 6500, ASR1k, ASR9k, Nexus 3k, Nexus 6k, Nexus 7k, Arista 7000, etc…)
* All supported Layer 2 and 3 protocols and features (STP, HSRP, VLANs, CDP, port\\-channels, OSPF, BGP, MPLS, DWDM, etc…)
* Monitoring systems (Arbor, Zenoss, Syslog, SolarWinds, WhatsUp Gold, etc…)
* The Network Operations Network Engineer II:
* Is able to handle multiple tasks and prioritize work under pressure
* Is comfortable and proficient in delegating tasks to other engineers
* Is detail\\-oriented in documenting information and able to own customer issues through resolution
* Demonstrates strong problem\\-solving skills coupled with a desire to take on responsibility
* Has a desire to expand personal technical knowledge and mentor other engineers to expand knowledge
* Identifies were process can be improved and engages managers and other teams to implement those improvements
* The ideal candidate possesses:
* A minimum of 5 years of recent networking experience in a command\\-line oriented environment
* At least 18 months of experience with responsibility for configuration and problem resolution of OSPF and/or BGP
* CCNP\\-level aptitude
* A minimum of 12 months of experience in a customer service role
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Critical thinking skills and the ability to provide solutions with precision during high\\-pressure situations
* Schedule flexibility to include working a weekend day regularly and holidays as required by the business

title: Networking Engineer - L2
description:
**Make an impact with NTT DATA**
 Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion – it’s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive.
   

  

**Your day at NTT DATA**
 As a Networking Managed Services Engineer (L2\\) at NTT DATA, you'll take on a developing engineering role where your main goal is to ensure our clients' IT infrastructure and systems remain operational. You'll achieve this by proactively monitoring, identifying, investigating, and resolving technical incidents and problems. You'll work closely with our clients and internal teams to ensure that services are restored swiftly, in line with our service level agreements (SLAs).
   

  

 Your day will revolve around reviewing client requests and tickets, applying your technical expertise to resolve them efficiently and effectively. You'll be the go\\-to person for second\\-line support, handling incidents and requests of medium complexity. In addition to your daily tasks, you'll have opportunities to contribute to exciting project work from time to time.
   

  

 You'll proactively monitor work queues, execute operational tasks, and update tickets with the actions you've taken. Identifying, analysing, and logging issues before they escalate will be a key part of your role. You'll communicate with other teams and clients to provide support and ensure that changes are executed with clear risk identification and mitigation plans.
   

  

 As part of the shift handover process, you'll highlight key tickets and upcoming critical tasks for the next shift. When needed, you'll escalate tickets to ensure the right focus from our Centres of Excellence (CoE) and other teams. Collaborating with our automation teams, you'll work on optimizing efforts and automating routine tasks, all while coaching our Service desk and L1 teams in both technical and behavioural skills.
   

  

 You'll also establish monitoring for client infrastructure, leading and managing initial client escalations for operational issues. Contributing to the change management process, you'll log change requests, execute approved maintenance activities, and audit incident and request tickets for quality. Your insights will drive trend analysis reports, identifying tasks suitable for automation to reduce tickets and optimize efforts. You might also support disaster recovery functions and other related tasks as needed.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, you need to have:**
* Proficiency in technologies such as Pulse Secure SSL VPN, Palo Alto, Fortinet, Cisco Nexus switches/routers/firewalls, and more familiarity with ticketing tools.
* At least one technical certification in the above\\-mentioned technologies.
* Strong planning skills, with the ability to anticipate and adapt to changing circumstances.
* Adaptability and resilience in a dynamic work environment.
* Ability to communicate and work effectively across different cultures and social groups.
* Proficiency in active listening and client\\-centric communication.
* A positive outlook and the ability to work well under pressure.
* A client\\-first attitude, always seeking to create positive client experiences.
* A bachelor's degree or equivalent qualification in IT/Computing, or equivalent work experience.


**Workplace type:**
 On\\-site Working
   

  

**About NTT DATA**
 NTT DATA is a $30\\+ billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long\\-term success. We invest over $3\\.6 billion each year in R\\&D to help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future. As a Global Top Employer, we have diverse experts in more than 50 countries and a robust partner ecosystem of established and start\\-up companies. Our services include business and technology consulting, data and artificial intelligence, industry solutions, as well as the development, implementation and management of applications, infrastructure, and connectivity. We are also one of the leading providers of digital and AI infrastructure in the world. NTT DATA is part of NTT Group and headquartered in Tokyo.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 NTT DATA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, colour, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other protected category. Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.
   

  

**Third parties fraudulently posing as NTT DATA recruiters**
 NTT DATA recruiters will never ask job seekers or candidates for payment or banking information during the recruitment process, for any reason. Please remain vigilant of third parties who may attempt to impersonate NTT DATA recruiters—whether in writing or by phone—in order to deceptively obtain personal data or money from you. All email communications from an NTT DATA recruiter will come from an
 **@nttdata.com** 
 email address. If you suspect any fraudulent activity, please
 *contact us* 
 .

title: Engineer - Global IP and Ethernet Engineering
description:
**About The Company**
 Tata Communications Redefines Connectivity with Innovation and IntelligenceDriving the next level of intelligence powered by Cloud, Mobility, Internet of Things, Collaboration, Security, Media services and Network services, we at Tata Communications are envisaging a New World of Communications
   

  

 We are seeking a motivated
 **Entry\\-Level Network Engineer** 
 to join our Network Engineering team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in
 **switching, routing** 
 , with an interest in
 **AI/ML and cloud networking technologies** 
 . The role involves hands\\-on exposure to modern network operations, network virtualization, and VNF deployments.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Assist in the configuration, deployment, and troubleshooting of network devices, switches, and routers.
* Support switching, routing, VLANs, STP, OSPF, BGP, EIGRP, MPLS, and VPN (IPSec, GRE, SSL) configurations.
* Participate in network security management including ACLs, firewalls, IDS/IPS, and QoS policies.
* Assist with MPLS Core, L2/L3 VPN, PE\\-CE routing, and traffic engineering tasks.
* Work on network monitoring, performance optimization, and documentation of network topologies.
* Support automation and scripting initiatives using Python.
* Gain exposure to AI/ML, LLMs (e.g., ChatGPT, LangChain), network analytics, and AI\\-enabled network operations.
* Participate in VNF deployment, NFV lifecycle, network virtualization, and basic cloud networking (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Collaborate with senior engineers on SD\\-WAN, network orchestration, and emerging technologies.


**Required Skills**
* Fundamental knowledge of switching and routing concepts.
* Basic understanding of MPLS, VPNs, L2/L3 VPNs, and PE\\-CE routing.
* Knowledge of network security principles and monitoring tools (Wireshark, SNMP, NetFlow).
* Exposure to Python scripting, automation, and network documentation.
* Awareness of AI/ML, LLMs, and AI\\-driven network analytics concepts.
* Understanding of network virtualization, VNF deployment, and cloud networking fundamentals.
* Strong problem\\-solving, collaboration, and learning mindset.

description:

 is collaborating with

 Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world's best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting\\-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. Responsible for contributing in project teams, troubleshooting operational issues, providing technical solutions to operational problems, new product implementation, implementing existing products and services and the overall upkeep and maintenance of designated areas of engineering. Acts in compliance with industry and Company technical requirements, standards, policies and procedures. Works with moderate guidance in own area of knowledge.
   

  

**Job Summary**
**Job Description**
 Position: Network Engineer 2
   

  

 Experience: 2\\.5 years to 4 years
   

  

 Job Location: Chennai Tamil Nadu
   

  

**Technical Skills:** 
 Good working knowledge of networking (e.g., core switches, access switches, firewalls) , Good knowledge of SDN (Software Defined Network in the video sector), Good knowledge of storage (e.g., NetApp)
   

  

**Requirements**
* Equivalent professional qualification with relevant work experience may also be considered
* Proven experience in designing and configuring network infrastructures
* Strong hands\\-on experience with server systems (Microsoft and Linux), Cisco switches, Cisco firewalls, and storage systems
* Excellent IT and broadcast technology acumen
* Knowledge of broadcast systems and a willingness to further develop in this area
* Good command of English, both written and spoken
* Strong analytical skills, organizational ability, proactiveness, and a collaborative team mindset


**Responsibilities**
* Independently manage projects while ensuring adherence to technical standards
* Handle project preparation, execution, and follow\\-up activities autonomously
* Demonstrate strong knowledge of storage systems (e.g., NetApp)
* Possess solid expertise in network technologies, including core switches, access switches, and firewalls
* Have a good understanding of Software Defined Networking (SDN), particularly in video environments
* Perform operational, administrative, and planning tasks related to network infrastructure and server management
* Continuously optimize workflows and processes to improve efficiency
* Independently troubleshoot and resolve software and hardware issues, coordinating with vendors when necessary
* Train and support employees on relevant technical topics


**Core Responsibilities**
* Ability to troubleshoot and repair all but the most complex issues. Performs maintenance activities with a minimum of supervision and guidance. Leads technical outage bridges and engages appropriate resources to drive issues to closure.
* Acts as an advocate for Engineering Operations procedures, policies and processes. Ensures projects and initiatives are adhering to Company standards.
* Tracks and reports operational workflows; maintains records of results and feedback. Analyzes data and metrics, identifies problem areas and provides actionable insight.
* Acts as a technical resource in projects and initiatives and ensures successful project implementation.
* Contributes to design considerations for new products or architectural changes to existing products.
* Analyses problems in design, configuration, data flow and data state within a highly complex multi\\-product provisioning system.
* Performs routine maintenance tests for designated areas of engineering and ensures all maintenance is properly validated to minimize impact.
* Provides training and guidance to less experienced team members.
* Attains industry standard certifications and education.
* Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
* Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) and overtime as necessary.
* Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.


**Employees At All Levels Are Expected To**
* Understand our Operating Principles; make them the guidelines for how you do your job.
* Own the customer experience \\- think and act in ways that put our customers first, give them seamless digital options at every touchpoint, and make them promoters of our products and services.
* Know your stuff \\- be enthusiastic learners, users and advocates of our game\\-changing technology, products and services, especially our digital tools and experiences.
* Win as a team \\- make big things happen by working together and being open to new ideas.
* Be an active part of the Net Promoter System \\- a way of working that brings more employee and customer feedback into the company \\- by joining huddles, making call backs and helping us elevate opportunities to do better for our customers.
* Drive results and growth.
* Support a culture of inclusion in how you work and lead.
* Do what's right for each other, our customers, investors and our communities.


**Disclaimer**
* This information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees in this role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications.


 Comcast is an equal opportunity workplace. We will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by applicable law.
   

  

 Base pay is one part of the Total Rewards that Comcast provides to compensate and recognize employees for their work. Most sales positions are eligible for a Commission under the terms of an applicable plan, while most non\\-sales positions are eligible for a Bonus. Additionally, Comcast provides best\\-in\\-class Benefits to eligible employees. We believe that benefits should connect you to the support you need when it matters most, and should help you care for those who matter most. That’s why we provide an array of options, expert guidance and always\\-on tools, that are personalized to meet the needs of your reality – to help support you physically, financially and emotionally through the big milestones and in your everyday life. Please visit the compensation and benefits summary on our careers site for more details.

 Bachelor's Degree

 2\\-5 Years

title: Network Engineer
description:
Alkira is transforming the way enterprises build and manage their global networks. Our Network Infrastructure as\\-a\\-Service platform delivers a simple, on\\-demand, and fully managed network solution that connects users, sites, and clouds with integrated security and operational visibility. We partner with leading cloud providers, service integrators, and technology vendors to help customers accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 We are growing our Sales and Solution Engineering teams and looking for high energy, dedicated professionals who can help add new clients to our SaaS platform. The ideal candidate is able to demonstrate key technical differentiators of Alkira service and help our large strategic enterprise accounts transform their network to become disruptive, creative and innovative.
   

  

 We are looking for a proactive and technically sound Network Engineer with 1–2 years of experience in a network engineering or support role. The ideal candidate should have hands\\-on experience with network provisioning, configuration, and troubleshooting. A valid networking certification such as CCNA, CCNP, or equivalent is required.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity for a junior\\-level professional to grow within a dynamic IT team and gain exposure to enterprise\\-level infrastructure.
   

  

 Location: This is a 100% remote position located in India, preferably Mumbai or Bengaluru
   

  

 Shift: Rotational Shifts (Day/Night)
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Provision and configure network on Alkira platform
* Monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot network issues
* Support the rollout of new network solutions and services
* Work with senior engineers to implement and document network changes
* Participate in on\\-call rotation and work in shifts, including nights and weekends
* Maintain accurate documentation of network topologies, configurations, and procedures


**Requirements**
* 1–2 years of experience in a network engineering or IT infrastructure role
* Strong knowledge of networking protocols and concepts (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLANs, BGP, OSPF, etc.)
* Hands\\-on experience provisioning network devices
* Networking certificationsuch as CCNA, CCNP, or equivalent
* Knowledge of cloud network and cloud security fundamentals will be preferred
* Willingness to work in rotational shifts
* Strong troubleshooting, analytical, and problem\\-solving skills
* Good communication and documentation skills


**About Alkira**
 Alkira was founded in 2018 by Amir and Atif Khan, the visionary computer networking team that created the multi\\-billion\\-dollar SD\\-WAN market with the founding of Viptela. Now, we have reinvented networking for the AI era by delivering Networking Infrastructure as\\-a\\-Service, the first global unified network infrastructure with on\\-demand hybrid and multi\\-cloud connectivity, integrated network and security services, end\\-to\\-end visibility, controls and governance, all delivered as\\-a\\-service.
   

  

 Why Join?
   

  

* This is a great opportunity to be part of a high\\-growth company pioneering the future of network infrastructure as a service
* Work alongside a world\\-class team of innovators and industry veterans
* Work with people who enjoy working together at an amazing work culture


 Click here to know more about how Alkira, Inc is reinventing networking! Also, check out other career opportunities at our careers site.

title: Network Engineer ( R & S) - Data center-
description:
**Make an impact with NTT DATA**
 Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion – it’s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive.
   

  

**Your day at NTT DATA**
 As a Networking Managed Services Engineer (L1\\) at NTT DATA, you'll step into an entry\\-level role where your primary focus will be providing managed services to ensure our clients' IT infrastructure and systems remain operational. Your day will involve proactively identifying, investigating, and resolving technical incidents and problems to support our clients effectively.
   

  

 You'll monitor client infrastructure and solutions, catching errors before or as soon as they occur. Your role will involve investigating first\\-line incidents, understanding their root causes, and following approved procedures for request fulfilment. Whether it's providing telephonic, ITSM ticket or chat support, executing maintenance activities like patching and configuration changes, or ensuring smooth shift handovers for continuous service, your efforts are all about maintaining high standards of service quality.
   

  

 You'll also identify opportunities for optimization, whether it's reducing common incidents or finding automation possibilities for request fulfilment, incident resolution, and process improvements. Your role may occasionally extend to supporting project work and disaster recovery functions and tests, contributing to our broader goals and ensuring we're always ahead of the curve.
   

  

 Throughout your journey with us, you'll ensure that incidents and requests are resolved efficiently and comprehensively, escalating when necessary. You'll also help update existing knowledge or to share valuable insights, ensuring we continuously learn and improve.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, you need to have:**
* JD Network L1
* Min 2 years of exp required as a Network Engineer under DC environment.
* ⁠Hands on exp in Routing protocol EIGRP, OSPF, BGP.
* ⁠Troubleshooting knowledge on ISP WAN link.
* ⁠understand the network topology
* ⁠Switching knowledge (Vlan, STP, Access port, Trunk port)
* ⁠working experience on multi vendor product.
* ⁠ISP connectivity (leased Line, MPLS, ILL, VPN)
* ⁠ability to work with monitoring tool.
* ⁠assist racking and staking activities, cable management, inventory documentation
* ⁠ensure to maintain DC compliance
* ⁠CCNA certification is desirable.
* Willing to work under 24/7 environment
* A bachelor’s degree in information technology/computing or equivalent experience.


**Workplace type:**
 On\\-site Working
   

  

**About NTT DATA**
 NTT DATA is a $30\\+ billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long\\-term success. We invest over $3\\.6 billion each year in R\\&D to help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future. As a Global Top Employer, we have diverse experts in more than 50 countries and a robust partner ecosystem of established and start\\-up companies. Our services include business and technology consulting, data and artificial intelligence, industry solutions, as well as the development, implementation and management of applications, infrastructure, and connectivity. We are also one of the leading providers of digital and AI infrastructure in the world. NTT DATA is part of NTT Group and headquartered in Tokyo.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 NTT DATA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, colour, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other protected category. Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.
   

  

**Third parties fraudulently posing as NTT DATA recruiters**
 NTT DATA recruiters will never ask job seekers or candidates for payment or banking information during the recruitment process, for any reason. Please remain vigilant of third parties who may attempt to impersonate NTT DATA recruiters—whether in writing or by phone—in order to deceptively obtain personal data or money from you. All email communications from an NTT DATA recruiter will come from an
 **@nttdata.com** 
 email address. If you suspect any fraudulent activity, please
 *contact us* 
 .

title: Network Infrastructure Engineer (Remote - India)
description:
This position is posted by Jobgether on behalf of a partner company. We are currently looking for a
 **Network Infrastructure Engineer** 
 in
 **India** 
 .
   

  

 This role offers a high\\-impact opportunity to manage and optimize large\\-scale network infrastructures that support mission\\-critical services across multiple domains. You will be responsible for maintaining cloud and on\\-premises network environments, ensuring high availability, reliability, and performance. The position involves troubleshooting complex network issues, engaging with internal teams and external vendors, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives. You will also participate in network upgrades, capacity planning, and automation projects, gaining exposure to multi\\-vendor, hyperscale environments. This role is ideal for professionals who thrive in dynamic, fast\\-paced settings and are passionate about driving operational excellence in advanced networking technologies.
   

  

**Accountabilities**
* Provide 24/7 support through global shift rotations, resolving network incidents and updating stakeholders on progress
* Monitor, operate, and maintain large\\-scale IP networks, including cloud and on\\-premises infrastructures
* Troubleshoot complex network issues, leveraging expertise in L3 underlay networks, protocols, and multi\\-vendor equipment
* Manage and optimize Peering and Datacenter interconnect technologies, including PNI, Transit, Exchange, Passive DWDM, and Wave circuits
* Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to remediate hardware and software issues
* Contribute to network automation and tooling projects for provisioning, monitoring, and managing infrastructure
* Develop workflow enhancements, document best practices, and drive operational improvements


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field, or equivalent experience
* 4\\+ years of experience in network operations, with strong incident management and SLA adherence
* Deep knowledge of TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, MPLS, IS\\-IS, VxLAN, EVPN, QoS, GRE, IPsec, DNS, and MACsec
* Hands\\-on experience with CSP environments such as AWS, Azure, GCP, or OCI
* Familiarity with networking hardware and software from vendors like Arista, Fortinet, and Juniper
* Strong troubleshooting, problem\\-solving, and analytical skills
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to collaborate across teams. Preferred / Standout Skills:
* Knowledge of Mellanox/Cumulus OS and Infiniband technology
* Unix/Linux system administration and scripting (Python/Shell)
* Experience with monitoring and management tools such as Netbox/Nautobot, Prometheus, Grafana, and Panoptes


**Benefits**
* Competitive salary and performance\\-based incentives
* Opportunities for professional growth and exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies
* Collaborative and dynamic work environment
* Flexible working arrangements and remote work options
* Recognition programs and participation in impactful projects
* Exposure to large\\-scale, multi\\-vendor, and hyperscale network infrastructures


 Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI\\-driven job matching.
   

  

 When you apply, your profile goes through our AI\\-powered screening process designed to identify top talent efficiently and fairly.
   

  

 🔍 Our AI evaluates your CV and LinkedIn profile thoroughly, analyzing your skills, experience, and achievements.
   

  

 📊 It compares your profile to the job's core requirements and past success factors to determine your match score.
   

  

 🎯 Based on this analysis, we automatically shortlist the
 **three candidates** 
 with the highest match to the role.
   

  

 🧠 When necessary, our human team may perform an additional manual review to ensure no strong profile is missed.
   

  

 The process is
 **transparent, skills\\-based, and free of bias** 
 , focusing solely on your fit for the role. Once the shortlist is completed, we share it directly with the company that owns the job opening. The final decision and next steps (such as interviews or additional assessments) are then made by their internal hiring team.
   

  

**Thank you for your interest!**

title: Network Engineer (Nexus/ACI) – L2
description:
Position Summary
   

  

 We are looking for a Resident Engineer with hands\\-on experience in Cisco Nexus switches and Cisco ACI (Application
   

  

 Centric Infrastructure) to provide on\\-site support and expertise. The candidate will be responsible for managing,
   

  

 troubleshooting, and optimizing our Nexus and ACI environments, ensuring network performance and reliability for the
   

  

 organization.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Deployment \\& Configuration:
* Configure, and maintain Cisco Nexus switches and Cisco ACI fabric for data center and enterprise


 environments.
   

  

* Work on the deployment of new network infrastructure, ensuring proper integration with existing systems


 and business requirements.
   

  

* Configure and implement network features such as VXLAN, Multi\\-Chassis Link Aggregation (MLAG),


 FabricPath, and others within Nexus/ACI.
   

  

* Network Management \\& Optimization:
* Monitor and manage Cisco Nexus/ACI environments, ensuring optimal performance, availability, and


 reliability.
   

  

* Perform tuning and capacity planning to enhance network performance and scalability.
* Troubleshoot network issues and provide quick resolutions, particularly related to Nexus/ACI hardware,


 software, and configuration.
   

  

* Troubleshooting \\& Issue Resolution:
* Provide expert\\-level support for any network issues involving Nexus/ACI components.
* Perform root cause analysis and recommend corrective actions for network incidents related to Cisco Nexus


 switches and ACI environments.
   

  

* Collaborate with the network and system engineering teams to identify and resolve complex infrastructure issues.
* Network Security \\& Compliance: o Ensure that the Cisco Nexus and ACI infrastructure complies with security policies and industry standards. o Implement security best practices in ACI for access control, traffic segmentation, and other network security features.
* Documentation \\& Reporting: o Maintain accurate and up\\-to\\-date documentation for all network configurations, diagrams, and operational procedures. o Provide regular status reports on system health, performance, and ongoing projects. o Stay up\\-to\\-date with new features and capabilities of Nexus/ACI, providing input for possible upgrades or enhancements.


**Qualifications, Certifications, And Education Requirements**
* Minimum of 3 of hands\\-on experience in the field of networking and managing inscope solutions
* Should have experience in management of any Large Data Center (of similar size) network for atleast 1


 year.
   

  

* Strong knowledge of data center technologies, including SDN (Software\\-Defined Networking), VXLAN,


 FCoE (Fibre Channel over Ethernet), and FabricPath.
   

  

* Technical Skills:


 Expertise in the Cisco Nexus family of switches (Nexus 7000, 5000, 9000 series).
   

  

 Hands\\-on experience with Cisco ACI, including APIC (Application Policy Infrastructure Controller) and
   

  

 ACI fabrics.
   

  

 Strong troubleshooting skills using tools such as Wireshark, Cisco Prime, and CLI.
   

  

* Certifications (Preferred):
* Any Cisco certifications such as CCNP Data Center, CCIE Data Center, or Cisco Certified ACI


 Specialist.
   

  

* Knowledge of industry standards and protocols, such as OSPF, BGP, EIGRP, and MPLS, is a


 plus.
   

  

**Soft Skills:**
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills to work with cross\\-functional teams.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively.


**Working Conditions:**
* Occasional after\\-hours work may be necessary to handle urgent issues or system maintenance.
* Travel to remote locations may be required depending on the business needs.


**Qualifications, Certifications, And Education Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering / Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field (or equivalent


 experience).
   

  

* The resource must also have a professional level certification for Networking and Switching


**Preferred Skills**
* Strong understanding of network and switches
* Proficiency in configuring and maintaining
* Strong verbal and written English communication skills.

title: Network Engineer L2
description:
Job Role: Level 2 Network Engineer (Operations Team)
 



  
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



  
 



 1\\. Advanced Network Monitoring and Optimization:
 



  
 



 Oversee network performance, ensuring uptime and optimal configurations across Cisco Meraki, FortiGate, Cisco, any public cloud net ops, Cisco ISE and SD\\-WAN environments.
 



  
 



 Manage Cisco ACI and Cisco Nexus environments, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.
 



  
 



 Identify, analyze, and resolve network performance bottlenecks and recommend enhancements.
 



  
 



 Monitor and maintain network health, proactively identifying and resolving issues related to ACI, Nexus switches, and routing.
 



  
 



  
 



 2\\. Complex Troubleshooting and Incident Resolution:
 



  
 



 Act as the escalation point for Level 1 engineers, resolving advanced incidents related to firewalls, DNS, Zscaler, SD\\-WAN, and load balancers (NetScaler/F5\\).
 



  
 



 Diagnose and resolve network\\-related application issues, including advanced routing, S2S VPNs, and traffic shaping problems.
 



  
 



 Configure and troubleshoot BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) and OSPF (Open Shortest Path First) routing protocols within the network infrastructure.
 



  
 



 Perform root cause analysis (RCA) for recurring issues and provide actionable recommendations to prevent future occurrences.
 



  
 



 Configure, manage, and troubleshoot Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) for network access control, device authentication, and security policy enforcement across the network.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 3\\. Network Configuration and Implementation:
 



  
 



 Design and implement advanced configurations for firewalls, load balancers, SD\\-WAN, and Zscaler to meet business needs.
 



  
 



 Manage and maintain DNS records, including advanced configurations like load balancing, failover, and CDN integrations.
 



  
 



 Assist in planning and executing network upgrades, migrations, and deployments for multi\\-site environments.
 



  
 



 Ensure high availability and redundancy of network components, including ACI fabric, Nexus switches, and routing protocols.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 4\\. Security and Compliance:
 



  
 



 Implement and manage complex firewall rules, VPNs.
 



  
 



 Ensure compliance with security standards, conducting regular audits and vulnerability assessments on network devices.
 



  
 



 Support Zscaler policy configuration and integration with other network security tools.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 5\\. Collaboration and Mentorship:
 



  
 



 Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to implement network changes with minimal disruption.
 



  
 



 Mentor Level 1 engineers by providing training, guidance, and support to improve team skill levels.
 



  
 



 Liaise with vendors for escalated support, product updates, and feature enablement.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 6\\. Documentation and Reporting:
 



  
 



 Create and maintain detailed technical documentation for network infrastructure, configurations, and processes.
 



  
 



 Generate in\\-depth reports on network performance, incident resolution, and system health for stakeholders.
 



  
 



 Maintain updated diagrams and records of network topology and architecture.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 7\\. Strategic Contributions:
 



  
 



 Participate in network architecture design discussions, providing insights and recommendations.
 



  
 



 Evaluate and recommend new tools, technologies, and processes to improve operational efficiency.
 



  
 



 Lead small\\-scale projects involving network optimization, hardware refreshes, or policy implementations.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 8\\. Disaster Recovery and Backup:
 



  
 



 Manage backup and restoration processes for firewalls, DNS servers, load balancers, and SD\\-WAN devices.
 



  
 



 Play a key role in disaster recovery planning and execution, ensuring rapid restoration of services.
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



  
 



 \\-\\-\\-
 



  
 



 Skills and Qualifications:
 



  
 



 Technical Expertise:
 



  
 



 In\\-depth experience with Cisco Meraki, FortiGate or  CheckPoint or Cisco firewall.
 



  
 



 Strong expertise in Cisco ACI (Application Centric Infrastructure) and Cisco Nexus series switches.
 



  
 



 Proficiency in SD\\-WAN technologies, including advanced routing and policy configurations.
 



  
 



 Hands\\-on experience with Zscaler deployment and advanced policy management.
 



  
 



 Advanced knowledge of load balancers like NetScaler and F5, including traffic steering and SSL offloading.
 



  
 



 In\\-depth understanding and hands\\-on experience with BGP and OSPF routing protocols.
 



  
 



 Hands\\-on experience configuring and troubleshooting Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) for network access control and security policy enforcement.
 



  
 



  
 



 Tools and Platforms:
 



  
 



 Proficiency with network monitoring and troubleshooting tools (e.g., SolarWinds, Wireshark)
 



  
 



 Familiarity with firewall management systems (e.g., FortiManager, Cisco FMC, ASDM) and SD\\-WAN controllers.
 



  
 



  
 



 Certifications (Preferred):
 



  
 



 CCNP, Fortinet NSE 5 or above, Zscaler ZCE, or equivalent.
 



  
 



 NetScaler certifications are an added advantage.
 



  
 



  
 



 \\-\\-\\-
 



  
 



  
 



 Handle escalations and advanced troubleshooting that goes beyond routine issues.
 



  
 



 Take ownership of critical incidents and lead their resolution.

 Mentor and upskill junior team members.

 • Experience with basic networking technology, LAN Switching and Routing.
 



 • Deep understanding of TCP/IP (IPv4 and IPv6\\) and IP MPLS knowledge.
 



 • Knowledge in protocols/features like: Routing protocols (ISIS, OSPF, and certainly BGP), Multicast, and all MPLS technologies: MPLS L3VPN. MPLS L2VPN, EVPN technologies, as well as Segment Routing
 



 • Familiarity with service provider platforms like: ASR9k, NCS5k, NCS500, NCS6k and CRS.
 



 • Exceptional communication (written, verbal and presentation) skills
 



  





**Desired Skills (Good to have as value add to this role)** 




 • Experience in broadband (Edge and Aggregation, Cable, Broadband Network Gateway, timing protocols) is desired but not mandatory.
 



 • Basic understandng of Linux/UNIX and familiarity with virtualization is an extra
 



 Strong problem\\-solving skills CX Centres Professional Services
 







**Education \\&/ Additional Cortication’s** 




 • BE/B.Tech/BSC Computer Science or equivalent
 



 • CCNA is must, CCNP is a plus, CCIE (SP) is preferred

title: Al developer
company: Fire Bee Techno Services Pvt Ltd
description:
**About the Role**

We are looking for a passionate and curious **AI Developer (Fresher)** to join our AI engineering team. The ideal candidate should have a good foundation in **programming**, a basic understanding of **machine learning and model training**, and hands\\-on exposure to **AI data pipelines** and **API\\-based AI integrations**.

This role is perfect for someone eager to work on **end\\-to\\-end AI solutions** — from **data preparation and feeding** to **model training, fine\\-tuning**, and **deployment** within production systems. You’ll collaborate with senior engineers and data scientists to build intelligent applications powered by AI.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Assist in **training, fine\\-tuning, and validating AI/ML models** using structured and unstructured datasets.
* Support the **data pipeline** process — data collection, cleaning, annotation, augmentation, and feeding into models.
* Work with teams to **integrate AI models** into web and mobile applications through **RESTful APIs** or SDKs.
* Collaborate on **experiment tracking**, **model evaluation**, and **performance optimization**.
* Implement **automated scripts** for dataset preparation, feature extraction, and training workflows.
* Contribute to **AI integration testing** and **deployment pipelines** using cloud\\-based AI tools.
* Stay current with emerging trends in **machine learning**, **deep learning**, and **AI frameworks**.

**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**

* **Bachelor’s degree** in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related field.
* Strong programming skills in **Python** (must\\-have) and familiarity with libraries like **NumPy**, **Pandas**, and **scikit\\-learn**.
* Basic understanding of **machine learning algorithms**, **model training**, and **evaluation metrics**.
* Exposure to **AI frameworks** such as **TensorFlow**, **Keras**, or **PyTorch**.
* Knowledge of **data preprocessing**, **data annotation**, and **AI data pipelines**.
* Familiarity with **AI API integrations** (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, Google Cloud AI, etc.).
* Good understanding of **RESTful APIs**, **JSON**, and backend service integration.
* Eagerness to learn and work in a fast\\-paced AI development environment.

**Preferred (Nice\\-to\\-Have) Skills**

* Experience with **LLM fine\\-tuning** (e.g., GPT, BERT) or **embedding\\-based retrieval systems**.
* Understanding of **prompt engineering** and **model evaluation techniques**.
* Exposure to **data labeling tools** and **AI dataset management** platforms.
* Knowledge of **AI ethics**, **model bias**, and **data privacy principles**.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: ₹12,542\\.70 \\- ₹59,853\\.77 per month

Work Location: In person

title: AI & ML Intern
description:

**Date:** 28th October 2025  
**Time:** 11:00 AM to 3:00 PM  
**Eligible Passout Year:** 2023 / 2024 / 2025  
**Venue:** Bootcoding Pvt. Ltd.  
110/2, First Floor, near Kamla Nehru College, Old Sakkardara, Somwaripeth, Nagpur  
**Interview Location (Google Map)**  
**Mode:** Offline (In\\-person)

**What to Bring**

* Updated **Resume (2 copies)**
* **Laptop (Compulsory)**

**About the Role**

We are looking for passionate **AI \\& ML Interns** who are eager to explore the world of **Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science**.  
This internship offers **hands\\-on experience** in developing intelligent systems, training models, and working on real\\-world AI/ML projects involving data preprocessing, model building, and deployment.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Work on **Machine Learning models** for classification, regression, and clustering.
* Perform **data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing** using Python libraries.
* Implement **Deep Learning algorithms** using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
* Build **AI\\-based applications** integrating NLP, Computer Vision, or Predictive Analytics.
* Evaluate model performance and optimize for better accuracy.
* Collaborate with data engineers and developers to deploy ML models.
* Research and experiment with **AI\\-driven automation tools**.

**Required Skills**

* Strong knowledge of **Python** and its data libraries (**NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn**).
* Understanding of **Machine Learning algorithms** (Supervised \\& Unsupervised).
* Familiarity with **Deep Learning frameworks** (TensorFlow / Keras / PyTorch).
* Knowledge of **data preprocessing**, feature selection, and model evaluation techniques.
* Basic understanding of **APIs**, **Flask**, or **FastAPI** for model deployment.
* Interest in **AI applications** such as NLP, Chatbots, or Computer Vision.
* Bonus: Familiarity with **Git/GitHub**, **Jupyter Notebooks**, or **Google Colab**.

**Eligibility Criteria**

* B.E / B.Tech / M.E / M.Tech / MCA / BCA students (Passout Year 2023 / 2024 / 2025\\).
* Interest in **Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science**.
* **Laptop is mandatory** during the internship.

**Perks \\& Benefits**

* Internship **Certificate**.
* **Hands\\-on Project Experience** with real\\-world datasets.
* Opportunity for **Pre\\-placement Offer (PPO)** based on performance.
* Mentorship from **experienced AI/ML professionals**.

Exposure to **live AI/ML projects** and cloud deployment environments.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher, Internship  
Contract length: 6 months

Pay: ₹5,000\\.00 \\- ₹20,000\\.00 per month

Work Location: In person

*CyberSapient Technologies* \\| Remote \\| Fresher to 1 Year Experience

Are you passionate about full\\-stack development and eager to work on real\\-world projects? CyberSapient Technologies is inviting applications for our **Remote Full Stack Developer Internship** – a 3\\-month opportunity to learn, build, and grow with a team that’s shaping the future of blockchain, AI, and scalable web platforms.

**About Us:**  
CyberSapient is a digital innovation company helping startups and enterprises build secure, scalable, and future\\-ready platforms. Learn more cybersapient.io

* **Frontend:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js
* **Backend:** Node.js, Express.js

* **Version Control:** Git, GitHub

* Debug and resolve issues across the stack
* Stay updated with emerging tools \\& frameworks

* Final\\-year students, recent grads, or professionals with up to 1 year of experience

* Basic understanding of programming \\& web technologies
* Self\\-driven and comfortable working remotely

### **Job Description**


### **Job Summary**

  

We are looking for enthusiastic and innovative **AR/VR Development Interns** to join our **Simulation Department**. The selected interns will assist in developing immersive simulation and visualization solutions using AR/VR technologies for industrial and engineering applications.

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Assist in developing **AR/VR\\-based simulation projects**.
* Support creation of **interactive 3D environments** that represent real\\-world equipment and processes.
* Work with simulation engineers to convert CAD and 3D models into immersive experiences.
* Implement animations, physics, and user interactions within AR/VR simulations.
* Test and debug simulation modules for performance optimization.
* Research and experiment with new AR/VR tools, SDKs, and techniques to enhance project outcomes.
* Prepare documentation and presentations of assigned tasks and prototypes.

### **Requirements**

* Basic knowledge of **Unity 3D** or **Unreal Engine**.
* Familiarity with **C\\#**, **C\\+\\+**, or **Blueprints**.
* Understanding of **3D modeling and animation tools** (Blender, Maya, or 3ds Max).
* Awareness of **ARCore, ARKit, OpenXR, or Vuforia SDKs**.
* Interest in simulation, real\\-time rendering, and interactive application design.

title: Assistant Trainee Engineer
description:
We are seeking a motivated individual to work on hands\\-on electronics and IoT product development. You will support PCB design, circuit debugging, and product prototyping. This role is perfect for someone with basic electronics knowledge looking to gain practical experience. This is an individual contributor role, not senior\\-level, but also not for complete beginners.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design, assemble, and test PCB prototypes.
* Debug circuits and IoT devices.
* Document processes, schematics, and testing procedures.
* Suggest product optimizations and enhancements.

**Qualifications:**

* Basic knowledge of electronics, PCB design, and circuit assembly.
* Familiarity with IoT modules, sensors, and microcontrollers (Arduino, ESP32, etc.).
* Experience with PCB software like KiCad or Eagle.
* Ability to troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
* C\\+\\+ coding is a plus, but not mandatory.

**Other Details:**

* Individual contributor work at the initial stage.
* On\\-site at **Jambhe, Near Life Republic Kolte Patil,** Pune. No WFH.
* Occasional city travel may be required.
* Weekly holiday on Wednesday.
* No language or appearance barriers—focus is on work quality.

**Why Join Us:**

* Work on real IoT and electronics products from scratch.
* Gain hands\\-on experience in PCB design, prototyping, and debugging.
* Learn from experienced developers and engineers.

### **Job Summary**

  

We are looking for passionate and skilled **Python Developer Interns** to join our **Digital Technology Solutions Department**. The interns will be involved in developing software modules, data\\-driven tools, and digital product solutions for industrial and business applications.

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Design, develop, and test **Python\\-based software components and scripts** for digital products and automation tools.
* Assist in building **web applications**, **APIs**, and **backend services** using Python frameworks such as **Flask** or **Django**.
* Support **data acquisition, transformation, and analysis** workflows from multiple sources (databases, sensors, or APIs).
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to develop integrated **Digital Technology Solutions** for internal and client projects.
* Participate in prototyping, debugging, and performance optimization of developed applications.
* Work on **automation and integration tasks** with IoT, industrial systems, or business process applications.
* Prepare documentation, version control (Git), and maintain structured development records.

### **Requirements**

### **Technical Skills Required**

* Strong foundation in **Python programming** and object\\-oriented design.
* Basic experience with **Flask** or **Django** frameworks for web and API development.
* Familiarity with **SQL / NoSQL databases** (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
* Understanding of **RESTful APIs**, **JSON/XML data formats**, and **integration techniques**.
* Exposure to **data analytics**, **Excel/CSV automation**, or **scripting for data handling**.
* Basic understanding of **IoT communication protocols** (MQTT, Modbus, OPC\\-UA) – desirable.

* Final year students or recent graduates preferred.
* Academic or personal projects demonstrating Python programming proficiency will be an advantage.

title: Assistant Trainee Engineer
description:
We are seeking a motivated individual to work on hands\\-on electronics and IoT product development. You will support PCB design, circuit debugging, and product prototyping. This role is perfect for someone with basic electronics knowledge looking to gain practical experience. This is an individual contributor role, not senior\\-level, but also not for complete beginners.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design, assemble, and test PCB prototypes.
* Debug circuits and IoT devices.
* Document processes, schematics, and testing procedures.
* Suggest product optimizations and enhancements.

**Qualifications:**

* Basic knowledge of electronics, PCB design, and circuit assembly.
* Familiarity with IoT modules, sensors, and microcontrollers (Arduino, ESP32, etc.).
* Experience with PCB software like KiCad or Eagle.
* Ability to troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
* C\\+\\+ coding is a plus, but not mandatory.

**Other Details:**

* Individual contributor work at the initial stage.
* On\\-site at **Jambhe, Near Life Republic Kolte Patil,** Pune. No WFH.
* Occasional city travel may be required.
* Weekly holiday on Wednesday.
* No language or appearance barriers—focus is on work quality.

**Why Join Us:**

* Work on real IoT and electronics products from scratch.
* Gain hands\\-on experience in PCB design, prototyping, and debugging.
* Learn from experienced developers and engineers.

title: Automation Engineer
description:
* Perform regular preventive and corrective maintenance on automated machines, robotics, conveyors, and vision inspection systems.
* Diagnose and repair electrical, mechanical, pneumatic, and software faults on automation equipment.
* Ensure quick recovery of production lines during machine breakdowns.
* Monitor equipment performance and ensure maximum uptime and throughput.
* Conduct root cause analysis for recurring automation issues and implement corrective actions.
* Coordinate with production and process engineering teams to ensure machines meet daily production targets.

**Experience:**

* 3–7 years of experience in automation engineering, preferably in high\\-volume electronics or smartphone manufacturing.
* Hands\\-on experience with robotics (Fanuc, ABB, Yaskawa, etc.), PLCs, and vision inspection systems

title: Robotics Software & Cloud Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Robotics Software \\& Cloud Engineer (Full\\-Time / Part\\-Time)**

**Company:** Symetrix Innovation  
**Location:** Thane, Maharashtra (Hybrid or Remote options available)  
**Position Type:** Full\\-Time and Part\\-Time roles available  
**Industry:** Robotics, Cloud Infrastructure, Symbolic Systems  
**Experience Level:** Mid to Senior  
**Compensation:** Competitive, based on experience and role scope  
**Application:** Send resume and cover letter to \\[your email] with role and time preference

**About Symetrix Innovation**

Symetrix Innovation is a visionary business\\-family ecosystem builder based in Thane, Maharashtra. We design and deploy symbolic service robots across hospitality, retail, and cultural spaces. Our systems integrate hardware platforms from trusted vendors with advanced AI and storytelling layers developed by Syro Labs or equivalent software partners. Our mission is to harmonize tradition, technology, and stakeholder engagement through living systems and legacy\\-driven design.

**Role Summary**

As a Robotics Software \\& Cloud Engineer, you will build both the software that powers individual robots and the cloud infrastructure that manages entire fleets. You’ll create the “brain” of the robot and the “control tower” it reports to — enabling symbolic performance, remote monitoring, and scalable deployment.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **On\\-Robot Software:**

Design and test software for robot perception (vision, sensors), navigation (SLAM, path planning), and manipulation.

* **Cloud Integration:**

Build IoT communication pipelines connecting robots to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

* **Fleet Management:**

Develop cloud services for updates, health monitoring, sensor data collection, and remote task orchestration.

* **Data Engineering:**

Process and analyze large\\-scale robotic data (video feeds, sensor logs) for AI training and symbolic insights.

**Required Qualifications**

**Education (India\\-Specific)**

* **Full\\-Time:**
* B.E./B.Tech in Computer Science, Robotics, Electronics, or Data Engineering
* M.Tech/M.Sc preferred for senior roles
* **Part\\-Time:**
* MCA or PG Diploma in Cloud Computing or Robotics Software
* B.Sc (CS/IT) with strong hands\\-on experience may be considered

**Experience**

* 3–7 years in robotics software, cloud infrastructure, or data engineering
* Experience with ROS and cloud\\-based fleet management preferred

**Technical Skills**

* **Programming:** C\\+\\+, Python
* **Frameworks:** ROS/ROS2, Gazebo
* **Cloud Platforms:** AWS IoT Core, Azure IoT Hub, GCP
* **DevOps:** Docker, Kubernetes
* **Systems:** Algorithms, data structures, networking

**Soft Skills**

* Logical problem\\-solving and debugging
* Clear communication across technical domains
* Adaptability in fast\\-paced environments
* Strategic thinking for symbolic fleet orchestration

**What We Offer**

* Opportunity to shape symbolic robotics at scale
* Collaborate with Syro Labs on symbolic data modeling
* Flexible work arrangements (remote, hybrid, part\\-time)
* Growth into symbolic cloud architecture or AI analytics leadership

Job Types: Full\\-time, Part\\-time, Permanent, Fresher, Internship, Contractual / Temporary, Freelance, Volunteer

Pay: ₹8,289\\.37 \\- ₹18,000\\.00 per month

* Flexible schedule
* Work from home

* Bhiwandi, Maharashtra: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

* 75% (Preferred)

title: LabVIEW Application Engineer
description:
GSK Technologies is a leading technology company specializing in the development and integration of advanced vision systems. We provide innovative solutions to various industries, including manufacturing, automotive, healthcare, and robotics. Our cutting\\-edge technologies enable our clients to optimize processes, improve efficiency, and enhance product quality.

Job Summary: We are seeking a talented and motivated Application Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an Application Engineer specializing in vision systems, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, and implementation of vision\\-based solutions for our clients. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including sales, engineering, and product management, to understand customer requirements and deliver tailored solutions that address their unique needs.

Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with sales and product management teams to identify customer requirements and translate them into technical specifications for vision system applications.
* Design, develop, and implement vision\\-based solutions using industry\\-leading technologies and tools.
* Conduct feasibility studies and proof\\-of\\-concept projects to demonstrate the capabilities and benefits of our vision systems.
* Provide technical support to customers, including troubleshooting, system integration, and training.
* Collaborate with the engineering team to optimize and enhance existing vision system products.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in vision system technologies, industry trends, and best practices.
* Participate in customer meetings, conferences, and trade shows to showcase our vision system capabilities.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Solid understanding of computer vision algorithms, image processing techniques, and machine learning.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or LabVIEW.
* Experience with vision system development tools and frameworks (e.g., OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Familiarity with hardware components used in vision systems, including cameras, lenses, and lighting.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non\\-technical audiences.
* Prior experience in a customer\\-facing role, providing technical support or solutions, is preferred.
* Knowledge of industry\\-specific applications of vision systems (e.g., robotics, quality control, inspection) is a plus.

Benefits:

* Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies and innovative projects.
* Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
* Professional development and training opportunities.
* Room for growth and advancement within the company.

Join our team and contribute to the development of groundbreaking vision systems that shape the future of various industries. Apply now and be part of our exciting journey!

title: LabVIEW Application Engineer
description:
GSK Technologies is a leading technology company specializing in the development and integration of advanced vision systems. We provide innovative solutions to various industries, including manufacturing, automotive, healthcare, and robotics. Our cutting\\-edge technologies enable our clients to optimize processes, improve efficiency, and enhance product quality.

Job Summary: We are seeking a talented and motivated Application Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an Application Engineer specializing in vision systems, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, and implementation of vision\\-based solutions for our clients. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including sales, engineering, and product management, to understand customer requirements and deliver tailored solutions that address their unique needs.

Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with sales and product management teams to identify customer requirements and translate them into technical specifications for vision system applications.
* Design, develop, and implement vision\\-based solutions using industry\\-leading technologies and tools.
* Conduct feasibility studies and proof\\-of\\-concept projects to demonstrate the capabilities and benefits of our vision systems.
* Provide technical support to customers, including troubleshooting, system integration, and training.
* Collaborate with the engineering team to optimize and enhance existing vision system products.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in vision system technologies, industry trends, and best practices.
* Participate in customer meetings, conferences, and trade shows to showcase our vision system capabilities.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Solid understanding of computer vision algorithms, image processing techniques, and machine learning.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or LabVIEW.
* Experience with vision system development tools and frameworks (e.g., OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Familiarity with hardware components used in vision systems, including cameras, lenses, and lighting.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non\\-technical audiences.
* Prior experience in a customer\\-facing role, providing technical support or solutions, is preferred.
* Knowledge of industry\\-specific applications of vision systems (e.g., robotics, quality control, inspection) is a plus.

Benefits:

* Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies and innovative projects.
* Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
* Professional development and training opportunities.
* Room for growth and advancement within the company.

Join our team and contribute to the development of groundbreaking vision systems that shape the future of various industries. Apply now and be part of our exciting journey!

Pay: ₹12,460\\.30 \\- ₹35,037\\.77 per month

title: Performance Testing – Fresher
description:
***AutoRABIT Profile***








*AutoRABIT is the leader in DevSecOps for SaaS platforms such as Salesforce. Its unique metadata\\-aware capability makes Release Management, Version Control, and Backup \\& Recovery complete, reliable, and effective. AutoRABIT’s highly scalable framework covers the entire DevSecOps cycle, which makes it the favourite platform for companies, especially large ones who require enterprise strength and robustness in their deployment environment. AutoRABIT increases the productivity and confidence of developers which makes it a critical tool for development teams, especially large ones with complex applications. AutoRABIT has institutional funding and is well positioned for growth. Headquartered in the CA, USA and with customers worldwide, AutoRABIT is a place for bringing your creativity to the most demanding SaaS marketplace.
   

  

**Job Role***
 We are looking for a motivated Performance Testing Trainee/Engineer who has completed training in performance testing tools and methodologies from a reputed institute. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of testing concepts, scripting, and performance analysis techniques and a strong willingness to learn and grow in a real\\-world environment.
 







***Roles \\& Responsibilities***





* Assist in the design, development, and execution of performance test scripts using tools like JMeter.
* Support the team in creating and executing performance test scenarios (Load, Stress, and Volume tests).
* Learn to analyze performance test results and contribute to performance optimization recommendations.
* Participate in test planning, environment setup, and monitoring activities under senior team members’ guidance.
* Gain exposure to APM tools such as Elastic APM, Grafana, or Datadog to monitor and analyze application performance.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and operations teams to understand performance requirements and simulate real\\-world loads.
* Learn and assist in identifying performance bottlenecks, memory issues, and scalability problems.
* Support in documenting test results, preparing reports, and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
* Should be able to do Functional Testing and writing test cases.
* Responsibility to adhere to set internal controls





***Desired Skills and Knowledge***





* **Performance Testing Tools** 
 : JMeter (hands\\-on practice during training).
* **Cloud \\& Infrastructure Basics:** 
 Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Tomcat.
* Databases: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.
* **Monitoring \\& Profiling** 
 : Awareness of Elastic APM, JVM profiling, and system resource monitoring.
* **Programming/Scripting** 
 : Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or Shell scripting.
* **Automation Testing (Good to Have)** 
 : Selenium with Java, TestNG, Rest Assured, Postman, or API Testing.
* **Other Tools** 
 : Exposure to Jira, Confluence, and version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, GitLab).
* **Additional Advantage** 
 : Understanding of Salesforce and its ecosystem.





***Education***





* Bachelor of Technology
 *or equivalent degree.*





***Location:** 
  Hyderabad
   

**Freshers**
**Compensation:** 
 6 LPA
   

**Website:** 
  www.autorabit.com*
