title: Web Development Intern
description:
**Position:** 
 Web Development Intern
 



**Work Mode:** 
 Remote (Work From Home)
 



**Experience Level:** 
 Fresher / Entry\\-Level
 



**Stipend:** 
 ₹25,000 per month
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Working Days:** 
 Monday to Friday (5 Days a Week)
 



  





**About the Company** 




 We are a technology\\-focused organization dedicated to building innovative digital solutions for modern businesses. Our team works on a range of projects—from interactive web applications to scalable backend systems—combining creativity with practical problem\\-solving. We value curiosity, clean code, and collaboration, and we’re looking for interns who share that mindset.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re looking for a motivated Web Development Intern who is eager to gain hands\\-on experience working with both frontend and backend technologies. This internship is ideal for students or recent graduates who want to strengthen their understanding of full stack web development through real\\-world projects and mentorship from experienced developers.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites and web applications using modern technologies.
* Write clean, efficient, and well\\-structured code with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Angular, or Node.js.
* Integrate APIs and manage data using databases like MySQL or MongoDB.
* Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend developers to ensure seamless functionality and design consistency.
* Debug, test, and optimize web applications for better performance, usability, and scalability.
* Stay updated with emerging web technologies, frameworks, and best practices in development.



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications** 



* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Fundamental understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles.
* Basic knowledge of frontend frameworks (React.js, Angular, or Vue.js) and backend development concepts.
* Familiarity with version control systems like Git/GitHub.
* Good grasp of UI/UX principles and problem\\-solving skills.
* Eagerness to learn, take initiative, and work collaboratively within a team.



  





**Good to Have** 



* Exposure to Node.js, Express, or Next.js.
* Experience working with REST APIs and database design.
* Understanding of deployment and hosting (e.g., Netlify, Vercel, AWS).
* Portfolio, GitHub projects, or personal coding examples demonstrating your work.



  





**What You’ll Gain** 



* Practical experience building real\\-world web projects from start to finish.
* Mentorship and guidance from experienced developers.
* Exposure to both frontend and backend workflows in a modern development environment.
* Opportunity to enhance your technical portfolio and boost employability.
* Monthly stipend of ₹25,000 for the internship duration.



  





**Who Should Apply** 




 This opportunity is well\\-suited for aspiring Web Developers, Frontend Developers, or Full Stack Developers who want to gain meaningful, hands\\-on experience in professional software development. Whether you’re a recent graduate or a self\\-taught coder, we value your curiosity, commitment, and drive to build great products.

title: External Graduate
description:
This role has been designated as ‘Remote/Teleworker’, which means you will primarily work from home.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge\\-to\\-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
***Job Family Definition:***
 The job family spans across multiple engineering disciplines. Work consists of designing, developing, analyzing, troubleshooting and debugging systems, software and solutions for research and/or research development of product, services, and solutions for HPE’s portfolio. Requires a broad knowledge and application of engineering disciplines, methodologies and tools.
   

  

 Job Family Definition for Executive Levels only: Directs and manages a diverse team of engineering professionals performing research, development, design and/or implementation of products, services, solutions for the company’s portfolio. Responsible for creating and communicating technical strategy within the organization and/or across the function.
   

  

**Management Level Definition**
 Contributes to assignments of limited scope by applying technical concepts and theoretical knowledge acquired through specialized training, education, or previous experience. Acts as team member by providing information, analysis and recommendations in support of team efforts. Exercises independent judgment within defined parameters.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Designs portions of engineering solutions utilizing multiple engineering disciplines for products, systems, software, and solutions based on established engineering principles and in accordance with provided specifications and requirements
* Implements established test plans for existing designs, including validation of mechanical, electrical, software, and other engineering specifications and requirements.
* Develops understanding of and relationship with internal and outsourced development partners on engineering design and development.
* Participates as a member of project team of other engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable, cost effective and high quality solutions for low to moderately\\- complex products.


**Education And Experience Required**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or other Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.
* Typically 0\\-2 years experience.


**Knowledge And Skills**
* Experience or understanding of appropriate engineering design tools and software packages.
* Good analytical and problem solving skills.
* Basic understanding of material properties and hardware and electrical component design.
* Good written and verbal communication skills; mastery in English and local language.


**Additional Skills**
 Cloud Architectures, Cross Domain Knowledge, Design Thinking, Development Fundamentals, DevOps, Distributed Computing, Microservices Fluency, Full Stack Development, Security\\-First Mindset, User Experience (UX)
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health \\& Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal \\& Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Unconditional Inclusion**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.
   

  

**Let's Stay Connected**
 Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.
   

  

**Job**
 Engineering
   

  

**Job Level**
 TCP\\_01
   

  

 HPE is an Equal Employment Opportunity/ Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, or any other protected category, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. Please click here: Equal Employment Opportunity.
   

  

**Hewlett Packard Enterprise is EEO Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities.**
 HPE will comply with all applicable laws related to employer use of arrest and conviction records, including laws requiring employers to consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories.

India

Investment Bank

328644BR

Hyderabad

Full Time
**Your role**


Do you have a flair for Settlements \\& Client Servicing ?  

Do you have a good understanding of Settlements , Corporate Actions \\& Client Service ?  

Are you interested in supporting our teams to provide a top quality service to our clients
  

  

Do you thrive in a dynamic and collaborative environment? We're looking for someone like that to:  

– Be part of our Securities Settlements teams in Hyderabad / Pune
  

– Be responsible for either Matching of trades , Settlement investigation , CSDR Penalties , Buyin management , Reconciliations , escalations \\& query management
  

– Working with teams on root cause analysis and suggest and implement process improvements  

– Take responsibility for appropriate exception escalation and coordinate resolution delivery with relevant parties
**Your team**


You’ll be working in the Securities Settlements team working closely with the Corporate Actions processing and Client teams, who are based in Americas, Europe, Asia and in Hyderabad.
**Your expertise**


You have:  

– 0\\-7 Years of experience a an EE level or 7 plus for an AO level.  

– Freshers with accounting/finance or related degree. For certain roles we would also pursue other degrees like CS, BTech, Analytics etc  

– An understanding of front to back trade flow and experience working in a settlements function  

– Good understanding of financial markets, products and processes or of the subjects you have passed out as part of your academic curriculum  

– A clear communication style  

– The ability to identify root causes of issues and drive/ implement changes as required
  

– An awareness of when to escalate  

– Having a pragmatic "can do" attitude
  

– An innovative approach to solving day\\-to\\-day process problems  

– Knowledge of Automation tools would be an added advantage  

  

You are:  

– Both client, and risk focused with proven ability to paying attention to detail  

– An enthusiastic and dedicated team player who is able to collaborate across functions to deliver results  

– Highly responsible, self\\-motivated, efficient and able to work under pressure  

– Able to identify root causes of issues and drive/implement changes  

– Enthusiastic, able to make an impact and keen to build relationships internally and externally
  

– continually looking to improve your own skill sets  

– Dependable, reliable and accountable for own behavior. Additionally, act within professional, legal and ethical boundaries  

– Willing to work in any shift that might be required by the Business supporting our functions.  

– Great team player
**About us**


UBS is the world’s largest and the only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal \\& Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.  

  

We have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries.
**Join us**


At UBS, we know that it's our people, with their diverse skills, experiences and backgrounds, who drive our ongoing success. We’re dedicated to our craft and passionate about putting our people first, with new challenges, a supportive team, opportunities to grow and flexible working options when possible. Our inclusive culture brings out the best in our employees, wherever they are on their career journey. And we use artificial intelligence (AI) to work smarter and more efficiently. We also recognize that great work is never done alone. That’s why collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. Because together, we’re more than ourselves.  

  

We’re committed to disability inclusion and if you need reasonable accommodation/adjustments throughout our recruitment process, you can always contact us.

UBS Recruiting
**Disclaimer / Policy statements**


UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

title: Team Lead - Production
company: Highrange - Rubber & Coir Products Pvt. Ltd
description:
**1\\. Production Execution \\& Target Achievement**

* Ensure daily production targets are met, adjusting for mould changes as needed.
* Monitor production efficiency and resolve bottlenecks proactively.
* Conduct random production checks to verify actual output.
* Maintain real\\-time production records
* Identify and report process inefficiencies or delays to the Factory Manager.
* Ensure curing time has been adhered before moving the mats to the next stage

**2\\. Waste Reduction \\& Flash Control**

* Implement process improvements to minimize flash formation during moulding.
* Regularly inspect flash accumulation and take corrective actions.
* Train workers on proper mould handling and compound usage to reduce flash waste.
* Work with the maintenance team to ensure proper mould fitting and alignment.

**3\\. Rejection Management**

* Monitor rejection rates and take corrective actions to minimize defects.
* Conduct compound weight checks to ensure consistency in batches.
* Immediately report high rejection rates or unusual defects to the Factory Manager as well as the QC.

**4\\. Machine \\& Equipment Oversight**

* Conduct routine inspections to ensure all machines (presses, intermix mills, moulding units) are operating efficiently.
* Oversee and assist in mould changes as per production requirements.
* Identify machine issues and coordinate with the maintenance team for repairs.
* Ensure machines are operated safely and optimally for consistent production output.

**5\\. Raw Material Handling \\& Inventory Control**

* Supervise the distribution and usage of raw materials (rubber compound, oil, chemicals).
* Ensure correct formulation is used during mixing and production processes.
* Conduct weight and count checks for mixed rubber before production.
* Monitor stock levels and request replenishment when needed.
* Oversee loading and movement of raw materials into production lines and vehicles.

**6\\. Shift Planning \\& Workforce Management**

* Conduct Daily huddle calls or standup calls to engage with the workforce and plan out production for the day.
* Check daily manpower availability and report shortages to the Factory Manager.
* Assign workers to production lines based on skills and availability.
* Handle workforce conflicts and shop floor discipline.
* Train new workers on job\\-specific tasks, including mixing compounds and operating presses.
* Monitor worker attendance and ensure compliance with shift schedules.
* Source manpower when in shortage

**7\\. Reporting \\& Documentation**

* Maintain accurate records of production output, raw material usage, flash waste, and quality checks.
* Submit daily reports to the Factory Manager on production figures, rejection rates, flash levels, and manpower status.
* Ensure compliance with company SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) for documentation.

**8\\. Miscellaneous Responsibilities**

* Keeping the work floor clean and hygienic at the beginning \\& end of the shift **Facility \\& Hygiene Management**
* Ensure the **hygiene and cleanliness** of the **factory floor throughout production time.**
* Document cleanliness records in the **housekeeping file**.
* Ensure mandatory health and safety trainings and updates are provided to the workers \\& maintain training reports

title: Bid Manager
description:
**JD – Bid Manager (Full Cycle Bid Ownership Role)**

**Role:** Executive / Senior Executive – Bid Manager **Location:** Noida – Onsite **Experience:** 1–3 years (Freshers with strong analytical and technical interest may apply)

**About the Role**

We are looking for a **Bid Manager** who will take complete ownership of the daily bid process — from identifying opportunities to ensuring timely submission. The role requires an individual who is organized, detail\\-oriented, and capable of managing multiple bids simultaneously while coordinating with internal teams and external suppliers.

The Bid Manager will be responsible for **meeting daily bid targets**, ensuring **competitive pricing**, and maintaining **100% on\\-time bid submissions**.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Plan and meet daily bid targets** as per management goals.
* **Source/get sourced relevant bids** daily from GEM, IREPS, and other government/corporate procurement portals.
* **Coordinate bid price sourcing** by identifying suppliers/vendors and obtaining competitive quotations.
* **Evaluate quotations** technically and commercially to prepare cost sheets and price comparisons.
* **Own the end\\-to\\-end bid submission process** — from sourcing to price finalization to submission.
* **Ensure all bids are submitted on time**, error\\-free, and fully compliant with technical and commercial requirements.
* **Track bid status** (submitted, under evaluation, awarded, lost) and prepare daily/weekly progress reports.
* **Maintain bid database**, supplier database, and historical pricing information for future reference.
* **Coordinate with internal teams** (technical, documentation, accounts) to gather necessary inputs for bid completion.
* **Continuously improve** process efficiency and accuracy in bid preparation and price sourcing.

**Requirements**

* Graduate/Diploma in Engineering (Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical, Industrial, or related discipline).
* 0–3 years of experience in **bidding, tender management, or procurement** (Government / Corporate).
* Strong **MS Excel** skills (formulas, comparison sheets, data organization).
* Excellent **Internet research and analytical ability** to identify opportunities and compare specifications.
* Strong attention to detail, deadline orientation, and multitasking capability.
* Good **communication and coordination skills** to liaise with suppliers and internal stakeholders.
* Understanding of **technical product specifications** in electrical/mechanical/electronic items is preferred.
* **Ownership mindset** – ability to manage bids independently and ensure timely completion.

**Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)**

* Daily bid target achievement (% of planned vs submitted).
* Bid submission accuracy (no errors or rejections).
* Average turnaround time per bid.
* Cost competitiveness / win rate improvement.
* Supplier engagement and price sourcing efficiency.

**Why Join Us**

* Opportunity to work directly in the **defense and industrial procurement sector**.
* Exposure to **complete tender lifecycle management** and strategic sourcing.
* Growth path towards Senior Bid Manager / Procurement Lead roles.
* Fast\\-paced, performance\\-driven environment with a focus on ownership and results.

title: QA Engineer, Intern
description:
**About Dialpad**  

Dialpad is the leading Ai\\-powered customer communications platform, transforming how businesses communicate with their customers. More than 50,000 companies around the globe — including Netflix, RE/MAX, Uber, Randstad, and Tractor Supply — rely on Dialpad to build stronger customer connections using real\\-time, Ai\\-driven insights. Visit dialpad.com to learn more.  

  

**Being a Dialer**  

At Dialpad, you'll be part of a collaborative team working toward our shared mission of making our customers and their employees wildly successful. We believe that every conversation matters, and we're elevating each one with a platform that drives real\\-time insights and automation for our customers.  

  

We thrive on continuous evolution, where every employee leverages industry\\-leading Ai to constantly refine our platform and our own skills. We seek individuals who not only meet our high standards but go beyond them. Our ambition is significant, and achieving it requires a team that operates at the highest level. We look for individuals who are not just ambitious but who also possess the traits that are fundamental to our success: **Scrappy, Curious, Optimistic, Persistent,** and **Empathetic**.

 **Your role**  

Our Quality Assurance (QA) team is the guardian of our product's excellence, ensuring its quality, reliability, and usability. We achieve this by collaborating closely with developers, designers, and stakeholders to identify and resolve issues. Our mission is to deliver high\\-quality, seamless experiences to our end users. As a QA Engineer Intern, you will contribute to our quality initiatives. You will focus on developing and executing a mix of functional and automated tests to validate the functionality, performance, and reliability of our cutting\\-edge web and mobile applications. The position reports to our Functional QA Manager and offers the opportunity to be based in our Bangalore, India office. It's a hybrid position, requiring three days of work from the office in Bangalore, and it is a 1\\-year contract opportunity.


**What you'll do**


* Define the scope of functional testing based on application complexity and criticality.
* Develop reusable and maintainable automated test scripts for our web and mobile applications.
* Integrate automated tests into our CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient and continuous execution.
* Execute tests across a wide range of browsers, devices, and operating systems to ensure comprehensive coverage.
* Analyze test results, debug issues, track defects, and collaborate closely with developers to see them through to resolution.
* Generate comprehensive test reports, including execution summaries, defect tracking, and coverage metrics to provide clear insights into product quality.


**Skills You'll Bring**


* 1 to 2 years of hands\\-on experience in mobile and/or web application testing.
* BS in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field. Freshers with experience/training in Quality Engineering and Automation are welcome to apply.
* Strong technical skills in automated testing frameworks (e.g., Appium, Robot, Selenium, Cucumber, TestNG).
* Proficiency in at least one programming language, preferably Java or Python.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, written, and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to multitask and manage priorities across multiple projects simultaneously.
* Experience in VoIP, telecommunications, or related communication technologies is a significant plus.


We believe in investing in our people. Dialpad offers competitive benefits and perks, alongside a robust training program that helps you reach your full potential. We have designed our offices to be inclusive, offering a vibrant environment to cultivate collaboration and connection. Our exceptional culture, recognized repeatedly as a certified Great Place to Work, ensures every employee feels valued and empowered to contribute to our collective success.



Don't meet every single requirement? If you're excited about this role and you possess the fundamental traits, the drive, and strong ambition we seek, but your experience doesn't satisfy every qualification, we encourage you to apply.



Dialpad is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We are dedicated to creating a community of inclusion and an environment free from discrimination or harassment.

In Doff Estates \\& Consultants Pvt Ltd, the role of a BDE (often called a *Property Consultant*, *Sales Executive*, or *Real Estate Agent*) is central to driving revenue through property sales and client relationship management.

**Primary Responsibilities:**

**1\\. Client Handling**

* Interact with walk\\-in clients, online inquiries, and leads from marketing teams.
* Understand the client's needs (budget, location preference, purpose—investment or end\\-use).
* Suggest suitable projects or properties accordingly.

**2\\. Property Showcasing**

* Arrange and conduct site visits for clients.
* Explain project features, layouts, amenities, legal aspects, and payment plans.
* Highlight location advantages, future prospects, and investment value.

**3\\. Sales \\& Negotiation**

* Provide pricing and offers clearly to clients.

**4\\. Documentation Support**

* Assist clients with booking formalities, application forms, and KYC paperwork.
* Coordinate with the legal or CRM team for sale agreements and registration process.

**5\\. Follow\\-up \\& Lead Management**

* Maintain regular follow\\-ups with potential buyers.
* Update CRM or lead tracking systems.
* Work on hot/warm/cold leads depending on the sales cycle.

**6\\. Target Achievement**

* Work under monthly or quarterly sales targets.
* Generate new leads via referrals, walk\\-ins, channel partners, or cold calls.
* Report performance and pipeline status to managers.

**Skills Required:**

title: Sr. Digital Marketing Executive
description:
Senior Marketing Manager (Digital, SaaS \\& Cloud Services)

Experience: 7–10 years Location: Gurgaon / Jaipur

Overview

We’re seeking a Senior Marketing Manager who can bridge creativity with strategy to drive brand

visibility, lead generation, and business growth across Concret.io’s two core business lines:

1\\. Professional IT \\& Salesforce Services

2\\. Proprietary SaaS, AI \\& Cloud\\-based Products and Accelerators

This is both a strategic and hands\\-on leadership role. You’ll lead a cross\\-functional marketing

team, manage campaigns, guide product launches, and execute data\\-driven growth strategies

aligned with company objectives.

Key Responsibilities

1\\. Marketing Strategy \\& Planning

● Develop and execute innovative, data\\-driven marketing strategies for both service and

product verticals.

● Define positioning, messaging, and differentiation for enterprise services and SaaS

products.

● Translate business objectives into actionable marketing roadmaps and KPIs.

● Identify and leverage emerging trends such as AI\\-driven marketing, social commerce, and

automation.

● Ensure strong alignment between product marketing, digital campaigns, and sales

enablement.

2\\. Team Leadership \\& Growth

● Lead and inspire a hybrid marketing team (SEO, content, design, and social media

specialists).

● Conduct daily virtual huddles for progress tracking, feedback, and collaboration.

● Identify skill gaps and collaborate with HR or freelance platforms (e.g., Upwork) to onboard

additional talent.

● Foster a culture of creativity, accountability, and continuous learning within the team.

3\\. Digital Marketing \\& Execution

● Oversee SEO, SEM, content, social media, and email marketing strategies.

● Ensure consistent brand tone and high\\-quality output across blogs, landing pages,

podcasts, and social channels.

● Manage performance marketing campaigns and optimize for ROI.

● Leverage tools such as Zoho Projects, Google Analytics, and Mailchimp for campaign

tracking and reporting.

● Continuously experiment with new\\-age SEO and AI\\-enabled marketing techniques.

4\\. Campaigns, Product Launches \\& Lead Generation

● Plan and execute integrated campaigns for both service offerings and productlaunches.

● Develop and manage go\\-to\\-market strategies for SaaS, AI, and cloud\\-native tools (content,

demos, AppExchange listings, and outreach).

● Drive measurable increases in leads, conversions, and customer engagement.

5\\. Measurement, Reporting \\& Optimization

● Define and track KPIs such as lead generation, conversion rates, engagement, and

marketing ROI.

● Conduct weekly and monthly reviews to assess progress and align future campaigns.

● Create actionable insights, dashboards, and reports for leadership visibility.

6\\. Process \\& Innovation

● Establish clear workflows, documentation, and reporting frameworks using Zoho Projects.

● Implement best practices in marketing automation, CRM usage, and analytics.

● Encourage ongoing tool adoption and innovation within the team.

Qualifications

● Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field (Master’s preferred).

● 7–10 years of progressive marketing experience, including 3\\+ years in leadership roles.

● Proven success in digital marketing for IT services, cloud computing, or SaaS/AI products.

● Deep expertise in SEO/SEM, content strategy, analytics, and automation tools.

● Experience with Zoho Projects, Salesforce, Google Analytics, and Mailchimp.

● Strong communication, analytical, and leadership abilities.

● Experience managing distributed teams and freelance contributors.

Success Metrics

● Consistent achievement of KPIs: lead growth, conversion rates, and product adoption.

● A motivated and high\\-performing team operating with independence and ownership.

● Strategic campaigns enhancing Concret.io’s visibility in the Salesforce and SaaS ecosystem.

● Scalable processes and measurable impact across both services and product lines.

Work Environment

We embrace a hybrid work model, with collaboration encouraged at our Gurgaon and Jaipur

offices. The ideal candidate will participate regularly in on\\-site brainstorming, campaign reviews,

and leadership sessions.

About Concret.io

Founded in 2014 by Abhinav Gupta and Anjana Gupta, Concret.io thrives on innovation,

ownership, and continuous learning.

● Learning Never Stops: We fund certifications and offer continuous upskilling in tech and

marketing.

● You’re in Charge: Every team member owns their outcomes — we celebrate wins and

accountability alike.

● Aiming for Excellence: Quality, creativity, and clear communication define everything we

do.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

title: Team Lead - Production
company: Highrange - Rubber & Coir Products Pvt. Ltd
description:
**1\\. Production Execution \\& Target Achievement**

* Ensure daily production targets are met, adjusting for mould changes as needed.
* Monitor production efficiency and resolve bottlenecks proactively.
* Conduct random production checks to verify actual output.
* Maintain real\\-time production records
* Identify and report process inefficiencies or delays to the Factory Manager.
* Ensure curing time has been adhered before moving the mats to the next stage

**2\\. Waste Reduction \\& Flash Control**

* Implement process improvements to minimize flash formation during moulding.
* Regularly inspect flash accumulation and take corrective actions.
* Train workers on proper mould handling and compound usage to reduce flash waste.
* Work with the maintenance team to ensure proper mould fitting and alignment.

**3\\. Rejection Management**

* Monitor rejection rates and take corrective actions to minimize defects.
* Conduct compound weight checks to ensure consistency in batches.
* Immediately report high rejection rates or unusual defects to the Factory Manager as well as the QC.

**4\\. Machine \\& Equipment Oversight**

* Conduct routine inspections to ensure all machines (presses, intermix mills, moulding units) are operating efficiently.
* Oversee and assist in mould changes as per production requirements.
* Identify machine issues and coordinate with the maintenance team for repairs.
* Ensure machines are operated safely and optimally for consistent production output.

**5\\. Raw Material Handling \\& Inventory Control**

* Supervise the distribution and usage of raw materials (rubber compound, oil, chemicals).
* Ensure correct formulation is used during mixing and production processes.
* Conduct weight and count checks for mixed rubber before production.
* Monitor stock levels and request replenishment when needed.
* Oversee loading and movement of raw materials into production lines and vehicles.

**6\\. Shift Planning \\& Workforce Management**

* Conduct Daily huddle calls or standup calls to engage with the workforce and plan out production for the day.
* Check daily manpower availability and report shortages to the Factory Manager.
* Assign workers to production lines based on skills and availability.
* Handle workforce conflicts and shop floor discipline.
* Train new workers on job\\-specific tasks, including mixing compounds and operating presses.
* Monitor worker attendance and ensure compliance with shift schedules.
* Source manpower when in shortage

**7\\. Reporting \\& Documentation**

* Maintain accurate records of production output, raw material usage, flash waste, and quality checks.
* Submit daily reports to the Factory Manager on production figures, rejection rates, flash levels, and manpower status.
* Ensure compliance with company SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) for documentation.

**8\\. Miscellaneous Responsibilities**

* Keeping the work floor clean and hygienic at the beginning \\& end of the shift **Facility \\& Hygiene Management**
* Ensure the **hygiene and cleanliness** of the **factory floor throughout production time.**
* Document cleanliness records in the **housekeeping file**.
* Ensure mandatory health and safety trainings and updates are provided to the workers \\& maintain training reports

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

description:
**Company Description**  

BETSOL is a cloud\\-first digital transformation and data management company offering products and IT services to enterprises in over 40 countries. BETSOL team holds several engineering patents, is recognized with industry awards, and BETSOL maintains a net promoter score that is 2x the industry average. BETSOL’s open\\-source backup and recovery product line, Zmanda (Zmanda.com), delivers up to 80% savings in total cost of ownership (TCO) and best\\-in\\-class performance. BETSOL Global IT Services (BETSOL.com) builds and supports end\\-to\\-end enterprise solutions, reducing time\\-to\\-market for its customers. BETSOL offices are set against the vibrant backdrops of Broomfield, Colorado and Bangalore, India. We take pride in being an employee\\-centric organization, offering comprehensive health insurance, competitive salaries, 401K, volunteer programs, and scholarship opportunities. Office amenities include a fitness center, cafe, and recreational facilities. Learn more at betsol.com.

Years of Experience:


 1 – 3 years of experience in Technical Support / BPO industry, preferably both in chat and Voice process.


Freshers can also apply.

 Detail and analytical orientation

title: Quality Control Assistant – PLYWOOD MANUFATERING (LVL Production) COMPANY
description:
**Job Title:** Quality Control Assistant – PLYWOOD MANUFACTERING ( LVL Production)

**Job Summary:**

The Quality Control Assistant will support the QC team in monitoring and maintaining product quality in the **LVL (Laminated Veneer Lumber)** production line. The role involves checking raw materials, monitoring production parameters, and ensuring the final product meets company and ISI quality standards.

**Key Roles \\& Responsibilities:**

* Assist in inspecting **veneers, resin mix, and LVL panels** during various stages of production.
* Record process parameters such as **moisture content, thickness, temperature, and pressing time**.
* Support in conducting basic quality tests (bonding strength, density, and dimensional accuracy).
* Maintain daily **quality inspection reports** and communicate non\\-conformities to the QC Manager.
* Ensure proper **stacking, labeling, and identification** of approved and rejected materials.
* Help in monitoring **adhesive preparation and glue spread rate** during LVL production.
* Coordinate with production staff to maintain quality consistency as per set standards.
* Follow all **safety and housekeeping** rules in the QC and production areas.
* Assist during **internal and external quality audits**.
* Report any equipment malfunction or material quality issue immediately to superiors.

**Key Skills:**

* Basic understanding of plywood/LVL production process.
* Knowledge of quality inspection methods and tools.
* Attention to detail and record\\-keeping skills.
* Teamwork and communication ability.

**Qualification \\& Experience:**

* **Qualification:** ITI / Diploma in Wood Technology or any **wood/plywood\\-related course**.
* **Experience:** Minimum **1 year experience** in a plywood or LVL manufacturing unit.
* **Freshers may also apply.**
* **Gender:** Male candidates preferred.

**Salary:** Best in the industry (based on qualification and experience).

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹18,000\\.00 \\- ₹20,000\\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Health insurance

Work Location: In person

title: Sales Executive- Networking
description:
Job Title: Sales Executive\\- Networking

Location: Kerala

Job Type: Full\\-time

Experience: 1–5 years (Freshers with good communication and technical understanding may apply)

Industry: IT Infrastructure / Networking \\- Passive

Job Summary:

We are seeking a motivated and knowledgeable Passive Networking Sales Executive to promote and sell passive network infrastructure solutions such as structured cabling systems, fiber optics, server racks, faceplates, patch panels, and conduits. The candidate should have a strong understanding of passive networking components and a passion for customer relationship building and sales.

Key Responsibilities:

* Identify and develop business opportunities for passive networking solutions.
* Promote products like UTP/STP cables, fiber optic cables, LIUs, patch panels, racks, cable managers, conduits, and related accessories.
* Understand client requirements and propose suitable passive infrastructure designs and BOMs.
* Work closely with consultants, system integrators, IT heads, and project managers to specify solutions.
* Prepare quotations, follow up on leads, and convert inquiries into orders.
* Coordinate with the technical team for installation planning and support.
* Stay updated on vendor / competition products
* Achieve monthly sales targets and report to the sales manager.
* Visit customer sites, attend meetings, and build strong relationships.

Key Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, or related field (Diploma holders with experience can also apply).
* Minimum 1 year of experience in passive networking product sales preferred.
* Strong knowledge of structured cabling standards (Cat6, Cat6A, Cat7, Fiber, etc.).
* Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to understand technical drawings and cabling layouts (preferred).
* Self\\-motivated with a target\\-oriented mindset.
* Willingness to travel to customer sites and project locations.

Preferred Skills/Certifications:

Knowledge of TIA/EIA cabling standards.

Familiarity with AutoCAD layouts and BOQ preparation (added advantage).

Product training certifications from leading OEMs (optional).

Salary \\& Benefits:

Travel allowance or reimbursement

Career growth and promotion opportunities

title: Social Media Marketing (Fresher)
description:
**About The Opportunity**
 A fast\\-growing player in the Digital Marketing and Remote Talent Enablement sector, we deliver data\\-driven social campaigns and creative content that drive brand growth, lead generation, and audience engagement across B2B and B2C markets. We operate as a remote\\-first team serving global clients with measurable performance outcomes and rapid experimentation.
   

  

 We are hiring a Social Media Manager (Remote — India) to own end\\-to\\-end social strategy, execution, and optimization across organic and paid channels. This role suits a hands\\-on marketer who combines creative instincts with analytical rigor to scale reach, engagement, and conversions.
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Define and execute platform\\-level social strategies (Facebook/Instagram, LinkedIn, X, TikTok, YouTube) that align with business KPIs and campaign objectives.
* Plan and maintain the content calendar: brief creators, write platform\\-optimized copy, and supervise production of short\\-form video and static assets.
* Set up, manage, and optimize paid social campaigns (audience targeting, creative testing, bidding, budget allocation) to maximize ROAS and lower CPA.
* Track performance using GA4 and native platform analytics; produce weekly and monthly insights reports with clear recommendations and action plans.
* Lead community management and social listening: respond to audience, escalate issues, and translate feedback into product/creative improvements.
* Coordinate with designers, content creators, and external partners (influencers, agencies) to scale content production and run A/B tests for continuous improvement.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
 Must\\-Have
   

  

* 3\\+ years managing social media for brands or agencies with demonstrable campaign results.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Meta Ads Manager and running full\\-funnel paid social campaigns.
* Proficiency with Google Analytics 4 and platform analytics to measure funnel performance and attribution.
* Proven ability to plan and manage content calendars and production workflows for multi\\-platform delivery.
* Experience producing and optimizing short\\-form video (Reels, Shorts, TikTok) for engagement and conversion.
* Familiarity with social listening tools and community management best practices.


**Preferred**
* Hands\\-on experience with TikTok Ads and creative testing for short\\-form content.
* Experience with LinkedIn Campaign Manager for B2B lead generation.
* Exposure to influencer marketing platforms and managing creator partnerships.


 Benefits \\& Culture Highlights
   

  

* Fully remote role with India\\-based hiring — flexible hours and asynchronous collaboration.
* Ownership of social strategy and creative experimentation with rapid learning cycles.
* Collaborative, growth\\-oriented team with opportunities for career progression and skill development.


 About the employer: Globelance is a remote\\-first company connecting talent and clients worldwide. We value measurable impact, creativity, and continuous improvement. If you are a data\\-driven social marketer who thrives in a fast\\-paced remote environment, apply with a portfolio of campaigns and examples of content that moved metrics.
   

  

 Skills: google analytics,hootsuite,social media,content calender,linkedin,communication

**About Workido IT Technologies LLP:**

Workido IT Technologies LLP is a fast\\-growing tech company committed to delivering innovative digital solutions. We specialize in mobile app development, web applications, and custom software development for diverse industries. Join our passionate team where creativity, collaboration, and cutting\\-edge technologies drive our success.

**Job Summary:**

We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic **Flutter Developer** to join our team. As a Flutter Developer, you will be responsible for developing high\\-quality, cross\\-platform mobile applications that provide a seamless user experience. You will work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and project managers to deliver scalable and maintainable mobile solutions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain cross\\-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.

* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.

title: Site Supervisor
description:
The Site Supervisor is responsible for overseeing daily operations at the project site, ensuring work is completed safely, on time, and within quality and budget standards. This role involves coordinating workers, managing materials, and communicating with clients, contractors, and management to maintain smooth project execution.

**Responsibilities:**

* Supervise and coordinate daily site activities and workforce.
* Ensure all work is performed in accordance with safety regulations and company standards.
* Plan, schedule, and monitor progress to meet project deadlines.
* Inspect work quality and ensure compliance with project specifications and drawings.
* Manage materials, tools, and equipment on site.
* Prepare and maintain daily site reports, work logs, and attendance records.
* Coordinate with engineers, project managers, and subcontractors.
* Identify and resolve on\\-site issues promptly.
* Conduct toolbox talks and enforce safety practices.
* Ensure proper housekeeping and waste management on site.

**Qualifications:**

* Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or a related field (preferred).
* Proven experience as a Site Supervisor or similar role.
* Strong leadership and communication skills.
* Good knowledge of construction methods, materials, and safety standards.
* Ability to read and interpret technical drawings and plans.
* Proficient in MS Office and site management tools.
* Strong problem\\-solving and organizational abilities.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher, Volunteer

Pay: ₹12,000\\.00 \\- ₹18,000\\.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: Website Developer
description:
**About Us:**

Sky Tech App Solution is a dynamic and innovative tech company committed to delivering exceptional digital experiences. We believe in the power of design to transform user engagement and drive business success. We are looking for a talented Website Designer to join our team and help us create visually stunning, user\\-friendly websites that captivate and convert.

You will work closely with our development team, marketing team, and clients to ensure that the websites meet both aesthetic and functional standards. Your role will involve a mix of creativity, technical skills, and a deep understanding of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles.

* Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

**Preferred Skills:**

* Knowledge of accessibility standards and best practices.

Sky Tech App Solution is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Field Technician for Lift
description:
**Field Technician – New Installation (Mechanical)**

**Location:** Mumbai  
**Department:** Projects (New Installation)

**Role Purpose**

As a Field Technician (New Installation) at **Gilco Global**, you will be responsible for the **mechanical erection, alignment, and site readiness** of elevator systems. You will ensure that all installations are executed safely, accurately, and in line with Gilco’s quality and compliance standards — from receiving materials at site to final readiness for commissioning.

**Key Responsibilities1\\. Site Readiness \\& Coordination**

* Inspect and confirm shaft readiness (pit depth, headroom, power supply, sill levels, shaft plumbness, barricading, scaffolding, earthing).
* Coordinate with civil/electrical teams for preparatory works.
* Raise site readiness checklists, RFIs, and non\\-conformity reports when required.
* Plan site logistics for unloading, handling, and storage of materials in a safe and organized manner.

**2\\. Material Handling \\& Verification**

* Supervise **receiving, unpacking, and inspection** of materials as per delivery notes and BOQs.
* Ensure proper stacking, labeling, and protection of components at site to prevent damage or loss.
* Report shortages, damages, or discrepancies immediately to the project coordinator/logistics team.
* Track material consumption and balance components through daily log entries.

**3\\. Mechanical Installation**

* Install and align **guide rails, car frame, counterweight, buffers, safety gear, governor, machine beams, and associated components** as per OEM and Gilco Global standards.
* Fit and adjust landing doors, door frames, operators, and cabin assemblies within required tolerances.
* Follow correct mechanical fastening, torqueing, and leveling procedures using calibrated tools.
* Ensure neat workmanship, proper housekeeping, and waste segregation at all times.

**4\\. Documentation \\& Reporting**

* Maintain **daily progress reports (DPR)**, installation checklists, and site photographs via **FieldCircle or mobile app**.
* Record materials used, balance quantities, and issues encountered.
* Report daily progress to the Site Supervisor/Project Manager, highlighting delays or dependencies.
* Ensure all reports are submitted on time for project tracking and billing purposes.

**5\\. Safety \\& Compliance**

* Strictly follow PPE usage and site\\-specific **EHS protocols**.
* Adhere to OEM installation manuals, **EN81\\-20/50**, **IS 14665**, and Gilco’s internal SOPs.
* Identify and report unsafe conditions, near misses, or non\\-compliance immediately.
* Maintain a tidy, hazard\\-free work zone and uphold Gilco’s zero\\-incident goal.

**Qualifications**

* **Education:** ITI or Diploma in Mechanical or Electrical stream.
* **Experience:** 1–4 years in elevator *mechanical installation* preferred; freshers with internship exposure may apply.

**Technical Knowledge**

* Mechanical assembly and alignment of elevator components.
* Safe handling of heavy lift equipment and rigging tools.
* Reading GA/layout drawings and understanding shaft dimensions.
* Use of measurement instruments (spirit level, plumb line, torque wrench, vernier, etc.).

**Key Skills**

* Strong discipline and attention to detail.
* Ability to interpret drawings and execute accurate installations.
* Familiarity with digital reporting (FieldCircle or similar).
* Team coordination and polite client\\-site conduct.
* Time management and ability to meet site schedules.

**Growth Path**

Technician → Senior Technician → Lead Installer → Site Supervisor → Project Coordinator

**To Apply**

Send your CV to **hr@gilcoglobal.in**  
**Subject line:** *Application – Field Technician (New Installation)*

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹22,892\\.94 \\- ₹28,006\\.02 per month

Work Location: In person

title: QA Engineer, Intern
description:
**About Dialpad**  

Dialpad is the leading Ai\\-powered customer communications platform, transforming how businesses communicate with their customers. More than 50,000 companies around the globe — including Netflix, RE/MAX, Uber, Randstad, and Tractor Supply — rely on Dialpad to build stronger customer connections using real\\-time, Ai\\-driven insights. Visit dialpad.com to learn more.  

  

**Being a Dialer**  

At Dialpad, you'll be part of a collaborative team working toward our shared mission of making our customers and their employees wildly successful. We believe that every conversation matters, and we're elevating each one with a platform that drives real\\-time insights and automation for our customers.  

  

We thrive on continuous evolution, where every employee leverages industry\\-leading Ai to constantly refine our platform and our own skills. We seek individuals who not only meet our high standards but go beyond them. Our ambition is significant, and achieving it requires a team that operates at the highest level. We look for individuals who are not just ambitious but who also possess the traits that are fundamental to our success: **Scrappy, Curious, Optimistic, Persistent,** and **Empathetic**.

 **Your role**  

Our Quality Assurance (QA) team is the guardian of our product's excellence, ensuring its quality, reliability, and usability. We achieve this by collaborating closely with developers, designers, and stakeholders to identify and resolve issues. Our mission is to deliver high\\-quality, seamless experiences to our end users. As a QA Engineer Intern, you will contribute to our quality initiatives. You will focus on developing and executing a mix of functional and automated tests to validate the functionality, performance, and reliability of our cutting\\-edge web and mobile applications. The position reports to our Functional QA Manager and offers the opportunity to be based in our Bangalore, India office. It's a hybrid position, requiring three days of work from the office in Bangalore, and it is a 1\\-year contract opportunity.


**What you'll do**


* Define the scope of functional testing based on application complexity and criticality.
* Develop reusable and maintainable automated test scripts for our web and mobile applications.
* Integrate automated tests into our CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient and continuous execution.
* Execute tests across a wide range of browsers, devices, and operating systems to ensure comprehensive coverage.
* Analyze test results, debug issues, track defects, and collaborate closely with developers to see them through to resolution.
* Generate comprehensive test reports, including execution summaries, defect tracking, and coverage metrics to provide clear insights into product quality.


**Skills You'll Bring**


* 1 to 2 years of hands\\-on experience in mobile and/or web application testing.
* BS in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field. Freshers with experience/training in Quality Engineering and Automation are welcome to apply.
* Strong technical skills in automated testing frameworks (e.g., Appium, Robot, Selenium, Cucumber, TestNG).
* Proficiency in at least one programming language, preferably Java or Python.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, written, and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to multitask and manage priorities across multiple projects simultaneously.
* Experience in VoIP, telecommunications, or related communication technologies is a significant plus.


We believe in investing in our people. Dialpad offers competitive benefits and perks, alongside a robust training program that helps you reach your full potential. We have designed our offices to be inclusive, offering a vibrant environment to cultivate collaboration and connection. Our exceptional culture, recognized repeatedly as a certified Great Place to Work, ensures every employee feels valued and empowered to contribute to our collective success.



Don't meet every single requirement? If you're excited about this role and you possess the fundamental traits, the drive, and strong ambition we seek, but your experience doesn't satisfy every qualification, we encourage you to apply.



Dialpad is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We are dedicated to creating a community of inclusion and an environment free from discrimination or harassment.

description:
**We are one of the leading \\& trusted manufacturers of a range of precision quality Testing Machines for Textile, Pharmaceutical \\& Food Industries, since 2009 across India \\& other countries. You can find more about us here: https://www.appleelectroniks.com**

**Role : DIPLOMA / ITI Panel Wiring – Machine Manufacturing Industry**

**Job Overview**:

We are seeking a **dynamic young Electrical Engineer** with **1\\-2 years of hands\\-on Panel Wiring experience** in the **machine manufacturing industry**. The ideal candidate will be responsible for **panel wiring, testing, machine assembly, trials, fitment, and installation** of machinery both within India and abroad. This role demands strong technical skills, problem\\-solving abilities, and the willingness to travel to customer sites for **installation and commissioning**.

**Key Responsibilities**:

* **Panel Wiring \\& Assembly:** Perform electrical wiring and setup for control panels as per the circuit diagrams and technical drawings.
* **Machine Testing \\& Trials:** Conduct pre\\-delivery tests and trials to ensure the machine functions according to specifications.
* **Machine Assembly \\& Fitment:** Assemble and fit electrical parts, PLC \\& HMI, Servo Motor, Sensors \\& Switch etc into machines while following industry standards and safety protocols.
* **On\\-Site Installation \\& Commissioning:** Travel across PAN India and abroad for machine installation, commissioning, and handover to customers.
* **Troubleshooting \\& Maintenance:** Diagnose and rectify any electrical faults during machine trials Quality Checking stages or installation phases.
* **Compliance with Standards:** Ensure all electrical work complies with regulatory safety standards and customer\\-specific requirements.
* **Documentation \\& Reporting:** Maintain records of installations, testing results, and wiring layouts; provide reports post\\-installation.
* **Client Interaction:** Coordinate with customers during installation to understand their requirements and provide technical guidance.
* **Team Collaboration:** Work closely with mechanical engineers, Design Team, production teams, and technical support staff for seamless project execution.

**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**:

* **Experience: 1\\-2 years of hands\\-on experience in electrical work within the machine manufacturing industry.**
* **Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with panel wiring, PLCs, HMIs, and electrical control systems. Experience with Fatek make PLC FBS Series and Kinco HMI is an advantage.**
* **Blueprint Reading: Ability to read and interpret electrical schematics, technical drawings, and wiring diagrams \\& Preparing Operational Manuals etc.**
* **Problem\\-Solving Skills: Strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve electrical issues quickly.**
* **Installation Expertise: Experience in handling on\\-site installation and machine commissioning processes.**
* **Communication Skills: Effective verbal and written communication in English, Hindi, and other regional languages as required.**
* **Travel Readiness: Willingness to travel extensively across India and abroad for project installations and support.**.

**Preferred Qualifications**:

* **Education**: Diploma/ITI in **Electrical Engineering** or a related field.
* **Software Skills**: Knowledge of **PLC programming** and basic automation software is a plus.

**Compensation \\& Benefits**:

* **Salary**: Competitive, based on industry standards and experience.
* **Perks**: Travel allowances, project\\-based incentives, and on\\-site benefits.
* **Growth Opportunities**: Exposure to international projects with career advancement potential.

title: Project Manager L2
description:
Job description:
   

  

 Job Description
 
  

**Role** 




 The purpose of the role is to manage delivery of a project driving operations and delivery governance, ensuring right talent supply chain to optimize customer satisfaction and cost of delivery
   

  
 


 ͏ ͏
 
**Do** 




 \\- Delivery Management
   

 \\- Ensure seamless delivery of the projects 
   

 \\- Deploy optimum project delivery structure post transition/ migration phase by evaluating the budget, costs, risks and staffing requirement 
   

 \\- Create quarterly project charter with well\\-defined weekly project trajectory as per the project specifications \\& requirements and ensure 100% adherence in terms of schedule, quality, efforts and costs 
 



  

 \\- Ensure 100% compliance to Project SLAs, information security protocols and etc (all customers contractual obligations)
   

 \\- Monitor and take appropriate actions on internal and external audit findings to ensure no major non\\-compliance/ deviation from the SLA
   

 \\- Liaise between customer and internal technical delivery team to drive project health by adhering to organizational norms of project metrics
   

 \\- Drive various project related audits like quality, customer, ISO etc and ensure zero non\\-compliance
   

 \\- Conduct periodic cadence with the quality team to take proactive measures to resolves issues/ possible escalations
   

 \\- Conducts periodic cadence with Workforce Management Group (WMG) to ensure 100% fulfillment as per the program/ project requirement
   

 \\- Regularly audit quality (QA) status of delivery and engage QA team to ensure adherence to Quality Assurance standards and processes
   

 \\- Maintain project structure in Confluence \\& SAP in line with prevailing business requirements and norms
   

 \\- Ensure expected ramp down (ERD) compliance as committed in MSA
 



 \\- Client Relationship Management
   

 \\- Engage with client to deploy opportunities to deploy multiple solutions within/ across SLs to create a stronger value proposition for clients
   

 \\- Conduct regular customer connects (meetings/ visits/ video\\- conference) and participate in Management Review Meetings (MRM) with client management/engagement managers to understand customers current and future needs and seek feedback to improve delivery methodology/ timelines/ resource allocation
   

  
 


 ͏
 
 Identify and close early warnings on a project to avoid any customer escalations
   

 \\- Plan and conduct Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR) along with DMs/ ADH with the client management/ leadership team to drive improvement actions and mine for a new portfolio/ opportunity within the account
   

 \\- Design and monitor project performance dashboards/ reports with the clients periodically
 



 \\- Delivery governance across the project
   

 \\- Create weekly/ monthly/ quarterly MIS and reports to monitor and track overall project
   

 \\- Conduct periodic reviews with the delivery team on operational, quality and fulfillment parameters and new idea generation \\& its implementation on existing projects
 



 \\- Identify and resolve potential risks or early warning signs on project delivery to drive for ZERO surprise escalations and eliminate any revenue leakage
   

 \\- Escalate any deviations from the project charter to the delivery managers in terms of schedule, effort, cost, infrastructure from the project charter and minimize process exceptions and such deviations from the actual project plan
   

 \\- Review and monitor revenue allocations/ realization to avoid OB revenue leakage
   

 \\- Provide inputs to delivery leadership team on overall delivery performance parameters (project heath, utilization, realization etc) at project/ program level during reviews highlighting any critical project escalations and potential risks
 



 \\- Operational Excellence
   

 \\- Automation Focus
   

 \\- Perform pareto analysis as per the no. of incidents received and accordingly identify automation opportunities and drive value adds across the project
   

 \\- Deploy next generation hyper automation and crowdsourcing initiatives in coordination with Holmes RO team to enhance productivity, quality and speed of delivery
 



  

 \\- Interact and engage with tools team to bring in new tools in the project to automate certain pointers/ elimination of any noise in the project
   

  
 


 ͏
 
 \\- Innovation Focus
   

 \\- Brainstorm with the team to identify improvement opportunities and initiatives to further improve quality, delivery speed and productivity parameters
   

 \\- Drive value adds and BVMs; ensure management showcases them to customer in MRM \\& QBR to drive growth
 



 \\- Plan and conduct periodic idea campaigns to generate new solutions to the problems/ define better ways of working
 



 \\- Drive and deploy Knowledge Management and sharing 
   

 \\- Contribute in internal knowledge sharing initiatives at Wipro by driving internal training sessions, best practices, learnings, value adds and BVMs and deploys best practices in various projects within own account
   

 \\- Deploy the Wipro's knowledge management portal across the account and monitor \\& track trainings
 



 \\- Capability Development and Talent Pipeline Creation
   

 \\- Demand forecasting in line with business requirements 
   

 \\- Anticipate attrition and ensure right talent supply chain to deliver the project
   

 \\- Spearhead quarterly demand forecasting and resource planning aligned to project requirements
 



  

 \\- Create and deploy a workplan to fulfil the required demand from all the talent channels including external (lateral, contractors etc) hiring in coordination with WMG/ CWMG and Talent Acquisition team
   

 \\- Anticipate new skills/ upcoming technologies required to deliver the project and ensure the team is trained or right talent is inducted into the project as per the skill requirements
 



 \\- Drive 100% compliance on trainings and upskilling requirements 
   

 \\- Prioritize and identify essential and upcoming technical skills required across programs/ projects to facilitate and drive right supply chain
   

 \\- Drive towards 100% mandatory training compliance for the target population within an account
 



 \\- Plan and drive rotations for seed positions and ensure replacement plan to be arrived ahead of rotations
   

 \\- Quarterly connect with critical talent to understand their career aspirations and create their learning maps along with project managers and HRBP
 



 \\- Fresher engagement program
   

 \\- Ensure a stable arrangement and assimilation of rookie within accounts in coordination with competency group team (classroom trainings/ e\\-learning, certifications, on the job training etc)
 



 \\- Team Management
   

 \\- Resourcing
   

 \\- Forecast talent requirements as per the current and future business needs
   

 \\- Hire adequate and right resources for the team

title: Content Writer
description:
If life gives you lemons, and you make a strategy to sell it on social media, Lemon Yellow is the place for you. If you believe in the power of social media to influence, we need your influence at Lemon Yellow. We are looking for a Content Marketing Executive who understands the world of social media algorithms and goes beyond it to churn out quality content.

**Content Strategy \\& Creation**

* Develop and implement a content strategy for social media channels that reflects Lemon Yellow and its client's voice and meets audience needs.
* Ideate original and out\\-of\\-the\\-box content across various formats (posts, videos, reels, stories, showreels, etc.).
* Maintain a balance between trend\\-driven content and LY's core communication goals in line with the brand book.
* Contribute to UX writing for clients’ websites and apps, ensuring clarity and consistency that positively impacts the overall user experience.
* Support additional content needs such as writing blogs for LY's website and clients, as required.

**Support for Internal Teams**

* Assist teams like HR, Business, and UX with content for internal communication and external campaigns, ensuring consistency in tone, clarity, and brand alignment.

**Trend Analysis \\& Social Media Expertise**

* Monitor market trends and audience behavior to leverage them creatively for content creation.
* Stay updated with platform algorithms, best posting practices, and emerging social platforms.
* Identify opportunities in the social media landscape and assess their fit with LY's identity.

**Content Quality \\& Community Management**

* Review all content for grammatical accuracy, visual consistency, and brand alignment.
* Ensure pixel\\-perfect output with attention to every detail, tone, and visual element.
* Engage with the online community – respond to comments, DMs, and build rapport with followers.

**Performance Analysis \\& Reporting**

* Track and analyze post\\-performance, engagement, and reach across platforms.
* Create insightful weekly/monthly reports with data\\-backed observations and recommendations for improvement.

**Team Collaboration \\& Time Management**

* Work closely with designers, TLs, and digital marketing team members to develop and execute campaigns.
* Coordinate project timelines and ensure deadlines are adhered to by all involved stakeholders.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum **1 year of professional experience** in content creation.
* A Bachelor's degree in **Literature, Communication, Journalism, or Advertising**.
* **Exceptional communication and writing skills** with a strong grasp of grammar and storytelling.
* Familiarity with analytics tools such as Meta Insights, Instagram Analytics, LinkedIn Analytics, etc.
* Knowledge of paid social media campaigns and budget utilization will be an added advantage.
* Ability to multitask and manage timelines in a fast\\-paced, creative environment.
* Self\\-starter with a proactive attitude and a collaborative spirit.

**What are we offering?**

**Experience :** A chance for you to work with us on some of the best and up\\-and\\-coming products and services. Variety is the spice of Lemon Yellow’s portfolio \\- so you’ll get to test your content skills across industries.  
**Exposure :** An opportunity to be the voice of the agency. Your observations, strategies, and content will determine and portray who Lemon Yellow is across channels. Your creativity is what will be seen as our creativity.  
**Empathy:** We have a carefully curated culture that promotes 2 things: fun \\& fulfilment. Your welfare \\- personal, professional, mental, and physical \\- becomes our responsibility. From Fitness Thursdays to Learning Saturdays, we try to make you laugh \\& learn.

**Who are we?**  
Lemon Yellow LLP is a user\\-centered UI/UX design agency, based out of Thane, Maharashtra. With international operations, an experienced mentorship, and a passionate team \\- our aim is to design digital happiness. If you also believe in writing content that will make the lives of users all around easier, this is the right place for you.

title: UI/UX Designer
description:
**About the Role**

We’re looking for a creative and detail\\-driven **UI/UX Designer** to join our growing team at **The Website Times**. You’ll design high\\-end website interfaces that are visually refined, user\\-centered, and optimized for AI\\-assisted development workflows. The ideal candidate has a strong sense of aesthetics, clarity in thought, and enjoys turning ideas into digital experiences that feel clean and intuitive.

You’ll receive in\\-depth training directly from the founder to learn our design systems, content processes, and workflow. From crafting layouts and messaging to preparing mockups and social visuals, this role offers hands\\-on exposure to the complete journey of creating modern websites that balance design precision and storytelling.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design elegant, user\\-focused website interfaces using Figma or similar tools.
* Create structured, developer\\-ready designs optimized for **AI\\-based code generation tools** like Locofy and Anima by maintaining:
* Clear layer organization and naming conventions
* Consistent typography, spacing, and reusable components
* Defined responsive breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop
* Conduct detailed research on competitors, audiences, and industry trends to align design and messaging with client goals.
* Collaborate closely with the front\\-end developer to ensure accurate design implementation and visual consistency.
* Prepare clear, engaging website messaging and content with the help of **AI tools (like ChatGPT)**.
* Design and refine icons, graphics, and other visual assets using Illustrator or Photoshop when needed.
* Prepare **mockups and presentation visuals** for the websites you design, ensuring they are polished and impactful for client presentations.
* Collaborate on the **creation of social media posts**, especially those related to **website design tips and insights**, designed in Figma.
* Develop responsive prototypes and layouts for multiple devices.
* Participate in frequent check\\-in meetings, especially during onboarding, to ensure learning and progress.
* Analyze client briefs carefully and extract meaningful insights to guide design direction.

**Required Skills**

* Strong aesthetic sense and understanding of **modern UI/UX principles**.
* Experience with **Figma** (auto layout, components, variants, and responsive design).
* Intermediate knowledge of **Adobe Illustrator** and **Photoshop**.
* Strong writing and communication skills for web content and messaging.
* Basic understanding of **HTML/CSS** and web structure.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to connect design decisions to business objectives.
* Reliability, attention to detail, and openness to continuous learning.

**Bonuses \\& Rewards**

* **Project\\-based bonuses:** ₹500 to ₹3,000 per project (based on complexity).

Average expected bonus ₹6,000/month.

* **Performance bonuses:** Rewards for creativity, consistency, and professionalism, often in the form of **Amazon or Zomato gift cards**.
* **Learning opportunities:** Continuous guidance in design systems, AI\\-assisted workflows, and content strategy.

**Technical Requirements**

* Stable internet connection (minimum 30 Mbps).
* Computer/laptop with **Windows 10 (64\\-bit)** or later and **at least 8 GB RAM**.

**Why Join Us?**

You’ll work directly with the founder of **The Website Times** (thewebsitetimes.com), a growing web design studio focused on clean design, modern development, and efficiency through AI\\-assisted workflows. You’ll gain real exposure to the full lifecycle of website creation, from research and strategy to design and delivery, in a supportive environment that values creativity, growth, and trust.

**Job Location:** Remote (Work From Home)  
**Salary:** ₹30,000/month (base after confirmation) \\+ project\\-based bonuses (avg ₹6,000/month) \\+ performance rewards  
**Job Type:** Full\\-Time  
**Probation Period:** 3–6 months (based on learning speed and performance)  
**Work Days:** Monday to Saturday  
**Work Hours:** Flexible (Meetings between 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM IST)

Internship (Full\\-time)
Navi Mumbai

Are you the UI/UX prodigy with a pixel\\-perfect mindset and a knack for research? If you're obsessed with seamless user journeys, intuitive interfaces, and can wireframe your way out of anything—we want you on our team. At GBIM Technologies, a digital\\-first, design\\-powered marketing agency, we’re looking for a UI/UX Design Intern who is detail\\-obsessed, strategically creative, and research\\-driven.

**Why GBIM**

description:
**Greetings**!

Dear Candidates,

**Working** \\- Mon \\- Fri

* Curiosity\\-driven, proactive, and comfortable with deep research.
* Good communication and solid time\\-management skills.

**Why GBIM \\-**

We’re creators and collaborators who mix creativity with strategy and technology. Expect real projects, real clients, and real growth in a supportive, fast\\-moving environment.

title: Technical Writer
description:
**Job Details**
 Job Description:
   

  

* In this position as a Senior Technical Writer, you will be responsible for defining and implementing product documentation strategy for Intel client customers, enabling products. You will develop documentation External Design Specifications (EDS), User Guides, Technical Reference Manuals, Getting Started Guides, Platform Design Guides (PDG), etc. This will include the conversion of content from different formats to support a more dynamic experience for customers to consume content, and help clients enable their custom designs quickly using Intel products. You will be an integral part of a client product development and release team, and will work closely with Subject Matter Experts (SME) engineers and other project stakeholders to develop customer\\-enabling content for both offline and online web use. You will work with SMEs to define gaps in existing content and develop and implement a plan to execute. You will attend planning and/or coordination meetings to assess customer requirements and define appropriate content solutions.
* Roles and Responsibilities:
+ To generate product documentation from scratch and produce high\\-quality, standards\\-compliant end\\-user documentation according to priority and deadline
+ Analyze and understand the product workflows.
+ To provide helpful peer review edits to improve overall quality and learn about the technical aspects of Intel's products
+ To interface with the SMEs, or from engineering specifications
+ To determine the appropriate format, structure, syntax, and style, as well as adhere to legal guidelines.
+ Expected to utilize the latest authoring tools and technologies, such as SDL Dita publishing tools, Adobe FrameMaker, Snagit, Word, and other various formats and Content management systems to create, manage, and publish your content.
+ To possess excellent planning, coordination, and communication skills.
+ To work with not only local teams but also remote teams in different time zones. For example, Pacific, Central, Eastern Time in the United States, and SMEs and peers who speak English as their first language, and Asia, where the primary language is not English but communication is in English.
+ To master Intel writing tools and processes, and seek methods to improve relevant processes.


**Minimum Requirements**
* You must possess a Bachelor's degree or higher in English, Technical Writing, Technical Communications, or a related field, OR an engineering degree with excellent English skills.
* 5\\+ years of experience designing, writing, and publishing technical documentation, with a minimum of 1 year of technical documentation in the hardware/semiconductor field.
* 4\\+ years of demonstrable experience on Windows\\* and one of the other operating systems, like Linux\\* or Unix OS.
* 4\\+ years of experience using standard authoring tools and/or technologies.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree with two years of technical writing experience.
* Well\\-versed in DITA authoring.
* Good analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent written communication and teamwork skills.
* Ability to research technical topics and manage your own projects successfully.
* Understanding of structured authoring and minimalism practices.
* Experience with professional authoring tools, such as Author, Illustrator, and Acrobat.
* Experience with FPGA technology is a plus


**Job Type**
 Experienced Hire
   

  

**Shift**
 Shift 1 (India)
   

  

 Primary Location:
   

  

 India, Bangalore
   

  

 Additional Locations:
   

  

**Business Group**
 The Platform Engineering Group (PEG) defines, architects, validates and deploys all Intel’s platforms. PEG works across Intel’s product portfolio and engineering functions to ensure our platforms maximize value to our customers, their users and Intel’s business.
   

  

**Posting Statement**
 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.
   

  

 Position of Trust
   

  

 N/A
   

  

**Work Model for this Role**
 This role will require an on\\-site presence. \\* Job posting details (such as work model, location or time type) are subject to change.
