title: Sr Technical Writer
description:
As industries race to embrace AI, traditional database solutions fall short of rising demands for versatility, performance, and affordability. Couchbase is leading the way with Capella, the developer data platform for critical applications in our AI world. By uniting transactional, analytical, mobile, and AI workloads into a seamless, fully managed solution, Couchbase empowers developers and enterprises to build and scale applications with unmatched flexibility, performance, and cost\\-efficiency—from cloud to edge. Trusted by over 30% of the Fortune 100, Couchbase is unlocking innovation, accelerating AI transformation, and redefining customer experiences. Come join our mission.
   

  

* Key Responsibilities:
+ Create and maintain high\\-quality developer\\-focused documentation, including tutorials, API references, and code examples.
+ Aid the team in writing for new features and large releases.
+ Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure documentation aligns with product releases and updates.
+ Develop and maintain style guides and best practices for technical writing.
+ Work with PMs and the support team to identify gaps in documentation that are causing customer pain points.
+ Build and maintain a knowledge base of developer\\-focused content.

* Specific skills:
+ 5\\+ years of experience in technical writing, preferably in a database\\-focused role, with familiarity in programming languages such as Java, JavaScript, and Python
+ Experience using Git and docs\\-as\\-code
+ Preferable tooling experience with static sites and VSCode
+ Experience with GenAI applications and development
+ Experience documenting REST APIs


 At Couchbase, we believe innovation thrives when diverse perspectives are at the table. We actively encourage applications from individuals of all backgrounds—including women, people of color, LGTBQIA\\+ professionals, veterans, and individuals with disabilities. If you see a role that excites you, but don’t meet every qualification, we still encourage you to apply.
   

  

 Studies show underrepresented talent is less likely to apply unless they meet all the criteria. We encourage you to apply if you’re excited about the role and can bring strong contributions to our team.
   

  

 If you require reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let your recruiter know—we’re happy to support you.
   

  

 We value diverse educational and career backgrounds. If your experience aligns with the role’s goals—even if it doesn’t follow a traditional path—we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**Why Couchbase?**
**Benefits**
 Modern customer experiences need a flexible cloud database platform that can power applications spanning from cloud to edge and everything in between. Couchbase’s mission is to simplify how developers and architects develop, deploy and consume modern applications wherever they are.  PEP is a dynamic personal care company that proudly houses two innovative brands –

Together, our brands reflect PEP’s mission to deliver quality, creativity, and care to millions of consumers. We believe in Confidence over all skin \\& body biases.

description:

**Location: Kochi (Onsite – Night Shift, aligned with US Central Standard Time)** 




**Job Type: Full\\-Time** 




  





**About PriceSenz** 




 PriceSenz is a Dallas\\-headquartered Digital Technology Services company focused on
 **AI, Data, Cloud, and Digital Transformation** 
 across U.S. Commercial and Public Sector markets. We help clients solve complex challenges through strategy, integration, and innovative solutions that drive measurable outcomes. With a growing team in India, we are building strong capabilities to expand our impact globally.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a
 **Proposal \\& Technical Writer** 
 to join our Kochi office and take a lead role in creating persuasive RFP responses and high\\-quality content that showcases our IT services.
 



 This role is ideal for someone who enjoys writing, research, and storytelling, and wants to be at the center of how our solutions reach clients.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Write and edit RFP responses, proposals, and technical documentation for IT services and digital transformation projects.
* Collaborate with subject matter experts and delivery teams to turn technical ideas into clear, client\\-ready content.
* Build and maintain a content library of templates, case studies, and past performance documents.

title: Senior Technical Writer
description:
**About Zscaler**
 Serving thousands of enterprise customers around the world including 45% of Fortune 500 companies, Zscaler (NASDAQ: ZS) was founded in 2007 with a mission to make the cloud a safe place to do business and a more enjoyable experience for enterprise users. As the operator of the world’s largest security cloud, Zscaler accelerates digital transformation so enterprises can be more agile, efficient, resilient, and secure. The pioneering, AI\\-powered Zscaler Zero Trust Exchange™ platform, which is found in our SASE and SSE offerings, protects thousands of enterprise customers from cyberattacks and data loss by securely connecting users, devices, and applications in any location.
   

  

 Named a Best Workplace in Technology by Fortune and others, Zscaler fosters an inclusive and supportive culture that is home to some of the brightest minds in the industry. If you thrive in an environment that is fast\\-paced and collaborative, and you are passionate about building and innovating for the greater good, come make your next move with Zscaler.
   

  

 We built the Zscaler architecture from the ground up as a platform that could extend to new features and services. Our Product Management team takes hold of this massive opportunity to deliver our customers a growing portfolio of never\\-before\\-seen capabilities in threat prevention, visibility, scalability, and business enablement. Our product managers are champions of innovation with a shared vision for Zscaler and the limitless possibilities of cloud security. Join us to make your mark on the planning and product roadmap at the forefront of the world’s cloud security leader.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 We're looking for an experienced Senior Technical Writer to join our Technical Publications team. Reporting to the Senior Manager, Technical Publications you'll be responsible for:
   

  

* Translating complex technical information into clear, concise, and user\\-friendly documentation tailored for both technical and non\\-technical audiences
* Creating post\\-sales content and enhance documentation with visuals to support UX and engineering teams
* Collaborating cross\\-functionally with subject matter experts (SMEs) from Engineering, Field Support, Sales, Training, and Product Marketing teams
* Leading and mentoring fellow technical writers, while also supporting documentation project scheduling and management
* Contributing to the creation and maintenance of standards, style guides, and terminology best practices


**What We're Looking For (Minimum Qualifications)**
* Bachelor’s degree in Technical Writing, Communications, or a related field (certifications in technical writing or communications are also acceptable)
* 6 \\+ yrs of experience with demonstrated expertise in technical writing, including comprehensive documentation of REST APIs and related technologies
* Practical knowledge and hands\\-on experience with Open API Specification (Swagger) and JSON
* Proficiency in using tools like JIRA and/or Confluence


**What Will Make You Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications)**
* Experienced in Agile development environments with a proven track record of creating online help documentation and knowledge base articles
* Background in network and/or cloud security
* Hands\\-on expertise with HTML5 and CSS with web\\-based or mobile products


 At Zscaler, we are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve and the customers we work with. We foster an inclusive environment that values all backgrounds and perspectives, emphasizing collaboration and belonging. Join us in our mission to make doing business seamless and secure.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Our Benefits program is one of the most important ways we support our employees. Zscaler proudly offers comprehensive and inclusive benefits to meet the diverse needs of our employees and their families throughout their life stages, including:
   

  

* Various health plans
* Time off plans for vacation and sick time
* Parental leave options
* Retirement options
* Education reimbursement
* In\\-office perks, and more!


 Learn more about Zscaler’s Future of Work strategy, hybrid working model, and benefits here.
   

  

 By applying for this role, you adhere to applicable laws, regulations, and Zscaler policies, including those related to security and privacy standards and guidelines.
   

  

 Zscaler is committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all individuals. We strive to create a workplace where employees are treated with respect and have the chance to succeed. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy or related medical conditions), age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.
 *See more information by clicking on the* 
*Know Your Rights: Workplace Discrimination is Illegal* 
*link.*

title: Analyst-Business Analysis-Business Analyst
description:
EXL Decision Analytics
   

  

 EXL (NASDAQ:EXLS) is a leading operations management and analytics company that helps businesses enhance growth and profitability in the face of relentless competition and continuous disruption. Using our proprietary, award\\-winning Business EXLerator Framework™, which integrates analytics, automation, benchmarking, BPO, consulting, industry best practices and technology platforms, we look deeper to help companies improve global operations, enhance data\\-driven insights, increase customer satisfaction, and manage risk and compliance. EXL serves the insurance, healthcare, banking and financial services, utilities, travel, transportation, and logistics industries. Headquartered in New York, New York, EXL has more than 51,000 professionals in locations throughout the United States, Europe, Asia (primarily India and Philippines), Latin America, Australia, and South Africa.
   

  

 EXL Analytics provides data\\-driven, action\\-oriented solutions to business problems through statistical data mining, cutting edge analytics techniques and a consultative approach. Leveraging proprietary methodology and best\\-of\\-breed technology, EXL Analytics takes an industry\\-specific approach to transform our clients’ decision making and embed analytics more deeply into their business processes. Our global footprint of nearly 2,000 data scientists and analysts assist client organizations with complex risk minimization methods, advanced marketing, pricing and CRM strategies, internal cost analysis, and cost and resource optimization within the organization. EXL Analytics serves the insurance, healthcare, banking, capital markets, utilities, retail and e\\-commerce, travel, transportation, and logistics industries.
   

  

 Please visit www.exlservice.com for more information about EXL Analytics.
   

  

 Roles and Responsibilities for Sr Business Analyst – Accounting
   

  

 Desired Accounting \\& Finance Knowledge
   

  

* Core Accounting Concepts: \\- Strong understanding of debits/credits, trial balances, reconciliations, and journal entries.
* Awareness of how financial transactions flow into trial balances and reports.
* Familiarity with transaction types such as buy, sell, dividends, accrued interest, etc.
* Guidance \\& Frameworks: \\- Knowledge of accounting frameworks (GAAP, IFRS) and their impact on reporting requirements.
* Ability to identify when accounting guidance affects system behavior or reporting.
* System \\& Data Flow Awareness: \\- Understanding of data flow across financial systems – from security master, trade transactions, to ledger posting.
* Ability to connect upstream system events to downstream accounting outputs (e.g., trade bookings → expected debit/credit postings).


 Candidate Profile
   

  

* Experience: 5\\+ years in product ownership, business analysis, or accounting/finance\\-focused roles within financial services.
* Domain Skills: Strong knowledge of accounting concepts and investment products.
* Technical/Analytical: Ability to document requirements clearly, validate data flows, and perform reconciliation checks.
* Collaboration: Proven experience liaising between business stakeholders and technology teams in Agile environments.
* Tools: Familiarity with JIRA, Confluence, or similar backlog/requirements management tools.
* Education: Degree in Accounting, Finance, Economics, or related field. Professional certifications (CPA, CFA, CA, or equivalent) preferred.


**What We Offer**
* EXL Analytics offers an exciting, fast paced, and innovative environment, which brings together a group of sharp and entrepreneurial professionals who are eager to influence business decisions. From your very first day, you get an opportunity to work closely with highly experienced, world\\-class analytics consultants.
* You can expect to learn several aspects of businesses that our clients engage in. You will also learn effective teamwork and time\\-management skills \\- key aspects for personal and professional growth.
* Analytics requires different skill sets at various levels within the organization. At EXL Analytics, we invest heavily in training you in all aspects of analytics as well as in leading analytical tools and techniques.
* We provide guidance/ coaching to every employee through our mentoring program wherein every junior level employee is assigned a senior level professional as advisors.
* Sky is the limit for our team members. The unique experiences gathered at EXL Analytics set the stage for further growth and development in our company and beyond.

**Job Description**

title: Technical Writer
description:
**Company Overview**
 KLA is a global leader in diversified electronics for the semiconductor manufacturing ecosystem. Virtually every electronic device in the world is produced using our technologies. No laptop, smartphone, wearable device, voice\\-controlled gadget, flexible screen, VR device or smart car would have made it into your hands without us. KLA invents systems and solutions for the manufacturing of wafers and reticles, integrated circuits, packaging, printed circuit boards and flat panel displays. The innovative ideas and devices that are advancing humanity all begin with inspiration, research and development. KLA focuses more than average on innovation and we invest 15% of sales back into R\\&D. Our expert teams of physicists, engineers, data scientists and problem\\-solvers work together with the world’s leading technology providers to accelerate the delivery of tomorrow’s electronic devices. Life here is exciting and our teams thrive on tackling really hard problems. There is never a dull moment with us.
   

  

**Group/Division**
 The KLA Services team headquartered in Milpitas, CA is our service organization that consists of Service Sales and Marketing, Spares Supply Chain management, Field Operations, Engineering, Product Training, and Technical Support. The KLA Services organization partners with our field teams and customers in all business sectors to maintain the high performance and productivity of our products through a flexible portfolio of services. Our comprehensive services include: proactive management of tools to identify and improve performance; expertise in optics, image processing and motion control with worldwide service engineers, 24/7 technical support teams and knowledge management systems; and an extensive parts network to ensure worldwide availability of parts.
   

  

**Job Description/Preferred Qualifications**
 KLA is world's leading yield management/semiconductor equipment headquartered in Milpitas, California. We are looking for talented Tech Writers with 5\\-6 years of experience for our India operations.
   

  

 Requirements are immediate. We are open to candidates working remotely from their homes. This is not a freelance opportunity, but a regular full time job opportunity.
   

  

 Candidates must be open to travel internationally when required.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Uses product technical skills (like repair, maintenance, manufacturing, testing, building, operating, designing, troubleshooting, servicing, etc.) and technical documentation skills (like content generation, writing, editing, reviewing, formatting, validating, etc.) to produce high quality procedures, documents for KLA’s internal and external customers.
* Responsible for developing technical documentation for service, maintenance, installation, repair, troubleshooting, part replacement and upgrades for field service engineers, technical support engineers and install engineers.
* Creates, develops, plans, writes, and edits operational, instructional, maintenance, or test procedures for paper, multimedia, or web\\-based publication.
* Conducts interviews with various users and technical/engineering/product staff to gather data for documentation. Interfaces with functional organizations to develop content for the procedures. Researches and converts technical information into manual and/or web\\-based documents for non\\-technical and technical users. Conducts review meetings and discussions independently with engineering and technical staff.
* May be required to document engineering or manufacturing processes, procedures and specifications for internal and external audience.
* Follows documentation best practices, formats and templates. Learns new software, tools and techniques for high quality documentation. Produces products that conform to the company documentation and quality assurance standards. Recommends formats responsive to technical and customer requirements.
* Exerts good project management skills on the assigned projects, conducts reviews with stakeholders, provides regular updates to the stakeholders and functional groups; assesses efforts and time needed for the documentation; maintains action trackers and project documentation.
* Involves stakeholders from various departments and assess the need to update documentation. Monitors the errors, mistakes, changes requested and implements the changes in the documentation quickly.
* Uses standard error\\-free English understood across the world. Displays high proficiency in English writing for technical and non\\-technical audiences. Translates complex content of procedure/documents to a level and language most appropriate to the target audience. Applies other writing best practices to produce high quality, easy to understand documents/procedures.


**Minimum Qualifications**
 Bachelor's / Master's Level Degree or work experience of 5\\-6 years
   

  

*We offer a competitive, family friendly total rewards package. We design our programs to reflect our commitment to an inclusive environment, while ensuring we provide benefits that meet the diverse needs of our employees.*
*KLA is proud to be an equal opportunity employer*
 Be aware of potentially fraudulent job postings or suspicious recruiting activity by persons that are currently posing as KLA employees. KLA never asks for any financial compensation to be considered for an interview, to become an employee, or for equipment. Further, KLA does not work with any recruiters or third parties who charge such fees either directly or on behalf of KLA. Please ensure that you have searched KLA’s Careers website for legitimate job postings. KLA follows a recruiting process that involves multiple interviews in person or on video conferencing with our hiring managers. If you are concerned that a communication, an interview, an offer of employment, or that an employee is not legitimate, please send an email to talent.acquisition@kla.com to confirm the person you are communicating with is an employee. We take your privacy very seriously and confidentially handle your information.

title: AI Technical | Scientific Researcher & Writer
description:
We are looking for seasoned Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Generative AI writer, researcher, editor and proof reader. This is a permanent WFH role. You can be located anywhere. The shift for this role is Monday to Saturday from 2 pm to 11 pm your local time.
 



  





**Roles and Responsibilities** 



* Thoroughly create, review, edit and polish scientific content related to books, case studies, journal manuscripts, and other technical documents.
* Produce content that is meticulously researched and technically accurate.
* Perform extensive desk research on a variety of technical topics and subject matter, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of each subject.
* Extract valuable insights and data to enhance content quality.
* Adhere to scientific standards, maintaining the highest level of precision and accuracy in all content produced.
* Follow the conventions of technical, academic and technical blog writing styles.
* Edit and proofread technical content to guarantee its clarity, cohesiveness, and correctness.
* Ensure that the content is free from grammatical, punctuation, and formatting errors.
* Consistently meet tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Prioritize tasks effectively to ensure timely delivery of high\\-quality technical content.
* Collaborate with subject matter experts and technical professionals to gather insights and validation for content development.
* Engage in productive discussions to enhance content quality.
* Continuously enhance the quality of scientific content by incorporating relevant data, research findings, and scholarly references.
* Provide comprehensive information for an in\\-depth understanding of technical subjects.
* Ensure content aligns with the technical focus and expectations of the intended audience.
* Convert research findings into coherent, informative, and reader\\-friendly content. Translate complex technical information into accessible, engaging narratives.
* Interpret and present data, statistics, and technical information with clarity and relevance, ensuring readers can easily grasp the content's implications.
* Apply SEO best practices to enhance the visibility and searchability of technical content when applicable.
* Verify content accuracy and compliance with technical specifications for effective technical writing.
* Take corrective action to address any inaccuracies or inconsistencies in the content.
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in technical fields, exploring innovative approaches to content creation and knowledge sharing.



  





**Requirements and Skills** 



* PHD in a relevant technical field, such as Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence or a related discipline.
* Proven experience in technical writing, academic content creation, or a closely related field, demonstrating a strong aptitude for crafting technical narratives.
* Exceptional proficiency in English grammar and vocabulary, with the ability to produce content that adheres to academic and scientific standards.
* Strong editing and proofreading skills, capable of refining technical content for clarity, coherence, and correctness.
* Effective time management and multitasking abilities to meet stringent deadlines while maintaining content quality.
* Collaborative spirit to engage with subject matter experts and technical professionals in content development.
* Familiarity with technical blog writing is required.
* Adeptness in converting technical research into comprehensible, reader\\-friendly content.
* Data interpretation skills to convey statistical and technical insights coherently.

title: Business Analyst
description:
**About noon** 




  





 noon, the region’s leading consumer commerce platform, launched its marketplace in Saudi Arabia and the UAE on December 12, 2017, and expanded to Egypt in February 2019\\. We now serve millions of customers across the GCC.
 



  





 Today, the noon ecosystem spans marketplaces for food delivery, quick commerce, fintech, and fashion. noon is a work in progress \\- a few years in, and only 5% done.
 



  





**Our mission: Every door, every day.** 




  





**Role Overview:** 




  





 The Business Analyst will be involved in analyzing business processes, identifying opportunities for improvement, and translating requirements into actionable insights for IT and other stakeholders. The Business Analyst collaborates with business units, project managers, and development teams to ensure that solutions align with organizational goals and improve operational efficiency.
 



 Key responsibilities include gathering and documenting business requirements, performing data analysis, creating process flow diagrams, and facilitating communication between business and technical teams. The Business Analyst plays a key role in ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within scope, and meet the business’s strategic objectives.
 



  





  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* **Requirements Gathering:** 
 Work with stakeholders to identify and document business requirements and technical specifications.
* **Process Improvement:** 
 Analyze existing business processes and recommend optimizations or automation.

 Analyze data to identify trends, issues, and opportunities for business enhancement.
* **Stakeholder Communication:** 
 Serve as a liaison between business users and technical teams to ensure understanding and alignment of goals.
* **Solution Design:** 
 Collaborate with project teams to design solutions that meet business needs while balancing technical feasibility.
* **Testing \\& Validation:** 
 Assist in the creation and execution of test plans, ensuring that solutions meet defined business requirements.
* **Reporting \\& Documentation:** 
 Provide clear documentation of requirements, business rules, and process flows to ensure transparency and alignment.



  





  





**Qualifications:** 




  




* Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or related field.
* Strong analytical skills and experience with data analysis and process mapping.
* Experience with business process modeling tools (e.g., BPMN, UML) is preferred.
* Knowledge of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact with stakeholders at all levels of the organization.

 Ellucian is a global market leader in education technology. We power innovation for higher education, partnering with more than 2,800 customers across 50 countries and serving over 20 million students. Ellucian's AI\\-powered platform, trained on the richest dataset available in higher education, drives efficiency, personalized experiences, and strengthened engagement for all students, faculty and staff. Fueled by decades of experience with a singular focus on the unique needs of learning institutions, the Ellucian platform features best\\-in\\-class SaaS capabilities and delivers insights needed now and into the future. These solutions and services span the entire student lifecycle, from student recruitment, enrollment, and retention to workforce analytics, fundraising, and alumni engagement. Ellucian's innovative solutions, vast ecosystem of partners, and user community of more than 45,000 provide best practices leading to greater institutional success and achieving better student outcomes.
   

  

**Values Rooted in Purpose**
 We embrace the power to
 **lead** 
 , the courage to
 **innovate** 
 , and the determination to
 **grow** 
 . At our core, we believe in
 **humanizing** 
 our approach, recognizing that our people are our greatest strength. With a shared vision of
 **transformation** 
 , we endeavor to shape a brighter future for higher education.
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 The India Restart Program is designed to bridge the skill gap for individuals re\\-entering the workforce after a career break of 2 years or more. The program empowers participants to rebuild confidence, refresh their capabilities, and thrive in technology careers through targeted upskilling and support.
   

  

* For individuals eager to restart their careers after a break of 2 years or more.
* An immersive six\\-month program providing an opportunity to work on technology teams with a designed project plan.
* All participants are paired with a dedicated mentor to ensure guidance throughout the program.
* To maximise learning and collaboration, this program requires being in our Bengaluru office.
* A stipend of INR 50,000 is provided every month for the onboarded candidate.
* Option for full\\-time conversion based on performance and business requirements at the conclusion of the program.


 The Ellucian Information Development team is looking for a ReStart Consultant for the role of a Technical Writer within the Information Development team.
   

  

 The Information Development team plays a vital role in ensuring that Ellucian products are clearly described in documentation that's accurate and useful.
   

  

 As a ReStart Consultant \\- Technical Writer, you will be guided in our Information Development team best practices, documentation and publishing processes, deliverable quality standards, and the end to end process of creating customer\\-facing product documentation in accordance with Ellucian guidelines.
   

  

 The successful candidate will have opportunities in one or more of these aspects of user documentation:
   

  

* Help maintain and/or create high\\-quality technical documentation for Ellucian’s products.
* Participate in content source format conversion effort for modernization of existing documentation sets, applying latest content standards and improving on the quality.
* Work with product teams and mentors to learn about the product through hands\\-on work while studying new product features in development.
* Research and collect product feature information through interviewing Subject Matter Experts (SMEs), developers and other technical personnel, researching written material, and attending product demonstrations.
* Develop methods to transform data into easy\\-to\\-understand, user\\-friendly written documentation.
* Review and gather feedback from clients and other stakeholders to create highly usable, robust information to support users
* Review and test software and hardware for accuracy and consistency with documentation, identifying problems and suggesting revisions
* Create graphical images, flow charts, and diagrams for inclusion in documentation
* Research the information needs of software development projects to determine the best approach for developing content
* Plan and develop documentation deliverables for at least one project, often under tight deadlines


**Requirements**
* Demonstrated effective written (English language) and verbal communication skills
* Excellent organizational skills
* Ability to understand technical terms and basic software development processes
* Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously
* Ability to be part of a team and contribute to a team goal
* Awareness and basic understanding of markup languages, such as HTML or XML
* Candidates will be asked to submit recent high\\-quality writing examples, preferably task\\-based content for a technical audience, and take online assessments in language and basic technical aptitude


**Desired Skills/knowledge/experience**
* Prior experience within the software product industry might help, though not a mandatory requirement
* Basic knowledge of documentation for software applications
* Awareness of SaaS vs On\\-Premise
* Ability to work with common AI tools and demonstrate basic prompting techniques
* Awareness of Agile methodology
* Understanding of the concept of minimalism as applied to product documentation
* Awareness of XML/DITA and structured authoring methodology
* Working knowledge of mixed media, such as graphics

title: Technical Writer

description:
****Company Description****
 Take a seat on the Xplor rocket ship and join us as a
 **Technical Writer** 
 .
   

  

 We’re a global team of builders, listeners and problem\\-solvers who are relentlessly focused on making life simple, so our customers can get back to growing their business and doing what they love.
   

  

****Job Description****
**About the role**
 We’re hiring a Technical Writer to create clear, accurate, user\\- and developer\\-friendly documentation for our payments platform. You’ll own both internal\\- and external\\-facing content such as Guides, API references, SDK docs, Release Notes, Integration Playbooks, and more. You’ll partner with Product, Engineering, Solution Engineering, and Integration to help customers understand our products and integrate faster, with fewer support escalations.
   

  

****What You’ll Do:****
* Own user\\- and developer\\-facing content end to end: plan, write, edit, and maintain guides, quickstarts, SDKs, Webhooks, API references, Changelogs, and other docs.
* Information architecture: shape the Developer Center (information architecture, navigation, landing pages) so that content is easy to find and maintain.
* Style \\& quality: apply the Microsoft Style Guide and internal standards; enforce templates, terminology, and editorial quality across contributions.
* Samples \\& accuracy: partner with engineers to create runnable examples, Postman collections, and sandbox steps; validate flows end\\-to\\-end.
* Tooling \\& publishing: publish via our documentation platform; keep wikis and knowledge bases aligned.
* Feedback \\& analytics: instrument docs, gather user feedback, triage issues, and iterate to reduce time to first successful call.
* Cross\\-functional collaboration: participate in backlog refinement and reviews, track documentation tasks, and align with product roadmaps.


****Qualifications****
* Experience: 3\\+ years writing user\\- and developer\\-facing documentation, with a strong portfolio (API references, user guides, integration guides, quickstarts, SDKs, webhooks).
* API fundamentals: REST, JSON, OpenAPI/Swagger, auth (OAuth2/JWT), webhooks, pagination, rate limits, and error models.
* Code literacy: Able to read .NET and Java (controllers, models, attributes/annotations) and translate changes into docs.
* Docs\\-as\\-code: Git/Azure DevOps workflows (branching, PR reviews), Markdown, versioning, and deprecation practices.
* Tooling: Swagger UI/Editor or Redocly/Stoplight, Postman/collections, and a modern docs platform (e.g., GitBook).
* IA \\& editorial: Information architecture, templates, terminology, and Microsoft Style Guide proficiency.
* Quality \\& accuracy: Create runnable samples, validate end\\-to\\-end flows in sandbox, and keep wikis/KBs in sync.
* Collaboration: Work effectively with Product, Engineering, and Solution Engineering; clear written and verbal communication. You will support teams across Australia, New Zealand, the United Kingdom, the USA, and India.


****Additional Information****
 At Xplor, we believe that the best innovation and ideas happen at the intersection of differences \\- people of different cultures, generations, disciplines, and lived experiences. So even if you think you don’t quite tick all the boxes, we still encourage you to apply.
   

  

 We kindly ask you to apply through our careers portal or external job boards (LinkedIn, Naukri, Indeed, etc) only.
 **Please don't send your application via email.** 
 They will not be forwarded.

 We're the first global platform combining SaaS with embedded payments, and tools to help businesses grow and succeed. We offer software solutions in fast\\-growing ‘everyday life’ verticals: Education, Fitness \\& Wellbeing, Field Services and Personal Services – and a global, cloud\\-based payments processing platform. Xplor Technologies serves over 106,000 customers that processed over $37 billion in payments, operating across 20 markets in 2023\\.

 Xplor is committed to providing equal opportunities in employment and creating an inclusive work environment. We provide equal opportunities to all our employees and to all eligible applicants for employment in our company. We do not unfairly discriminate on any ground, including race, religion, color, ancestry, marital status, gender, sexual orientation, age, nationality, ethnic origin, disability or any other category protected by applicable law.

title: Technical Content Writer
description:
**Role Overview**




  





 As a Technical Content Writer at NIIT Digital, you will be responsible for developing engaging, accurate, and learner\\-centric content that supports our digital learning products and enterprise training programs. You will work closely with domain experts, instructional designers, and digital learning teams to translate complex concepts into easy\\-to\\-understand, interactive learning experiences.

* Research, conceptualize, and create technical and digital learning content for NIIT Digital programs across domains such as Cybersecurity, Cloud, Data Science, BFSI, and Software Development.
* Develop user guides, product documentation, and e\\-learning modules aligned with NIIT Digital’s learning design framework.
* Collaborate with subject matter experts (SMEs) and learning architects to structure and simplify complex technical information.
* Design storyboards and scripts for web\\-based and instructor\\-led training modules.
* Create content aligned with global learning standards (SCORM, xAPI) and NIIT Digital’s brand tone.
* Ensure consistency, accuracy, and clarity across all written material.
* Stay updated with emerging trends in edtech content creation, AI\\-based learning, and digital pedagogy.

 Graduate or Postgraduate in English, Journalism, Mass Communication, Computer Science, or a related field.
 



  





**Experience:**




  




* 1–4 years of experience in technical writing, instructional design, or digital learning content creation.
* Exposure to LMS platforms, e\\-learning authoring tools (Articulate, Captivate, or Rise) preferred.



  





**Skills \\& Attributes:**




  




* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to translate technical jargon into clear, engaging content.
* Strong research, visualization, and conceptualization abilities.
* Creative storytelling mindset with attention to instructional clarity.
* Passion for learning and adapting to new technologies.

title: Technical Writer
description:
General Summary:
   

  

 Reporting to the Director of Product Education, the Technical Writer is responsible for creating high\\-quality, customer\\-facing product documentation for a SaaS company in the healthcare industry. This includes online product help content, user guides, job aids, product release notes, and, as needed, implementation and technical integration guides.
   

  

 The ideal candidate is a strong communicator with exceptional written and spoken English skills, capable of explaining complex concepts clearly and concisely. This person is proactive, self\\-directed, and comfortable working independently, while also collaborating with product managers, product marketers, developers, QA engineers and implementation teams. The Technical Writer creates content that connects product functionality to customer goals and outcomes. This role also leverages AI tools and structured content practices to enhance quality, scalability, and readiness for ingestion by large language models, as our documentation evolves toward an AI\\-ready architecture.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Demonstrate excellent fluency in spoken and written English with precise grammar and clarity
* Write and edit high\\-quality online Help, product guides, release notes and job aids for assigned product/solution areas
* Write content that clearly communicates how to use product features and why they add value for different roles and workflows
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to research, interview, and gather technical and background information
* Manage and prioritize multiple deliverables and SLAs effectively in a fast\\-paced environment
* Participate in product design reviews to ensure usability and alignment between product functionality and documentation
* Use AI writing assistants (e.g. Grammarly, ChatGPT, or similar) to draft, refine and optimize content for clarity, tone and grammar
* Apply AI and structured content techniques (such as metadata tagging or DITA topic modeling) to make documentation more searchable, modular, and machine\\-readable


 Key Skills/Competencies
   

  

* Excellent command of English grammar, syntax and professional tone
* Strong organizational and self\\-management skills with minimal supervision
* Experience using:
+ Help Authoring Tools (MadCap Flare preferred)
+ Collaboration Tools (Confluence, JIRA, Aha, Slack, MS\\-Teams)
+ Screen capture and diagramming tools (SnagIt, Lucidchart, Visio)
+ Standard Windows\\-based applications (Word, PowerPoint, Excel

* Ability to structure and maintain documentation libraries that scale across product lines
* Analytical mindset with attention to detail and curiosity about new tools and technologies


**Required Education, Certifications, And Experience**
* Bachelor’s Degree in Technical Writing, English, Communications, or a related field
* 3 to 5 years of experience writing software documentation for SaaS or enterprise products
* Preferable experience writing task\\- and value\\-focused content that helps users understand both how and why to use product features effectively
* Demonstrated ability to translate complex technical information info simple, customer\\-focused language
* Proven ability to take ownership of work and deliver high\\-quality results independently


**Preferred Qualifications**
* eCommerce or web\\-based application experience
* Healthcare industry, supply chain, or purchasing experience preferred but not required


**GHX: It's the way you do business in healthcare**
 Global Healthcare Exchange (GHX) enables better patient care and billions in savings for the healthcare community by maximizing automation, efficiency and accuracy of business processes.
   

  

 GHX is a healthcare business and data automation company, empowering healthcare organizations to enable better patient care and maximize industry savings using our world class cloud\\-based supply chain technology exchange platform, solutions, analytics and services. We bring together healthcare providers and manufacturers and distributors in North America and Europe \\- who rely on smart, secure healthcare\\-focused technology and comprehensive data to automate their business processes and make more informed decisions.
   

  

 It is our passion and vision for a more operationally efficient healthcare supply chain, helping organizations reduce \\- not shift \\- the cost of doing business, paving the way to delivering patient care more effectively. Together we take more than a billion dollars out of the cost of delivering healthcare every year. GHX is privately owned, operates in the United States, Canada and Europe, and employs more than 1000 people worldwide. Our corporate headquarters is in Colorado, with additional offices in Europe.
   

  

***Disclaimer***
*Global Healthcare Exchange, LLC and its North American subsidiaries (collectively, “GHX”) provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, age, genetic information, disability, veteran status or any other status protected by applicable law. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to any status protected by applicable law. This EEO policy applies to all terms, conditions, and privileges of employment, including hiring, training and development, promotion, transfer, compensation, benefits, educational assistance, termination, layoffs, social and recreational programs, and retirement.* 
*GHX believes that employees should be provided with a working environment which enables each employee to be productive and to work to the best of his or her ability. We do not condone or tolerate an atmosphere of intimidation or harassment based on race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, age, genetic information, disability, veteran status or any other status protected by applicable law. GHX expects and requires the cooperation of all employees in maintaining a discrimination and harassment\\-free atmosphere. Improper interference with the ability of GHX’s employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.*

title: Business Analyst - Accounting
description:
**Your work days are brighter here.**
 We’re obsessed with making hard work pay off, for our people, our customers, and the world around us. As a Fortune 500 company and a leading AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, we’re shaping the future of work so teams can reach their potential and focus on what matters most. The minute you join, you’ll feel it. Not just in the products we build, but in how we show up for each other. Our culture is rooted in integrity, empathy, and shared enthusiasm. We’re in this together, tackling big challenges with bold ideas and genuine care. We look for curious minds and courageous collaborators who bring sun\\-drenched optimism and drive. Whether you're building smarter solutions, supporting customers, or creating a space where everyone belongs, you’ll do meaningful work with Workmates who’ve got your back. In return, we’ll give you the trust to take risks, the tools to grow, the skills to develop and the support of a company invested in you for the long haul. So, if you want to inspire a brighter work day for everyone, including yourself, you’ve found a match in Workday, and we hope to be a match for you too.
   

  

**About The Team**
 The Finance Transformation Testing and Shared Support Team plays an important role within the Finance Transformation organization by combining strong financial understanding with hands\\-on execution support. The team helps Finance scale effectively during critical initiatives, transformation programs, and high\\-volume periods.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a Business Analyst to support programs across Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Revenue Accounting, and broader Finance Operations, with a focus on testing, data validation, and process improvement. Experience with Workday Financials is preferred, as this role will assist with testing and functional coordination across multiple workflows and integrations that support global finance operations.
   

  

 This role will also provide operational and surge support during peak periods, helping ensure continuity, compliance, and accuracy in finance processes. The Business Analyst will work closely with senior team members to learn core systems, strengthen documentation, and contribute to consistent delivery across the Finance Transformation organization.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Requirements \\& Process Analysis**
* Partner with Finance and cross\\-functional teams to gather and document business requirements across core processes (Revenue, Billings, P2P, and Record\\-to\\-Report).
* Support process design discussions and help identify improvement opportunities.
* Document functional requirements and assist in coordinating with Product and Technology teams on system updates or enhancements.
* Help maintain and update business process documentation.


**Testing \\& Readiness**
* Support user acceptance testing (UAT) activities for finance systems, integrations, and enhancements.
* Develop and maintain test cases and test results documentation.
* Participate in readiness activities during go\\-lives and high\\-volume periods (month\\-end, quarter\\-end, year\\-end).


**Execution \\& Delivery Support**
* Provide day\\-to\\-day operational support during busy cycles, assisting with data validation, reconciliations, and transaction accuracy checks.
* Support integration testing and data migration efforts during system changes or new releases.
* Collaborate with global teams to ensure accuracy and consistency across finance data and processes.


**Collaboration \\& Growth**
* Partner with Finance, Product, and Technology teams to stay aligned on testing progress and project timelines.
* Support project tracking and documentation for risks, issues, and dependencies.
* Learn from and collaborate with senior analysts and leads to grow functional and systems knowledge.
* Contribute to documentation, templates, and process guides to support team efficiency.


**About You**
**Basic Qualifications**
* 4\\+ years of experience in accounting, finance operations, or business analysis.
* Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business, or a related field.
* Basic understanding of financial processes (AP, AR, Revenue, or GL).


**Other Qualifications**
* Strong attention to detail with good analytical and documentation skills.
* Ability to work effectively in fast\\-paced, cross\\-functional environments.
* Interest in developing expertise in financial systems, process improvement, and transformation programs.


**Our Approach to Flexible Work**
 With Flex Work, we’re combining the best of both worlds: in\\-person time and remote. Our approach enables our teams to deepen connections, maintain a strong community, and do their best work. We know that flexibility can take shape in many ways, so rather than a number of required days in\\-office each week, we simply
 **spend at least half (50%) of our time each quarter in the office or in the field** 
 with our customers, prospects, and partners (depending on role). This means you'll have the freedom to create a flexible schedule that caters to your business, team, and personal needs, while being intentional to make the most of time spent together. Those in our remote "home office" roles also have the opportunity to come together in our offices for important moments that matter.
   

  

**Are you being referred to one of our roles? If so, ask your connection at Workday about our Employee Referral process!**
 At Workday, we value our candidates’ privacy and data security. Workday will never ask candidates to apply to jobs through websites that are not Workday Careers.
   

  

 Please be aware of sites that may ask for you to input your data in connection with a job posting that appears to be from Workday but is not.
   

  

 In addition, Workday will never ask candidates to pay a recruiting fee, or pay for consulting or coaching services, in order to apply for a job at Workday.

title: Tech Writer
description:
Position: Tech Writer
 



 Location: Bengaluru
 



 Work Mode: Hybrid
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 As a
 **Technical Writer** 
 , you will create, organize, and maintain
 **DITA\\-based structured documentation** 
 for software products, including DFEs, workflow automation, and color management solutions. You will collaborate with engineering, product management, and quality teams to deliver precise, clear, and user\\-friendly content for diverse technical audiences.

* Develop and maintain

 .
* Create

 for DFEs and workflow software.
* Work closely with

 ,

 to author and manage content.

 , provide feedback, and continuously enhance content quality and usability.
* Collaborate with the global documentation team to align on standards, templates, and process improvements.

 **Agile** 
 or
 **continuous delivery pipelines** 
 where required.



**Required Skills and Qualifications** 



* **Bachelor’s degree** 
 in Technical Communication, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* **4–6 years** 
 of experience as a Technical Writer in
 **software application documentation** 
 .

 (topic\\-based authoring, maps, reuse, conditional text, metadata).

 (e.g.,
 *Oxygen XML Author* 
 ,
 *Arbortext* 
 ,
 *SDL* 
 , or
 *IXIASOFT* 
 ).
* Strong understanding of
 **software development concepts** 
 ,
 **printing workflows** 
 , or

 preferred.
* Excellent communication, writing, and editing skills with an eye for technical accuracy and usability.
* Ability to translate complex technical details into clear, concise, end\\-user\\-focused content.

 **Agile development environments** 
 and collaborating with cross\\-functional global teams.



**Preferred Qualifications**

 **software applications in printing, imaging, or color management domains** 
 .
* Knowledge of
 **content management systems (CMS)** 
 supporting DITA workflows.
* Familiarity with
 **Git** 
 ,
 **XML** 
 ,
 **HTML** 
 , or
 **content publishing frameworks** 
 .
* Understanding of

 and translation workflows.
* Exposure to
 **workflow automation tools** 
 or

 is a plus.



  





 Please share your profile to sarita.kunda@infotechconsultancy.io and Arun.PV@infotechconsultancy.io

title: Technical Writer
description:
As a Documentation Writer, you will craft clear, concise content to guide users in achieving their goals (JTBD) with the least number of steps. Your work will focus on simplifying complex processes while considering all user scenarios and ensuring a seamless experience. You will create detailed documentation, including marked\\-up screenshots and media, to enhance user understanding and faster execution.
 



**Responsibilities:** 



* Develop easy\\-to\\-follow user guides, setup manuals, FAQs, and troubleshooting content.
* Break down complex technical concepts into simple, actionable steps.
* Create visual aids (screenshots, videos) with clear labels and numbering for step\\-by\\-step processes.

**Requirements:** 



* 1\\-3 years of experience in technical writing, preferably for internet\\-based products or B2B SaaS.

* Excellent communication and writing skills.
* University degree in a relevant field (Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent) preferred.

title: Technical Writer
description:
**Position Title: Technical Writer** 




**Experience: 2\\-4 Years** 




**Location: Ahmedabad** 




  





**About Motadata** 




  





 Motadata is a renowned IT monitoring and management software company that has been transforming how businesses manage their ITOps since its inception. Our vision is to revolutionize the way organizations extract valuable insights from their IT networks.
 



  





 Bootstrapped since inception, Motadata has built up a formidable product suite comprising cutting\\-edge solutions, empowering enterprises to make informed decisions and optimize their IT infrastructure. As a market leader, we take pride in our ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, in any format, providing a unified view of IT monitoring data.
 



  





 We are customer\\-centric and continuously strive for excellence, enabling organizations to tackle complex IT challenges with ease. Follow us on LinkedIn and be part of an innovative team. We’re looking for folks who want to join us in unlocking the true potential of IT together! 
 



  





**Position Overview:** 




  





 We are seeking a motivated and detail\\-oriented
 **Technical Content Writer** 
 to join our growing product team. This role is focused on creating high\\-quality, user\\-centric content for enterprise software products in the domains of
 **Unified Observability** 
 ,
 **AIOps** 
 , and
 **IT Service Management (ITSM)** 
 .
 



 As a Technical Content Writer, you will be responsible for crafting product documentation, user guides, knowledge base articles, release notes, and technical marketing collateral. You will work closely with product managers, engineers, QA, and support teams to ensure clarity, accuracy, and usability in every piece of content you create.
 



  
 


 Key Responsibilities
   

 Product Documentation
 
 ·      Create and maintain detailed user guides, how\\-to articles, installation manuals, and configuration documentation.
 



 ·      Collaborate with product managers and developers to understand new features and document them clearly.
 



 ·      Write API documentation, integration steps, and interface\\-level instructions where applicable.
 


 Knowledge Base \\& Help Center
 
 ·      Author and manage knowledge base (KB) articles and self\\-help content to assist customers with common issues.
 



 ·      Ensure articles are up to date, searchable, and categorized properly for easy discoverability.
 


 Release Notes \\& Change Logs
 
 ·      Draft product release notes, including new features, improvements, bug fixes, and deprecations.
 



 ·      Collaborate with QA and engineering teams to ensure accuracy and completeness.
 


 Technical Marketing \\& Enablement Content
 
 ·      Assist in the creation of solution briefs, product feature highlights, use\\-case guides, and training material.
 



 ·      Support internal teams (sales, support, presales) with concise, accurate technical communication.
 


 Quality \\& Usability
 
 ·      Ensure consistency in tone, structure, terminology, and formatting across all product documentation.
 



 ·      Follow content style guides and contribute to improving writing processes and documentation templates.
 



  




 Required Skills \\& QualificationsMust\\-Have
 
 ·      2–4 years of experience in technical writing, preferably in the IT, SaaS, or enterprise software domain.
 



 ·      Strong understanding of at least some of the following areas:
 




 ·   
 
 IT Infrastructure (Servers, Networks, Virtualization)
 




 ·   
 
 Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
 




 ·   
 
 Monitoring \\& Observability (logs, metrics, traces)
 




 ·   
 
 ITSM workflows and tools
 



 ·      Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
 



 ·      Ability to grasp complex technical concepts and explain them clearly and concisely.
 



 ·      Familiarity with tools such as Confluence, Git, Jira, Markdown, HelpDocs, or similar CMS platforms.
 


 Good\\-to\\-Have
 
 ·      Basic understanding of REST APIs, YAML/JSON, or scripting basics.
 



 ·      Experience working in Agile or sprint\\-based development teams.
 



 ·      Exposure to Open Telemetry, Grafana, Prometheus, or IT automation tools.
 



 ·      Visual documentation skills (e.g., flowcharts, diagrams using Lucid chart, Draw.io, etc.).
 



  




 What You’ll Gain
 
 ·      Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge enterprise platforms in observability and IT operations.
 



 ·      Exposure to product development lifecycle, integrations, and user experience thinking.
 



 ·      Career path into content strategy, product enablement, or product marketing.

title: Business Analyst, Trust and Safety, YouTube
description:
This role may review graphic, controversial, and sometimes offensive video content during team escalations in line with YouTube’s Community Guidelines, however these occurrences would be very rare and chance encounters. This role may also occasionally require candidates to work on call or weekend hours
 **Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Math, Quantitative Science, or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
* 1 year of experience in statistical problem solving and analyzing data sets using SQL or comparable coding language (e.g. Python, R, Java, C\\+\\+).
* 1 year of experience collecting, managing and synthesizing data sets and information from disparate sources to perform data analysis and statistical modeling.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* 5 years of experience in an investigative role.
* Experience working with tech teams to optimize machine learning models.
* Experience in project management and process optimization with data analytics, delivering production level metrics, insights, and actions.
* Experience working with programming languages such as, Python, Java, JS, R or SAS.
* Experience with abuse prevention, policy, and regulatory systems.


**About The Job**
 Google's leadership team hand\\-picks thorny business challenges, and members of BizOps work in small teams to find solutions. As part of this team you fully immerse yourself in data collection, draw insight from analysis, and then zoom out to develop compelling, synthesized recommendations. Taking strategy one step further, you also persuasively communicate your recommendations to senior\\-level executives, roll\\-up your sleeves to help drive implementation and check back\\-in to see the impact of your recommendations.
   

  

 As an Associate in Business Operations and Strategy, you are the ultimate data expert and thrive on solving highly analytical problems, conducting interviews and synthesizing ideas. You will work with a small team on projects commissioned by Google's executive team, managing your own workstream(s) as you go.
   

  

 In this role, you will analyze huge sets of data and support scaled systems of review to address those challenges. You will empower Google to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of the operations, resolve unique legal challenges at scale and streamline complex workflows, and support and educate internal stakeholders. You are an independent, critical thinker with sound metrics judgment who has a passion for coaching others, solving technical challenges and setting scalable standards. You can balance the short term requirements Google faces while demonstrating the ability to see the big picture and make quantitatively based long\\-term recommendations accordingly.
   

  

 \\*\\*\\*\\*Use this template only when existing Area Templates don't apply. For one\\-off use cases, not ongoing roles. If you need to create a NEW template for your team submit a request at go/jdreview.\\*\\*\\*\\*
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Drive analytics efforts to meet the challenges of international regulation such as Article 17 of EUCD by providing rigorously productionalized transparency data to bolster YouTube’s external copyright narrative, as well as detailed analytics of EU copyright operations to help executive Ops and Legal stakeholders monitor risk.
* Apply advanced statistical methods to complex data sets in an effort to predict and prevent abuse of the copyright notice and takedown process. Work with cross\\-functional abuse teams to develop shared strategies to address similar abuse vectors or bad actors.
* Learn complex and technical concepts, systems and deliver meaningful results using them. Communicate highly technical results and methods clearly.
* Maintain, foster and promote Copyright Operations quality by providing regular feedback metrics to global review teams. Manage technological solutions for streamlining quality assurance and produce scalable training solutions.

title: Configuration Business Analyst
description:
**Job Summary:** 




 At Zendesk, our IT team collaborates closely with business stakeholders to enhance the integration of technology and operations across various functional areas. As we expand our team in Pune, we are seeking a skilled IT Business Systems Analyst, Configuration with a strong focus on SaaS Finance tools. If you are passionate about configuring and maintaining SaaS solutions while transforming business requirements into actionable strategies, we want to hear from you!
 



  





**Who We're Looking For** 




 We seek an IT Business Systems Analyst, Configuration who thrives in a collaborative environment and is dedicated to optimizing technology configurations. The ideal candidate will possess a solid background in business systems analysis, specifically related to the configuration and maintenance of SaaS tools applied to finance operations. You should demonstrate familiarity with SaaS configuration best practices and have extensive experience with agile methodologies. Additionally, you should possess a strong foundation in requirements development and the ability to comprehend and articulate business fundamentals effectively.
 



  





**What You'll Be Doing** 




**As an IT Business Systems Analyst, Configuration, you will:** 



* **Configure and Maintain SaaS Tools:** 
 Oversee the configuration, maintenance, and optimization of various SaaS applications, ensuring they align with business operations and best practices.
* Resolve tickets from business partners related to system access requests and configuration updates in finance tools (e.g. Netsuite, Coupa, Brex), collaborating with requesters as needed to ensure prompt and accurate resolution.
* Troubleshoot configuration\\-related issues and provide resolutions.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of all configuration changes, ensuring that any updates or modifications are well\\-recorded and accessible for future reference.
* **Gather and Document Requirements:** 
 Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document detailed business requirements, translating them into actionable specifications for technology solutions.
* **Facilitate Cross\\-Functional Collaboration:** 
 Act as the liaison between business teams and technical resources, ensuring clear communication and alignment throughout the implementation of solutions.
* **Apply Agile Practices:** 
 Actively participate in agile ceremonies, such as sprint planning and reviews, contributing to continuous improvement in the development process while promoting agile principles throughout the team.
* **Leverage AI Tools for Enhancement:** 
 Utilize AI\\-driven tools to streamline the requirements gathering and documentation process, enhancing personal productivity and improving the efficiency of the overall workflow.
* **Conduct User Acceptance Testing:** 
 Collaborate with teams to define acceptance criteria, develop test plans, and conduct user acceptance testing (UAT), ensuring solutions meet business requirements before deployment.
* Partner with BSAs to support post\\-implementation project efforts, assisting with the rollout of configuration changes and ensuring minimal disruption to system operations.
* **Support Change Management Initiatives:** 
 Guide business partners through changes brought by new technology implementations, assisting in training, user support, and post\\-implementation feedback loops.



  





**Key Values We Uphold** 




**In this role, you will be guided by our core values:** 



* **Lead with Exceptional Service:** 
 Continuously strive to exceed the expectations of our stakeholders, ensuring that our solutions and interactions reflect a commitment to exceptional service.
* **Deliver the Simplest Solution:** 
 Focus on simplicity and effectiveness, prioritizing straightforward and efficient approaches that yield optimal results.
* **Take Pride in Our Work:** 
 Exhibit ownership of your deliverables, ensuring all requirements and documentation reflect high standards of quality and excellence.
* **Care for Each Other:** 
 Foster an inclusive team environment where collaboration and mutual respect thrive, understanding that we achieve more when we support one another.



  





**What You Bring to the Role** 




**To be successful in this role, you should have:** 



* **System configuration:** 
 Expertise in
 **configuring finance systems** 
 to effectively support business requests and requirements. Certifications are a plus.
* Excellent troubleshooting and problem\\-solving skills.
* **Business Analysis Expertise:** 
 A minimum of
 **6 years of experience** 
 in business systems analysis, with a particular focus on SaaS applications and configuration; sample applications include one or more of:
 **Netsuite, Adaptive, Coupa, Brex, Blackline, Celigo, Cforia**
* **Experience with SaaS Tools:** 
 Demonstrated experience in configuring and maintaining SaaS platforms and familiarity with industry best practices for SaaS configuration.
* **Agile Methodology Experience:** 
 Practical experience applying agile practices to enhance team performance and project deliverables, demonstrating knowledge of agile frameworks.
* **Requirements Development Skills:** 
 Proven ability to gather, analyze, and document complex business requirements and specifications, coupled with strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Proficiency in Jira or similar project management and issue\\-tracking software.
* **Effective Communication Skills:** 
 Excellent verbal and written communication abilities, enabling you to bridge the gap between technical and non\\-technical stakeholders effectively.
* **Team Collaboration:** 
 A collaborative and team\\-oriented attitude that promotes a supportive work culture while driving results.
* **Growth mindset:** 
 Embraces a growth mindset by actively seeking out learning and training opportunities, soliciting feedback, and striving for continuous personal and professional development to drive team and project success.



  





**Why Join Us?** 




 At our organization, we celebrate diversity and inclusion as essential components of innovation and success. We strive to create an environment where every team member can flourish and contribute their unique perspectives. Step into a role that challenges you and drives meaningful impact within our organization.
 



  





 If you’re ready to elevate your career, contribute to transformative SaaS solutions, and embody our core values, we invite you to apply today! We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to cultivating an inclusive environment where all employees can thrive.

title: Senior Technical Writer
description:
We are seeking two highly experienced Technical Writers/Editors to join our content operations team. The ideal candidates will be self\\-starters with a proven track record of writing, editing, and publishing customer\\-facing support documentation that is clear, consistent, and easy to consume.
 



  





 This role will focus on editing, standardizing, and publishing support articles to ensure accuracy, readability, and alignment with our brand and style guidelines.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  




* Review, edit, and publish external\\-facing support articles for technical accuracy, clarity, and tone.
* Collaborate with product, support, and engineering teams to ensure content completeness and correctness.
* Maintain consistency in style, structure, and terminology across all customer\\-facing documentation.
* Manage publishing workflows in CMS or knowledge base platforms (e.g., Salesforce Knowledge, Zendesk, ServiceNow, Confluence, etc.).
* Proactively identify outdated or redundant content and coordinate updates.
* Apply SEO best practices and accessibility standards to ensure optimal user experience.
* Uphold and evolve editorial standards and content quality guidelines.



 Qualifications:
 


* Bachelor’s degree in English, Communications, Technical Writing, or related field.
* 5\\+ years of experience in technical writing, editing, or documentation management—preferably in a software or technology environment.
* Strong command of written English and attention to detail.
* Experience working with structured content and enterprise CMS tools.
* Proven ability to work independently and manage multiple deliverables in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Familiarity with support knowledge base ecosystems and best practices for external customer content.



 Preferred Skills
 


* Experience editing or publishing content for SaaS, enterprise support, or developer platforms
* Understanding of terminology management and content governance.
* Basic HTML or Markdown knowledge.
* Strong collaboration and stakeholder management skills.



 What We’re Looking For
 


* Highly motivated, self\\-driven professionals who can take ownership of content quality
* Strong editorial judgment with the ability to balance technical depth and customer clarity.
* Team players who can work across geographies and time zones.
